sentence: As this information period advances, it is highly easy for people to receive a myriad of opinions from celebrities such as famous entertainers and athletes.
Are their opinions so important for us?
Nevertheless, for me the thoughts for older people are more valuable for us than they are from celebrities.

In the first place, lots of older people have mastery on some fields; in this condition, their opinion about relative fields are undoubtedly important than the thoughts of famous people without this kind of knowlege.

For instance, my uncle who works in bank always ask help from my father about problems on marketing analysis and budget planning owing into the fact that my father who majors in economy and works in this field for thirty years has sumless experiences and insight on economy.
Depending on my father's advisable opinion, my uncle earn achieve his own goals in a short time.
Nevertheless, if my uncle follow some athletes who almost do not understant marketing, he may lost all of his money and has a big fail on business.
Therefore, when we meet some professional problems, we are supposed to ask help from older people who have lots of experiences and relative knowledge.
Secondly, we can not blindly follow the celebrities' opinion because we have totally different condition such as the the big difference on self-supply ability.
My brother, James recently follow the idea that the most important thing in life is to ejoy because he saw one famous actor said that on television.
Then he only plays computer games and shops rather than go to the school because the relax is his most important thing.
Nevertheless, my mother totally disagree with this opinion because these famous actors can only enjoy depend on their long term hardworking and they can feed themself.
However, James is only a students and he even ask help from parents to feed himself.
Therefore, without thinking about his own condition, James even can not graduate let alone have a good life in future if he persist this brief.
The opinion of my mother that he need to study well will make him obtain a good life unlike the celebrities' rediculous thoughts.
Finally, lots of opinions of celebrities are only contribute for they own disadvantages.
Lots of famous basketball players claims that it is necessary for players to wear Nike shoes because this pair of shoes can help people do a good job in games.
However, older people disagrees with this because they think this shoes are expensive and similar to nomar shoes.
Actually, the opinions of older people are right because the famous basketball player in order to advertise certain brands and get money.
To sum up, I as into tune that we the older people's opinion are more important than celebrities.
I think it's a good idea.
As the society developing rapidly, meterialist is more and more commom in our daily life.
Money which might be the direct symbolization of the meterialist is used as the reward widly.
Under this situation, i will give three aspects of reasons to support my opinion.
First of all, I think money is a good way to encourage their children.

Your children can buy some snacks or toys which they have dreamed for a long time with these money, which will make them more energetic.

On the other hand, it's a essential class for our children before stepping into the society.
We get the pay for what we pay.
In the adult's world, they are also offered money from their boss for each good result they get in work.
Accordingly, money is common to regarded as the award.
Someone may think it's a unresponsable for their child to make them facing the money-society too early.
However,  Inevitably, parents don't always know what their chidren want.
Thurs, a specific gift for their children won't be the best.
Money could be the most straigst way to award their children and perhaps decrease the confiction that their children don't like the gift which is selected consideratly by their parents.
Since the three above-mentioned reason.
I think it's a good idea that some parents offer the money and money should be the best and the most efficient way to let the children get the further development.
Everyday we will meet lots of different people.
Importantly our happenies is based on the relationship with others.
Nowadays we increasingly value the relationship with others in our life.
Even the people surrounding me are different such as the family member, teachers, friends, I think that the most important consideration in every connection is honest.
In the first place, we always telling the truth to family members can bring famimly closer.
As we know, the family members are the people who love me the most.
When I have mistakes, they will forgive that and also enclose me.
When I feel frustrate, they will encaurage me at the first time.
When I am happy, they will feel happy too and congratulate me.
I always share my inner world in front of my family as these behavior can create more interaction between I and my family members.
Even I cannot always accopany them, I can always tell the truth to them, which makes us closer.
In the second place, that we share our realist mood with our friends can help us better adapt our temper.
The friends are the people who know us the most since we always have chat and excange our opinion.
Take myself as an instance.
In the past, I never tell truth to my friends even I was so sad.
I always tolerated all sadness by myself.
Recently, I lost my girlfiend and I tell this truth to my best friend Tom.
He take me to wath the movie in the movie theater and communicate will me.
That makes me feel better and I rapidly escape from the sadness.
Through this experiens I find that telling truth to your friend is not ambarrased and that can adapt your mood fastly.
Finally, telling the truth to your teacher can help your better improving your grades.
As we know lots of people like hide their shortcomming in front of their teacher due to the point that they want save their face.
However, these hiden shortcomming cause the bad grades finally.
When I study in the university, I always telling the truth to my teacher and honestly ask them.
Fortunatly, they are helpful and always have discussion with me.
I even tell them my problem in the life, not to mention the difficulties in the study.
That behavior makes me advance gradually.
To sum up, telling the truth to any relationship between people will bring us lots of positive impacts.
We can have a closer family relationship and have a better mood in life.
It is very difficult to do a company well because there are many things people needs to concern about.

What work to give to the workers to make then satisfying?
It is a quastion that borthers many employers.
In my opinion, different types of work satisfy workers better than similar tasks.
Indeed, one similar job seems easier to finish.
Workers can just do the same things again and again, which is a simple task for them.
It's possible that they will think the work easy to finish and be satisfied with it.
Also, after many times practicing the same thing, people can be skillful and they can finish each task more and more quickly.
With these improvement, they will gain a sence of achievement.
People are always satisfied with the work that provide them achievement.
However, it can attrack employees attention from distractions to do different jobs.
When people are tired with doing certain thing, they are likely to do some other things to change their attention.
If they just do the same work, they will just do things that is not connecting with work, which will make them unefficient.
But when different skills, are given to them, they can put this one away and do another.
This can lessen the time workers use on doing other things and finish more work.
And finding that they finish much work efficiently can satisfied them and let them like their jobs.
Furthermore, workers may feel their work flexible.
If people can deicde what to do first what to do next, they will feel free and be satisfied.
I always feel happy when I can ch
In conclusion, although Doing similer tasks have some benefit on workers, it is more attractive and beneficial to do different work.
Thus, I suggest employers to offer more different job to workers.

Nowadays, people's life has been more and more complex, the question regarding whether young peolpe should have the ability to plan and orgnize has provoked a lot attention from many people.
Some people thinks it will be not useful and a waste of time, and young people should spend more time on other things.
However, I have a different idea, and I will utilize two different reasons to support my standpoint.

First of all, the number of population in the world has been more and more, and the competition among young people must be more and more violent, so the ability to plan and organize will play a more and more essential role in looking for job or other things in the future.
For instance, if two people come to a company to interview for one job, the interviewer will be more likely to choose the one who can make plans and orgnize others for the company.

Normally, most interviewers are looking forward to that their staffs can do more things amd have a good overal situation, because this kind of workers can give better adcice for the development in the future of one enterprice.
Also, these people will more likely to have higher income, because they usually are manager in the company in the future, young people will have more benifits in works by this ability in the future.
Secondly, young people sometimes are irritable when they make decisions, so they often mke some wrong.
If they cultivate this kind of ability, they will think twice before they do works and make decision, it really helps them to be more efficient in the works and life.
For instance, one person who can organize his own things well, he will make plan before he do something, so his life will be clear, and he will do the things by the most rapid and the best way.
Then, he will have more time to do the things he likes.
It is no doubt that any kind of people all have their life style, and they can live in this kind of style well.
Nevertheless, I think a smart young people will be more likely to plan his life, or try to adapt to this kind of atmosphere
During our everyday life, we can see many things which can try their best to make our lives simpler and easier.
I believe that you all have seen the machinery that continue to make products no matter day or night.
Besides, the phone, one of the products that we use most in our lives can often be seen around you.
Those all are the good things to us and there is no doubt that we are experiencing an easier and more comfortable life than it wsa when our grand parents were children.
First, mutiply things are finished by robots and machinery instead of persons.
You can go to some factory where produce some necessites for us.
They are so big and productive that we almost cannot continue our normal life without the products that are produced there.
And in the factory the machinery play a very important role.
If we could not use the machineries any more, how much efforts the workers would pay to get the same effective.
And many researchers are still inventing the robots that consume less energy so our lives could be more comfortable and easier.
Secondly, our society is filled with some electronic products such as mobile phone which is making the life easier.
Take the letter for an example.
In the past, people must wait for a long time to get letter from their family or friends because of the previous way to send letter is not efficient.
But now if we miss a frined who lives far away from us, we can just spend several minutes writing a letter and then press the send icon so the friend can get our mail in a second.
This is what the advanced life brings to us, convinience and comfort.
By using this, we can achieve a same goal but using less resources and efforts than the past.
Lastly, some people may disapprove this because people nawdays must put much effors in edcation so they can feed themselves, which is not comfortable than the past.
But in my opinion, this is surely a comfort.

When our grandparents are children, they need to work on the farm so the family can get enough income to feed the family, but now we can just sit in the room and read books or finish the assignments that professor gives us.
It is surely a comfort.
So the life today is more

An ancient yet effective way of us human learn, from basic values to small life hacks is by experiences, clearly speaking, from past happening.
By extracting the patterns emerged and consequences paid, civilizations are able to advance futher into a better and better future.
Numerous news, that are all kinds of experiences and decisions,  happen every day, providing us information about occurances around the globe.
Some may argue that knowing these is unnessasery, especially if the events are unlikely to affect one's daily life.
Yet it is actually farily needed for everyone for it provides knowledge and make one always prepared
To begin with, knowing about news around the world gives one a large sea of oppotunites to learn lessons that may help with daily life, with school or even with lif and societal choices.
Everyday there's news about wars and conflicts and they often show the results of violence, which are often devastating.

The photos taken at a Middle East conflict battle field, for example, would shock anyone with conscientious and sympathy, they would fear the outcome of violence and the next time there is a vote for weather one's country should go to war, he or she may vote no and the society would be safer all together.
Thus getting to know the events around the world is always educational in some way.
Moreover, just like how the butterfly effect points out, everything is inter-connected in the world.
What seems non-consequencial and non-influential in one's daily life at present may oneday affect one's life greatly.
If one ignores all news, say, about the USA, but suddenly got promoted to work in the USA branch of his or her company?
The lack of information about America would result in the one finding him or herself in cultural shock or being isolated from locals' talks because he/she knows nothing.
In fact, that the one doesn't care about the world would hardly lead to this "promotion" at all.
Oppotunites are there for the ones who are prepared, and prepared ones are unlikely to care nothing about the world.
Nevertheless, knowing too much details can be too time cosuming and need to be avoided.
Knowing the big events and waht matters is enough.
Knowledge itself is defined by experiences and understanding the patterns of the world.
News can be the best source.
Knowing about the world, even if it sees unrelavent at the moment, is important after all.
Whether the children should choose jobs that are pertinent to their parents' jobs is a highly debatable one.
People hold different views when it comes to this topic.

From my perspective, I'm persuaded that choosing the jobs which are related to thier parents' job can make the children have adventages over thir peer and result in a better relationship with their parents.
Firstly, choing the jobs related to that of their parents can make the children more competitive.
Even though parents may not teach their children about their jobs, the situation that children know about what their parents do are not scarce.

So before this kind of children entering this field, their have already know a lot about the field, which means more competitive compared with those who choose the jobs different from that of their parents.
Besides that, after they enter the job afterwards, they can seek their parents for help when they are encoutered with some problems or just want some instructions.
One typical example of this is those famous family company, where children of the manager choose the same occupation as their parents.
The extensive existense of this kind fo company reveal the advantage this kind of job choice bring.
Moreever, this kind of job can bring about a better family relationship.
When the children choose the similar job to their parents when whey grow up, they can talk about what happens during his job in the family.
Because all the family members know about the basic knowledge of the job, it will not be a problem to understand each other, which means plenty of common topic.
One common thing happens in many family is that parents will be worried about the occupation situation or development, which is mainly because they don't understand what your working situation is.
However, such problem will never occur when the children choose the job related to their parents.
In summary, choosing the jobs related to that of parents can make the family realationship more harmonious.

There is no denying the fact that parents should not connect the money and grades, so it is a bad idea for parents to give their children money when they get good grades.
First, just for children, scores are just a reaction during their study time, whether grade is good or not, study could not be a way to get rewards.
Study is a only for students to get improved, and it is of critical significance for students to use to live and work better in the future.
As a result, if a student know what they should get most, they should refuse the money from their parents.

Taking an example, one of my best friends, whose mother once gave his some money because of his good scores, refused the money, and told his mother that study could not be contacted by parents' money, he did not want to get successful in study depending on parents' money.
When a student knows the study is his onw resbonsibility, he will always succeed in study.
On the contary, for parents, they are not supposed to regards the money as a way of couragement.
Money could move everyone's deep heart, and parents could not make the students think study is a way of getting money.
Study is to take resbonsibiity of their own futures.
Meanwhile, giving money could give the students wrong attention when learning, because they will not focus on the money instead of real study.
For example, my father used to told me if I could get a full mark in a math test, he could give me some money to buy whatever I want.
After that, I always wanted what I would buy when getting the money.
Nevertheless, I failed in that test and missed everything.
So it is not helpful for parents to give students money for good scores.
In a word, to give children money for their good mark is not a helpful way for the real students' study.
I don't think offering school-age children money for high grades is a good idea.
The reasons are as follows: First of all, learning is something children should fall in love with sincerely, rather than a thing that should be supported by money or else.
Once getting a lower grade, children tend to become upset  and unconfident about themselves, which will reverse parents' initial intention.
Secondly, getting high grades means getting money, which tends to force children to become a man whose hearts are fully filled with money and aggressive about every success and failure.
In my opinion, it is not a good phenomenon.
Children should grow up with their whole hearts pure and simple.

Thirdly, i think just offering money for children's high remarks is not ennough to make them develop healthily, in addition to it, children should be provided with some candies or else in that they should be told it is not a shame to be a failure, instead it is a shame not to corret themselves and develop themselves.
By doing this, children can grow up physically and mentally healthy.
Last but not least, it is my own experience that tells me that failure is the mother of success and even more important.
It is a normal state to be honored for success and laughed at for failure.
But my mother teaches me that results are not important,instead, the fact that makes me become who i am is more valuable and meaningful.
How to motivate a child to study hard is a common problem that parents face.
Some parents offer their children money for each high grade they get in order to encourage them.
As far as I'm concerned, it is not an ideal way to motivate a child.
At the begining, money is just an extrinsic motivation, which won't last long.
That is what I learn in psychology class.
Think about that, every time a child get a good grade, his parents offers him money.
What if the parents forget to offer the money one time?
The child will be frustrated or even angry, and lose the motivation to dedicate energy and time into academic performance.
Only when the parents continue to offer the money, the child will be willing to study harder.
I also learned that only intrinsic motivation can work in a long period of time.
So the parents should help their child to build up inner confidence and make them feel satisfied and be proud of themselve when getting high mark.
Besides, children will be misguided and form incorrect value of money and effort if they are motivated by money.
In this case, children would have a belief that the reason why they go to school, do the assignments, get involved in academic seminar is just to get high grade and the money offered by parents.
How ridiculous!
It is because study can increase a person's value, enrich his knowlegement, broaden his horizon and position him to contribute to the society and world that people have to learn.
A good grade can be a certification of the effort that a person make.
So the children should know that they study for their career and future, not for the money.
In a nut shell, I don't agree that offering money to a child for each high grade they get is a proper way to motivate children.
From my point of view,I'm firmly oppose that some parents offer their school-age children money for high grade mark they get in school.
First of all,stutying is the main job for the school-age children.
If they get a lot of money to satisfy their desire,they may not highlight their schoolwork.
As a result ,they will get low grades in school and turn not that well-behaved.
Their parents will surely notice this change but they can't realize the reason of it.
If they can't communicate well with their kids ,conflict will show up between their relationship.
Secondly,the children will fail to have a healthy method of storing and using money if they get high amount of money in their pocket.
They won't understand how difficult their parents earn the money.
When they grow up and get into the society,they will find it too much hard to get enough money to satisfy their need in their own life.
Then they can't get finance independent and continue to rely on their old parents who probably get retired.
All this bad situation is due to the high grade money their parents offer them when they are kids.
There is an example to what I have said above.
A girl name Mary got his parents' credit card when she was a primary school student to use.
From then she bought everything she wanted without concearning about the price.
By doing that she made lot of friends.
With time goes on,the things she bought turned from clothes and bags to many luxuries.
Her prents is not  that rich,soon they couldn't offer their daughter's need .
After she spent all the money,she was not possible to understand her parents and they had a big argument.
She moved out angrily to have her own life.
But she was frustrated to find she could hardly make it by herself.
Mary finally know how hard the money can be earned.
th
From my persepective, I think that offering money for high grades is not a good idea.

As it is known to us, the reason why parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade is that they want their children to get better grade so that they might be admitted by famous universities.
But I strongly believe that this behavior may work in a short time, but it won't useful in the long term.
For example,Tony was a middle school student who studied hard enough to get high grades.
In this circomstance, he studied by his own, enjoying the fun of voluntary study.
However, his parents suddenly wanted to pay him money for his good grades.
At the beginning, he was delighted to accept the money, and have another strong inspiration to study hard and get good grades.
Unfortunately, his motive for study was no longer pure as before, because he studied for getting money from his parents.
As time past by, if his parents didn't offer him enough money that Tony expected, Tony would lose the desire for studing hard and getting good grades.
The most harmful thing is that Tony would gradually lose the love for study.
Seeing the disadvantages causing by offering money for children's study, we can draw the conclusion that parents should not offering money for high grade children get in school.

The issue of whether students perform should decide the thechers salary is a highly debatable one.
On the one hand, it can make teacher pay more attention to their quality of education.
On the other hand, it is unfair because of the variety of students.
However, in the ultimate analysis, I contend that teachers pay should not be related to what students perform.
When the teachers salary is according to the students performance, it is unfair for the student who has improved but get a low score.

For example, when a student who had a poor base of math has improved the score from 10 to 59, he has made great effort and his teacher is trying the best to help him, but in the assess system, the student also fails the exam, and the teacher has decreased the salary.
Apparently, it is unfair for a good thacher and the endeavour of a student.

However, if a teacher can hlep a student a lot when she doesn't worry about the pay, it is beneficial for teacher be rewarded with the improvement of students, although the students performance aren't good.
This way is fair for teachers to get paid when the assess system of students performance has deficiency.
Also, there are many kinds of factors have influenced the students behaviors.
The teacher, however, can just help them about 8 hours study in school.
And even sometimes, a lot of students are absent when teacher has prepared the lesson very well.
For example, a student always lies to parents to absent the math lesson.
Although the teacher has persuades the student to listen in class and practice, the student refuses and lies again and again.
Finally,he fails the exam, and the teacher should be punished to get a lower salary.
There is an inequity assessment to lead the teacher hasn't gotten the payment and benefits, when a student doesn't want to learn something and lies to people.
The performance not only decided on teacher's resposibility and skill, but also on what a student's family, attitude, interest, talence and so on.
We can't ignore the advantage of the relation between students behavior and teachers skill, that will encourage teachers to prepare the lessons well.
But, it is better to abandon the assesment, because there are lots of disadvantages to both students and teachers, which make the condition be unfair.
In conclusion, I really disagree with the statement that teachers should be paid for the students perform.
Recently , an interesting question has aroused heated debate among people : should teachers be paid at least as much as business leaders are paid?
Answers vary from person to person.
Some cliam that teachers should not be paid too much.
However, I sand on the opposite side and I firmly believe that teachers are deserve to be paid too much.
Some reasons and examples given below can illustrate my point of view.
First, the job as a teacher is too tired that the teachers deserve to have good salery.
As we all know the teacher should be stay with students whole day and answers so many different questions.
Their brains should be used every moment, it is so tired for person.
Therefore they deserve to get the enough salery.
For example , my sister is a math teacher in the Wuhan NO.1 high school.
And every day she needs to get up in the six o'clock and rush to the school to teach students in the morning class.
And she have sixty five homework needs to check every day.
So many day work she needs to finish that even in the ten p.m. she just on the way home most days.
In this situation, she told me if she do not have salary increase, she would quite, because it is so tired.
Second, it would attract more experience teacher if schools could afford good salary.

A good salary is main point that attract good teacher, and if the school have so many famous teacher who teach many A-level students, the school could take more good students and therefore the school can have a great income.
It is a positive circle.
On the contrary, if one school cannot provide a high salary for their teachers, the experience teacher would lose their motivation to stay in their school.
For example, the Wuhan university is so famous in the whole country because of their high salary for teachers and their outstanding students.
My friend Sam is a good English teacher who have many effective way to teach English words and make students remember it so clearly.
He firstly stand on the Hubei University, but this school did noy pay much attention to him and give little salary.
So he jump to the Wnhan university which have high salary for experience teachers.
To pit it in the nutshell.
Teachers should be paid much, it not only because they deserve it but also because it should attract more good teachers to work in the school.

Nowadays, young people find it difficult to get a great and decent job in the employment market.
So what is the employers pay more attention to?
Some people believe that we are supposed to develop the ability to relate well to people, as this is the magnificent quality in a future job, while I certainly agree with this opinion.

I am a passionate advocate of studying hard in school, because we can get excellent qualifications and ser In the first place, studing hard in school lays a foundation for our excellent qualifications.
As is know to all, it is necessary for everyone to possess impressive job skills, if we want to get a good job.
And the learning process in school definitely plays an indispensable role in the way to finding a decent job.
On the contrary, if we spend too much time on developing the ability to relate well to people, it will be likely that we are fail to pass exams in school, which is that last thing we want.
Madam Curie is a perfect example.
She was known for the discovery of radioactive elements and the owner of two Noble Prizes.
Since she studied so hard in school that she was an expert in her career------chemistry.
She was good at all kinds of properties of elements, which were crucial for her future sucess.
Therefore, a well school learner is inclined to be famous expert in the future.
In addition to that, we are expected to study hard in school to possess the quality of treating everything serious instead of relating well to people.
There exist so many things that do not relate to our job directly in our professional life, but are significant parts of our promotion and other important moments.
We are able to facilitate them, only if we take them seriouly, which can be obtained from our diligent attitude to our job in school.
For instance, my brother, Tom was famous for his diligence and hard- working in his college.
He brought these qualities to his work, arranging his own table logically and orderly, which impressed his boss a lot.
Therefore, he got many chances from his boss to present his talents in public.

So this serious attitude towards studying benefit us to succeed in a future job To put it into a nutshell, studying hard in school can help us get required qualifications and skills and develop a excellent habit of performing everything seriously, which contribute to our future success in our jobs.

As we know,most of time in a person's life is spent on the work.
It seems that people can not live without a job.
And it is a real question how people to organize their schedule.
Some may argue that doing similar tasks all day long is better,while others way think having different types of tasks to do is more satisfying.
In my opinion,I agree with the latter.
Here are some reasons.
Firstly,for workers themselves,doing such varias jobs is one of the best way to avoid becoming tired.
People always easily get bored of something after they keep doing it for a long sequent time without any break or chage,even though they pretty love such things.
Children always fall crazy when they first get their new toys,but after a while,those articles can only be seen in a box,seldom being touched again.
So changing seems essential  to workers whiling doing their job.
What's more ,for managers and boss in the company,it can benefit them when people have different types to do because this way can make the sufficient of workers.
Some people never feel dull while facing different tasks,making them more energetic and desire to finish more.
For example ,in such a situation,I usually think that work will change and desire to do more,always having lots of power.
By the way,although similar tasks means a relatively easier arragement for job,I don't think it is a good a idea.
Imagine a situatuion where lots of workers do the same tasks again and again,seeming having little energy and working like a machine,shouting for a break in their mind.
It is not a good result people want to get.

Nowadays,there are more and more saying that parent should make decisions for the children,because the children do not have enough experiment to make the correct decisions,if they make mistakes,there will be some bad effects on them,which will lead to their failure in their lifves.
But in my opinion,I insist that it is good for children to make mistakes,and they can learn from it,and the reasons are listed as followd.
First,when children make mistakes,there will be a stronger memory.

Beacuse when children make mistakes,they need to find why they fail,they should try another way or correct their mistakes to get success,and in this way,they will learn from it, and the next time when they face the same problem,they will know how to do it,and they will not make the same mistakes again,beacuse they know what they should take care of and how to get rid of it.
But if their parents do not let them to make mistakes,maybe he will make the same mistakes.
Besides,if children have not make any mistakes,they will collapse when they fail.
For example,I have a good friend named July,she is a cute girl and her parents love her very much,they make all the dicisions for her,so she can slove her problem rapidly.
But when she graduate from the junior high school,she have to face the problem by herself,so when she failed in the first exam in the university,she collapsed,she did nothing but crying.
So I think,if she had made mistakes before,she would be more resistent to her failure,and she will try to slove the problem by herselves.
Last but not the least,when children is trying to slove their problems,it is also a good oppotunity for them to cultivate their ablilty of communicate and socialization.

When they try to tackle the barrier,maybe they can not do it by themselves and they have to turn to the another for help,they need to contact with others,and in this process,they should learn how to convey their thought so that the others could understand their problem more comprehensive,and they how the others could be willing to help them.
Only in this way could them gain experience from the problem,and I think it is the ablilties that really worth them to learn.
So that is why I think parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.

Watching movies and televisions is an important means of entertainment of popularity, it's seems to be the choice to kill the night time for the majority of the people.
But movies and televisions' effect on the young people is a controversial topic that aroused continuous discussion.
In my point of view, the negative effects on the way young people behave outweigh the positive ones.
Primarily, some films and TV program's contents will expose the young people to some bad languages.
It is acknowledged that a large amount of movies contains lines of curse words to meet the requirement of being an essential part to tell the story.

But it is the youth that we are talking about, the crowd of man lack of capability to disguise the behavior is appropriate or not, so there is a huge risk that they will likely to imitate the roles in the show and catch up using the bad words, which is a surely impolite deed.
Take my little brother, Ted, a six-year-old boy, as an example, he loves to watch TV during spare time.

After watched some shows and movies with vague rated that includes words without manners, he began to use some inappropriate words in the arguments with families and friends, which is an intolerable behavior.
Thus, the movies and Television shows will do harm to young people's behavior since they will learn the impolite sentences from them.
Another detrimental effect that movies and TV does to the way young people behave is that they might be misguided to commit crimes.
Action movies are commonly the winner among all genres in the movie markets, and there are also plentiful contents about criminal stories on the cable networks.
The youths, mostly without stable mental status and the ability of independent thinking, will easily be obsessed with the violence and other illegal actions they see.

There was a news that a high school student was in prison because he tried to sell drugs after seeing the heated TV show, the Breaking Bad, a show about the drug business, which is a lively supporting evidence that the movies and televisions' contents might do some negative effects on the youths.
To sum up, because of the serious misleading effects they bring, I think movies and television do more harmful effect on the behaviors of young people.

This experiece also encourages me to try my best for everthing I would like    On the other hand, children could also learn financial management advance by getting extral money.
Children could have a totally different attitude money they achieve, comparing with pin money they get directly from parents.
Financial management includes the addition of inflow, the subtraction of outflow and the distribution of money to related purpose.
For example, I want to but a pet dog which deserves one thousand RMB.
I have to accumulate the variation of budget and the acutual cost.
Admittedly, it is clever to offer no money for students to some degrees, because the money could distort the attitudes of children for studies.
However, if the amount of money was relatively proper, this result could not happen.
Do you always do things  you like to do?
If you do, do you think you ignore things that you shoud do?
I always do things I like to do, but I do not think that I spend little time on things I should do.
Therefore, I disagree that people today spend too much time on things they like to do rather than they should do.
There is a couple of specific facets why I think in this way.
Initially, people today spend much time on things they like to do, and most of these things are also things they should do.
Nowadays people have chance to choose works that they like, so they always do things they like to do.
For example, my sister works in a international trade company because she likes speaking English and is willing to have connects with different people.
Her work is to communicate with foreigners, and that is what she likes.
Thereby, she does things she likes to do and enjoy it.
Moreover, today people know how to make things they should do the things they like to do through technology.
For instance, when I was in primary school the first time I had a touch with English, I disliked this foreign language.
However, if I wanted to get good grades, I had to learn it.
I spent this painful time for a lone time until my mother encouraged me to learn English with computer.
I saw a different side of English that our teacher had never shown.
I play fanscinating English games with my mother, and that help me recite words and improve my vocabulary.
After that I regard Engligh as my favorite language.
I do things I like to do.
Taking account of all factors mentioned above, we can safely arrive the conclusion that people spend on things they like to do and also take good care of things they should do.
Nowadays,more and more parents will provide their children with money if they get high grade in school.
Although it does bring about some advantages on children's confidence and proud,the drawbacks it produces are more apparent.
It's true that giving kids some money exerts on some benefits.
It can encourage children to work and study harder in school and get better grades.
In addition, it can also develop children's confidence and make them feel proud about themselves.
As a result, they become more active and competitive on their study.
However,the above-mentioned benefits don't mean that we can turn a blind eye to the disadvantages it brings about.
First,money for high mark can let kids connect study with money in their own mind.
This is really bad for their study.
Next,more money means more parent's expection,and this will give children much pressure on study.
What is more important lies in the fact that money will make the relationship between kids and parents become worse.
If a child much depends on the money that is given by parents,when parents don't meet their needs,they will hate their parents and even steal the money to satisfy themselves.
In conclusion,although giving children money for each high grade does bring some advantages,the drawbacks it exerts on are more obviously.
How to find a better method to encourage children to study harder is a urgent task for each parent to concern about.

There is no denying that the primary responsibility of the government is to improve people's daily lives in any aspect.

However, when terrible economic crisis arrives, the government has to curb some expenditures to maintain the operation of the authorities and provide financial assistance to help people get over the difficulty.

Although library, police and public transportation are vital for civilan's life, I reckon the government is able to save up some money from libraries, bacause both police and public transportation play a crucial role in help the country survive the crisis.
First of all, police is able to ensure the security of the society and appease people's panic mind.
To be specific, economic crisis are supposed to bring about the increase in umemployment, which lead to more people have to find ways to sustain their families.
In this case, some of them are possible to commit crimes such as theft and robbery to earn money, which would cause massive chaos in the cities.
To address the problem, police stations would dispatch officers to tackle the crime and ensure the safety of the residents.
Only in this way, people would retrieve the hope of life gradually and recover from the crisis.
For example, in 1980s, Japan encountered a horrible economic crisis as the depreciation of Japanese currency.
To stablize the society, the government increase the police power to fight with the gangsters who were planning to take advantage of the crisis to gain profit.
As a result, as many crimical organizations were wept out from almost every streets, people gradually regain their resolutions to work hard for a better life without the disturbance of crimes.
Besides, public transportation enables people to save money to confront the economic crisis.
In most cases, the cost of taking public transportation is far less than that of driving private cars.
Furthermore, many families have to morgage or sell their cars to pay their debts.
Under such circumstance, public bus and subway would be the only way to commute.
Imagine if the public transportation is suspended because of lack of fund to maintain, plenty of people are likely to bankrupt or fail to support their family.

For instance, as economic crisis devastrated the US in 2008, California reinforced the expenditure of public transportation, allowing many workers and white collars to release their financial pressure and help them get out of the crisis.
Admittedly, libraries are the center of knowledge and deserve massive investments.
However, libraries have little, if any, positive impact on the recovery of the economic crisis.
Moreover, many citizens are urge to earn money and look for job to make a living.
In other words, most of them are not in the mood for reading novels and newspaper in the library.
Plus, maintaining the present libraries does not require a huge number of expenditures.
As a result, it is feasible to cut down the expendure on the libraries.
To sum up, police and public transportation are too important to recover the economic.

Nowadays,people are always stressed out and everyone is burdened with various difficulties,such as work pressure,study difficulties and financial dilemma.
Therefore,how to relax ourselves in such a quick-pace society has become a hot debate recently.
Some people believe that watching a movie or reading a book is a good way to get refreshed but other people prefer to do physical exercise.
As for me,I would like to choose the former because I think it is better for relaxing than exercise.
The first reason that I make the choose is that among all the entertainment,I like films and books the best.
I am always impressed by the beautiful lines in diffirent kinds of films and the impressive words in novels and poems.
When I feel tired or anxious for daily pressure,I will spend one or two hours watching a movie or reading some stories just for fun and relaxing.
When I really go into the screen,I will forget what I am worried about just now and totally get refreshed.
What is more,enjoying movies and books makes people think nothing but the beautiful stories on the screen or paper and thus their worries can be thrown out of their heart.
While doing exercise,one's brain is blank and filled with nothing and maybe he or she cannot stop to think over the difficulties he or she is faced with,which leads to more and more anxiety.
But by watch or read something,his or her brain and heart are taken up by the moving scenes or some interesting phrases,which exiles all the pressure out.
In addition,some pressure comes from the physical tireness and in this case,it is not a good idea to do some exercise.
Obviously,a film of a interesing book will be much better.
Some people take several hours in commuting and they spare a lot of time and energy on transportation.
For them,when they go back to home after work or study,they have no time and energy to exercise.
But watching a movie or read something is another story.
This kind of relaxing need nothing but one's eyes.
What they need to do is just finding a comfortable position and enjoy the stories!
Even for some special jobs,such as porters,how can you imagine them to spend time doing exercise for refreshment?

For my personal preference,the advantege of watching movies or reading books in reducing pressure and the weakness of exercise in physical condition,I firmly believe that compared with physical exercise,it is better to reduce burden and relax oneself by watching films or reading books.

The issue that whether famous people have more influence on youngesters or senior citizens is highly debatebale.
And the fact is that there are a lot of people support that famous celebrities are more significant to young adult.

One the one hand, celebrities do make a big differnce on young adults life.

As we all konw, many younger people especially teenagers in university or graduates who just step into the society are not really mature, sometimes they are more emotional than rational so that they can not distinguish between rights and wrongs..

That's why choosing a suitable idol is especially crucial.

When we were freshman, she liked Jay Zhou so much that she had known almost everything about Jay Zhou.

Because of the new fassion trend,lots of parents want to help their children to get higher mark by some methods.
Then some parents come up with an idea which is to use the pocket money to enhance children's willing to study well.

Initially,if parents give the money to their children bacause they get high marks,children will have the aspiration to study hard to earn the awards again.

This way can help kids develop more independent.

Money as a reward contributes the relaxation of the children.
Since they study hard and do not have any spare time for the recreation.

Secondly,this new trend can help their children develop a new skill--money management.
Since they have to face the society someday,they need to master this ability for their future lives.
For example,lots of adults do not know the money management,therefore,they lost their money by ventures,deceiving,large consumption and other things.
Hence,this new method can let children manage their money to avoid the things happened that mentioned above.
Eventually,this new method brings lots of advantages to the parents and the students.
For instance,parents do not have to worry about their kids about the study because they will fight for their pocket money.
Simultaneously,the kids can improve their marks and enhance their capability of study.
This new way is a win-win idea.
Not only students can benefit,but also the parents.

As the culture and technology develops, life is become more and more complex and confused.
Some people always bemused in this society and don't know what to do.
So, some people claim that it is essential for young people to have the ability to plan and organize.
As far as I concerned, I strongly believe in this point of view that ability to plan and organize is of great importance for us to live on this complicated world.
Firstly, planning and organized ability can make us effective.
One of the reason for why the modern life is complex is we have more stuff to concern about now.
Don't like ancient people, we have to do more than subsist, plentful activities verify our life.
So we have much stuff to deal with everyday.
Clear plan can manage out life well in order to avoid waste of time.
For example, when I was in junior school, I almost cannot finish my daily homework because there are too many subjects.
What I did to with this is to make a plan for homework.
Like I spend half hour in English, 40 minutes on Math.
After I had my specific plan, I could finish my work well.
So it's apparent that planning and organized ability can improve out effectiveness.
Secondly, emergency can be resolved by our ability to plan and organize.
By the Internet, we can communicate with people easily and instantly, which means we would always meet some occasional situations or emergency.
Sometime even a seccesion of events happen at the same time.
So the ablity to plan and organize is essential to deal that.

To demostrate, once I was in home, my wife called me that her car was out of gas and stopped on the road, and at the sane time, my friend called me that his computer didn't work and wanted me to help.
So I organized it well and eal with both or their problems on time.
So, ability to plan and organize is really essential now.
To conclusion, the ability to plan and organize is essential to our daily life because we need it to effectively cope with daily affair and handle with emergency that we might meet in our life.

The passed two decades have witnessed that our country's economy is booming.
With the accumulating of wealth, a question has aroused our attention among people---should children be praised by money when they perform well in school examinations?
Answers vary from one person to another.
As for me, being a girl who supports the quality-oriented education, I vote for that we should not use money to express our satisfaction and encouragement.
Firstly, children's characters are greatly molded by parents' education methods.

If parents put too much emphasis on their scores on paper and offer economical stimulus to them, it can be inferred that children will regard scores as a vital part in their life and neglect other significant qualities.
That's too partial.
I have read an article written by a professor who graduated from the UCB, in which she wrote that her son did weakly in exams in school but never be blamed for it by parents.

On the contrary, his confidence was well constructed in his childhood, as she often praised her son for some progresses in life, such as being careful when crossing streers, remembering parent's birthdays, and offering help to classmates and so on.
Maybe her son wasn't proficient in any cricullum in school, but he must be a nice guy in the future.
As it is acknowledged that no one can deny the value of study, for only when you can lay a good fundation in school, can you make more progress  in further study and construct your own career.
Nonetheless, it is overemphasized now.
In addition, with little self-discipline and little experience in managing their wealth, children should not be given money as bonus even though they do well in school.
How to deal with money is an abstract lesson which should be paid enough attention to.
It's widely deemed that attaining an unimaginable fortune may be a catastrophe when someone hasn't be prepared quite well for it.
An appalling report I have read from a newspaper said that, the majority of lucky people who won trillions of money from a sudden coincidence have suffered from many disasters.
The reason why they were so depressed now was lack of self-discipline and professional knowledge of managing wealth.
Thus they may go to waste their sudden fortune and buy exessive luxuries which are not necessary  Finally, they were living in despair and poverty, even debt.
Consequencely, I think children should not be given money when they are not mature enough to assigh their money rationally, instead of paying for computer games.
Admittedly, children given money can be rational and have chance to promote an awareness of economy.
Nevertheless, I think it has too many risks that we cannot control well.
In a nutshell, I strongly think we should not use money to express our satisfaction and encouragement.

All parents in the world love their children deeply and look foward to their children's growth and success.
However, how to educate and cultivate our children puzzles many people.
A lot of parents are very likely to misunderstand this kind of love and spoil our children.
I have seen many parents and grandparents spoil and ruin their children by never let them make any mistakes.
In my opinion, making mistakes plays  a significant role in a child's grow.
And as parents, our duty is to lead our children how to learn from making mistakes instead of avoiding them from making mistakes.
I remenber two things in my life tought me the value of making mistake.
First thing happens in my childhood.
At that times, I was about 14 years old and I felt curious about my schoolmates' smoking and drinking.
Then I told my father that I wanted to have a try.
At first my father diagreed my suggestion and said that it was inappropriate for children to  do so.
But I still felt eager to do so.
I wondered."
How does it feel?
It is as cool and comfortable as we see?"
In a evening when I came back home, my father handed me a bottle of wine and a ciga.
He said that I could have a try as long as I did not care about having a terrible lung and a weak stomach in the rest of my life.
Then I drank a little and smoke the ciga, the fact was that I found that it felt not as good as I saw other people do.
And I never try that again from then on.
If my father did not allow me to try to make the mistake, I might go and learn with my schoolmates.
From this experience, I learned that sometimes parents' permission for children to make mistakes cna lead to a good result.
The second thing also happened in that curious age.
I wondered why people cannot steel money.
Then I asked my mother about this question.
She said that it was because you would feel bad about it and it might lead to serious  results.
Then she brought me to one of her friends' store and let me have a try.
I tried to steel one stuff from the store and avoiding being looked by the employees.
I gave up later because during the whole process I felt very terrible and determined to lead a life

As we all know, some parents may use a method to inspire their children to try their best to get a high grade.
And one of the main methods is offering money when they get a high mak.

Some people think that this kind of behavior even though can improve children's grade in some degrees, this can also delivery a abnormal thought to the children that the reason why I have to get a excellent grade is because only if so I can get the money.
I have to admit this circumstance is exist but you can not throw the fault to the specific behavior.
I agree this kind of method.
Let us think about how a eligible parent educates his child.
The most important task of education is to help his child develop its viewponts toward the value and the morality.
Only when a child has good morality and can judge the values of different things can he do the right things and become successful by his own.
We have to believe that such a child is able to know his pursuation and reason of learning.
Under this circumstances, The method that can inspire children's study passion just become a supplement and it will never influenece the children's thought of the reason of study.
They can gain a great grade and gain the money.
So why not do this?
Moreover, I think it is neccessary to let a child have basic ability of the arrangement and management of money.
In China, because of the high pressure of College Entrance Examination, many students occupied them in the endless studying.
It seems that there are nothing in their life without learning.
And the result is they are lack of various ability.
They do not know the knowlegde of art or history and seldom do body exercise.
When they get their living money, they do not know how to use it.
It is ridiculous but this condition truly exist.
To talk about my own experience, in my childhood, when I got a full score, my mom would give me 20 yuan to but some snacks or toys I like.
I enjoyed them so much so I talked to myself: " You can get another full score and buy more things you want."
Yes, I was totally benefited from this method.
All in all, this method can not only improve children's grade but also has few disadvantages.
So why not use it if the effection is actually splendid?

first,giving childrn money as a praise can provide power that to get good grade.

Of course my brother wants to get money,so he works much harder to try to get the high score.

last, this way may also have some drawbacks.

They may create the idea that they only want to fight for the money during their whole life.
All in all, I think giving school-age children money for each high grade truly has many benefits and it really can help the kids to improve them a lot.

But parent always let them have to do these thing.
This is also some reason why there are many bad attitude students now that I think.
If they do not get happy, then they will not follow parent's direction.
Secondly, high grade is depended on forever hard working, it may destroy a child.

My mon and teacher give me less smile because of my grade, they feel disppoint to me, then I also lose my confident for study, after remian of 4 years in my primary school, I can not get the second place of my grade again, and I feel failing.
Thirdly, money has better way for children's healthy and their happiness rather than only on their grade.

For example, my friend called Tom, he has very effective studying ability, but he always get sick or other problem of his healthy, that is because his parents only mind his score rather than his healthy.

And his parent think his unhealthy is beacuse of himself, so I think his grade is not valuable for his healthy, he may not have a long and happiness life in his future, he will consider his health everyday.
He may not finish his hope in his life.
I think this life do not have strong reason for exist.

Some argues that the opinion of celebrities is more important to younger people than old people because the opinion of celebrities lead to fashion, positive attitude or new idea; yet, others propose that the opinion of celebrities is more improtant for old people than younger people.
personally speaker, I am in a favor of the second arguement.

with the developme of the technology and the society competition is becoming more and more serious, many opinion of celebrities were quickly repalced and renew.

As far as I am concerned,this is not a good idea in most circumstances.
For the school-aged children,what they need is very simple.
Just plained clothes,books which are helpful for their mental health,celebrated dinners and so on.
And none of them costs high amount of money.
If parents offer their kids money for high grade mark,the kids may spend the money on many luxury things they don't need at all.
At the same time,they won't know haw hard their parents earn the money they waste.
They may turn more and more wasty.
After they grow up,when their parents can't afford the their needs,they are impossible to get used to it.
Then something bad may happen and their parents will feel regretful for what they have done all those years.
There are several examples of this.
A girl whose parents are just ordinary workers had been spoiled by her parents all the time.
Her parents gave nearly all the money they earned a month to the girl.
She then hanged out with her friends and bought everything she wanted without having a glance of the price.
She took her friends out to dinner in really expensive restaurants so that her friends would like her and more teenagers would love to make friends with her.
She soon became famous in her school and she enjoyed it,but she didn't know her parents were having a difficult time in their life because of her waste of money.
After she growed up,she still liked all those luxries.
But her parents had no more money for her.
She couldn't believe it and had an big argument with her parents.
She could not understand them,and that really upset her parents.
After that,she borrowed more and more money to satisfy her desire and then had no ability to pay back.
She decided to have a suicide.
Luckily,she was rescued by her friends.
From what has been mentioned above,it's not a good idea for parents to offer their kids money for high grade mark.
The school-age children need to be taught about the right way to spend and manage money.

When i watched a TV show, i was confused because workers always do the same jobs everyday.
In my view, this kind of life like workers go through one day again and again.
As i grow up, i accidentally see a quesionare which is researching wether workers are more willing to have different kinds of jobs than have the same jobs everyday.
From my prespective, i prefer the first choice.
To begin with, different types of jobs make employees more efficient.
If they have various tasks every single day, they will hold imagination about what kinds of jobs they would do tomorron.
Moreover, they have more motivation to get things down because they had been expected their works since last night.
As a result, they can work efficiently, which is good for the company to become more outstanding.
Second of all, diversity of jobs can decide wether employees can gain enough knowledges.
The workers are assigned to do different jobs all day long, as we all know, it's unavoidable for them to meet different people because they need to exchange ideas with other members.
Through this, the workers can enrich themselves by learing how to see things from diiferent prespectives or developing critical thinking.
Plus.
they may get to know more about others and then improve their interperson relationships.
It's no denying that doing similar tasks during the workday can make workers become specilists of the area.
But nowadays, companies have biger demand for people who can approxiamently handle every fields.
In my view, going to a company where workers have many types of tasks make it easier for adults to find jobs in the future.
With the ramarkable progress of people's life standard, we have more expectations towards work.

Some people think the most satisfying work is that you can deal with identical tasks all day long until you have a good command of them, while I prefer to acknowledge that only vasellite work can make us satisfied, as they not only give us motivation and inspiration but also compel us to be a generalist.
Above all, well-rounded work gives us inspiration and motivation, since it is unpredictable and makes us feel brand new every day, which can effectively get us out of institutionalization.
When we are exposed to various kinds of work, we can get along with novel things as much frequently as possible and update our skills and knowledge instantly.
Our curiosity is well meeted everyday so that we are much more easily to be satisfied with our work and more difficult to get tired of our job.
On top of that, we are possible to be a generalist by dealing with all types of work.
As we all know, the generalist is proven to be needed by our society now.

whether school-age children can get mony as prize when they do well at school has become a heated debate between peolpe.
Generally speaking, I think offering them money as reward.
it is a wise choice.
Here are my reasons.
First, money can be a good motivation for children.
Since they can gain reward when they get high grade, they will try their best in studying in order to earn poket money.
Namely, when they want to own something new, they will no begging parents with tears and screaming, but to put efforts on their school work.
This not only give them opportunity to buy what they want, but also raise their academic interest.
Second, different from directly giving them gifts parents have chosen already to make them disappointed, money can bring them more selections.
Parents don't  understand what their children really want.
When I was a little girl, my parents offered me a book which only contains black and white pictures.
They thought I will pretty enjoy coloring those well-complete pictures with my crayons, but actually, I didn't like it at all.
I was a creative child, that's why I prefer drawing pictures by myself from initial white sheet instead of coloring other people's work.
If they gave me the money directly, I will rather buy a blank sketch book!
Second, this can help children build right recognition on money.
From paying huge effort on studying to earn money, they will know how their parents working hard to feed the family.
When they feel this feeling as well, they will not waste or use the money so fast than they earn.
So offering money is an educational strategy for children.
According to all I have disscussed above, It is not hard to understand that I agree that offering money to school-age children for their high mark is a good idea.
Recently, there is a heated discussion about the important decisions.
Some people believe that young people today have no influence on the essential decisions that determine the future of society as a whole, because they just determine which job they want to do.
It has nothing to do with the future of society.
However, others hold a dissimilar viewpoint that young people have effect on the important decisions about the future of society.
As for me, I agree with the latter one.
My reasons and examples are listed as follows.
One reason why I am in favor of my perspective is that old people's thoughts have been out of date.
This is because old people's ideas are used until now, but the society needs to progress.
The society needs some new ideas to help it to improve.
A good example of this is a case of my mother's friend.
Once one of my mother's friends wanted to have her own company to research high technology, but she had not studied this knowledge.
She could not do this, but young poeple had studied when they were in school.
They could do it.
Another relevant reason used to support my opinion is that the ideas of young people are more novel and inventive.
This is because young people live in a technologically advanced society, they can know more knowledge than old people.
A good example of this some undergraduates' case.
Now, many students in colleges sponsor some activities that can change the society.
These ideas are created by young people.
Old people just take part in these activities and do something they need to.
According to these reasons given before, I think that young people today have more influence on the significant decisions that determine the future of society as a whole.
The wilderness and wild animals has forever been a part of the human culture, life and soul.
Although some may argue that more land should be developed for economic purposes, I still stand that the wilderness should be protected for the future generation, and also our own.
One should never cut down one's roots.
The wild is the root of humans.
It is where we all come from.
However we might evolve, might grow, we can never change the fact that we come from the wild, and to the wild we shall all go.
Just as history is protected by a nation, the wild should be protected by the human kind.
For the wild is our history that  lives on.
The generation of children now see little enough of the wild, what will happen to it if it continues to fade.
Will they forget where they come from?
How unsettling that will be.
It may lead to ignorance, and the continuous distruction of the environment until Earth is no longer enhabitable.
There is a book called Brave New World, where people have lived in a community completely artificial.
All who have read the book could see how horrid that is.
It is not the future anyone would wish for the generation of tomorrow.
Remebering our roots can let us make better choices for our future.
The wild is where the human body and soul can truly become one.
Many spiritual trips taken in the wilderness.
Like going to Tibetan plateau to live with the monks.
In a simple and natural temple, staring out at the mountains, listening to the soud of raindrops from the windowledge, and humming the ancient rhymes.
Without the sophistication of human society, can one really settle down one's heart, and all that is outside, and focus on what is going inside.
My trip to a remote little town in the mountains taught me that.
Time passes on by, but one does nothing but stare out into the wilde, mysterious sky.
People need that in this fast, and often brainwrecking society.
Governments should protect the wild, if only to keep their citizens sain.
The future generations deserve to have this sort of comfort.
Although it is necessary for the society to expand, and have more resources, but it does not have to come at the price of the wild.

As the resources in the human hands are plenty, I don't seem to see the problem with people trying to expand the resources at hand to the fullest, instead of mindlessly exploting the untouched, sacred, and ever wild land.
May the wild help them make better choices, and be more spiritually connected, and relaxed.
For the better of the future generation, I sincerely hope the government will put in more effort to protect the wild areas and wild animals.

Nowadays more and more parents offer extrem love to their children.
And some parents offer their school-age children money for high grade.
From my perspective, it's not a good idea.
My reasons and examples are as following.
First, there are many ways for parents to praise their children when they get high grade in school.
It's not a good way that offering school-age children money.
School-age children are too young to have the ability to spend those money well.
If they spend those money incorrectly, like spending money on games, it's not good for them study well.
Parents can offer their children something else, such as watching movies, buying them gifts, encouraging.
Also, it's not a good idea that offer money for each high grade.
Parents can offer gifts depending on children's progress in their study.
Besides, high grade is not a standard criterion for awards.
If children have done something that they never did, parents can encourage them.
Admittedly, it's a idea for parents to offer money for high grade their children get in school, but it's not a good idea.
In a nutshell, there are other methods for parents to offer their children and high grade is not equal to awards.
So my opinion is offering school-age children money for high grade is not a good idea.

The author thinks that watching a movie or reading a book can relax us more than by doing physical exercise.
There is no doubt that when we are tired or in fatigue,we can relax us by watching a movie or reading a book.
However,if we are nervous or work a long time,taking physical exercise can be better for us to relax.
On the one hand,for example,when we have done the physical work for a whole day,we are exhausted and tired.
What can make us feel better is to relax our mind.
Under this condition,we can watch a movie or read a book in sofa with a cup of tea or coffee.
In this way,we will concentrate on the contents of the movie or the book so that the bodies' fatigue will be ignored and we will feel relaxed.
On the other hand,what if we are nervous when there will be a exam in next day or work in office for a whole day.
It is quite possible that our minds are out of control,and we cannot stop ourselves to think about the work or study.
Thus,it is better to relax by doing physical exercise under this condition.

During taking physical exercise,we can release pressure of taking the exam or stretch our bodies after sitting in the office for a whole day by using out of our energy so that we have no more vigor to think about them.
To sum up,what we should do first is to know which stage we are in.
After finding out what make us feel not better exactly,we can choose right way to relax us.
Specifically speaking,if we are tired mentally,what we should do is to take some physical exercise to relax our bodise.
Of course,if we are tired physically,we should watch a movie or read a book to relax our mind.

The happineness they give us is much ,but through a long term aspect,they actually are harmful.

Educating chilsren today
Some claim that educating chilren today is more difficult than it was in the past, for children devote a lot of time on cell phone, online games and social network web site.
However, I disagree with this point.
In fact, educating has become easier than before with the advanced technology.
Web is a great source of knowledge, through surfing the internet, children are able to get in touch with a wide range of knowledge.
This is an easier source knowledge than books, for all the thing you need to do is clicking a few words to the serch engine,and then you can get the result.
The internet enhances the spread of knowledge and reduces the cost of getting knowledge.
And make the educating method developed, For on the past, a children may have to sit in the classroom and easily get bored.
With modern technology, you can easily keep the interest of children and make the process of education fun.
Next, today parents and educators could also know better about educating children.
Take my family as example, when my grandparents had my father, their first kid, they admitted it was a difficult task, for they were lack of experience on how to raise and educate a child.
In consquence, they had to explore by themselves.
They told me they did not do well in some perspects.
And they turly did better when they raised my aunt.

However, with today's easy access to knowledge, parents and educators could easily know which way is better for children, for they can share experience with others and grab systemtic knowledge of educating children.
Modern technology turly enhances the quality of educating children.
I have to admit cell phone and online games turly remove children's passion.
However, if this thing don't exist, it doesn't mean they will devote the time to the area which is thought useful by parents.
Children always search for some thing fun, they always tend to enjoy themselves.
You can ban the equipment from his life, but you can not control them to do all you want.
Every coin has two sides, modern technology turly cost children a lot of time, but it also offers new method of educating children.
The key point is not banning the technology, but make it a useful tool of us.
Nowaydays, parents are more willing to send children to a school which focuses more on a well-planned routine.
This routine refers to joing organized activities related to school or sports, and adjusting more time for students to do their homework.
Kids have less time to do what they truly desire.
From my perspective, this is a wrong decision because i think  a child should be allowedto do what he or she wants.
The reasons are as follows.
Firstly, regulating children to do these precisely organized things or spend more time doing homework may lead to the dislike of school and even rebellion.
If children are asked make more efforts with their work and required to participate in activities or sports that they totally dislike, they would definitly be unwilling to do so.
In addition, they lack the knowledge of why they are doing these kind of things, so in their mind, grown-ups never consider their opinion and asks them to do boring things.
This feeling might even cause disobeyment.
For example, my brother was asked to do homework all night long and the only sport he could play was football, which was really famous in his school.
He never liked ball games, but because he never had time to play what he wanted and was always pushed to do homeworks, he always argues with my parents and even thought of quitting school.
Secondly, allowing children to follow their own choices can lead to creativity and success.
When immersed in the things we like, we tend to forget the time and concentrate more on that particular aspect.
Thus with full concetration we are likely to come up with new and fascinating thoughts and ideas, which are innovating and leads to success.
My cousin loves painting and her parents support her dream so they allow her to draw every  day.
Indulged in the use of countless colours, she created a pattern of her own,  her paintings were even sent to an exhibition.
Though the things children are required to do now may be beneficial to their future.
However children may lack their own unique characteristics and personalities.
Due to the fact that they were always asked to do homework and attend the planned activities and sports, they might not have their own interest and hobbies, not to speak their preferences.
They may be the ones who continuously follows the trend, but they may never be the ones who stand out among the crowd.
All in all, I subscribe to the idea that children should be allowed to follow their heart.
By doing so they may enjoy learning and parents don't need to worry about arguements.
Also by becoming a creative person with great personality, they will sure succeed in the future.
I don't think it's a good idea.
