Nowadays parents offering their children money for high grades marks seems normal and has it meaning.
It is a way of reward with can help children gain interest for study and purse hidh grades, which is exactly the goal of their studying.
But I think it is not a good idea.
Reason as follows.
First offering money seems to encourage children's studying , but it can't arouse their real interest for studying.
What push them to study is the happiness of receiving money.
If parents stop offering this, it's hard to say whter they can remain passion for studying.
It can't build the habit of life long study, and not suitble for their afterwards studying life.
What their needs is the real interest for studying.
Only the interesting to studying itself can continue their study to life long.
Many of the scientists come from a poor background, but their interest for study help them conquer the hardness and make a meaning.
Like the case of Chengjingun, who had too little money to maintain his life and died in poverty, it is  his interest to math that assist him to make really amazing discovery.
For the children offered money to study, they can't conquer the hardness when all resourses gone and only study remains, and they can't conquer the hardness and  make real discovery.
So what important is the interest for study itself, not interst for money.
Secong, money award may form a wrong idea for them.
They may gain the idea that what important is the thing that can make them directly happy, like money.
They can't know the happiness when all the hardness conquered and finally know what really matters in life.
With this idea the only study ther superficial part of the subject ,for they have already got what makes them happy, and can't study deeper.
So in my view,money awards only have instant effect, but  is not a suitable way to encourage children to study.

Today, there is a hot topic: whether it is essential for people to know about events which unlikely affect your daily life.
Answers vary from person to person.
Some people think they do not need to receive news which is irrelavant to their daily life.
Contrary to their views comes my opinion that people should know about events occuring from the whole world, even though they had nothing to do people's life.
To begin with, gaining the news from the whole world helps open up people's view.
It is acknowleded that different countries have different cultures, ideas, values and believes, and each one has its own strength and disadvantages.
If people can keep gaining news of other countries' events, they are more likely to have the ability of embracing difference which contributes their views to be more opened.
By contrast, the person who is only willing to receive the events occuring around their daily life could have limited concepts to the world.
It is hard for them to embrace difference, thus they are more likelt to be stubborn.
In this case, they might lose lots of chance of gaining valuable knowledge or interesting things.
Moreover, knowing about other countries events benefits people to live a better life.
It is because people see many kinds of lifestyles from different countries.
There are diverse types of occupation and food and climates in the whole world, so they can find some types of lifestyles which they are eager to have or are suitable in.
In this case, they can totally change their orginal lifestyle and pursue their favorite one.
My aunt's experience is a good case in this point.
When she was young, she liked to see the news of events happening in the whole world.
Her enthusiasm to the animals pushes her to immigrate to Australia, since she found Australian live in harmony with animals.
Now, she lives in her favorite life.
In general, I think it is essential to know about things ocurring the whole world.

Nowadays, with the development of technology and the interaction of different fields, the works need to try different tasks.
Some people contend that this opinion benefits works, and the works could update their minds and adopt the new tasks.
While other disagree this opinion, and claims that it could give the works more perssure.
In my opinion, I agree with the former one.
To begin with, trying different tasks could refresh the workers' minds and stimulate them more creative ideas.
Looking back of some old ironic moive about the big factory era in London.
Many workers must do the same job in the factory whole day.
It is so boring and tiring.
During the working period, the workers almost stop thinking and they just do the same movement unintentionally.
In a long time, they usually are unwilling to thinking, which causes them hard to try a new job in the future.
While, if they are usually offered by different taskes, they must change thier minds fast in order to accomplish different tasks.
In this process, different assignment also could offer creative minds.
In other words, they could use the method from one field to solve the problems in another field.
In addition, offering different tasks could help works adopt the cutting-edge technology and adjust their working arrangement.
To be specific, it could support them more information about different majors or fields.
Taking myself as an example, my major is Geography Information System.
Two years ago, my working experence is simple that I usually collected the geo-information on the internet and made some geography tables.
With the development of big data, I also needed to do some tasks about data analyse.
Though it was very hard and I must learn much revelent knowledge, I found it is very effective way to solve the geographic problems.
In summay, taking different tasks could open people's minds and realize the right working derection.
I admit it is easier to do similar tasks all day long, which costs lower energy.
However, if you are the person, who dose not want to face the problems.
I also recommend you to take different tasks which could help you realize what kind of job is more suitable for you.

I do not agree with the statement that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than relax by doing physical exercise .

As you all know , life lies in motion.
Now let me talk about why relax by doing physical exercise is better.
First , after a whole day working or learning ,you sit so many times and your body is so weak that is not fit for sitting any more.
At that time if you still sit and watch a movie or read a book ,it is bad for your health.
Because you do not change your body's situation and you body will still be tired.
It is running in the opposite direction .
So we should do some exercise which can refresh our body and brain.
Moreover, do physical exercise can make you feel getting in the society.
You can  have communication with some strangers and then you may recive new friendship though doing exercise which may make you feel pleased towards hard life.
There is an example to prove it.
One day ,when i was in primary school, i was so weak in my  math.
In other words , i had many trouble in my math .

Last month, my math teacher, Tony, asked us to accomplish assignement about geometry in groups.
However, some students determined to fulfill the task by themselves.
Later, the students who decided to do assignment performed terriblely.
Neither they found some new ideas to solve the problem, nor they used the primitive way to get the answer.

Well, recently, an interesting question comes out whether a student learn much more effectively than when they are asked to work alone on projects, when teachers assign projects on which students must work together.
Some people may choose to work alone cause they do not want to be distracted.
However, according to what I experienced before, I definitely comply the teachers' order and believe that the teacher is right.
Here are some ideas and example to support my view.
To begin with, teachers may consider that the task is very hard for the individual.
So working in groups may improve the study efficiency.
However, if one decides to do it alone, he or she might not solve the problem and waste much of time with nothing worked out.
For instance, according to the experience before, my teacher Tony, obviously realized that the geometry might be hard for us.
In order to help us accquire much knowledge, he asked us to work together.
Finally, my group succeeded to solve the problem with the help of each other.
In contrast, the students who try to do it alone work out nothing.
Secondly, working together may help us broad our views and exposes us with the new ideas raised by others.
There is no doubt that students need to discuss when they work in group.
Last time, our biology teacher asked us to do a survey in my campus and designed a new way to learn the birds.
My teamate Tom designed an efficient experiment to get the information from the birds and everone is impressed by this experiment.
At last, we got the first prize in the final evaluation.
Clearly, working together could help ones learn a lot.

On the contemporary society, work stress has been more and more heavy.
I heard many news salesman had died due to work extra hours.
It sounds unbelievable but long time work can actually cause danger.
If your boss give you two choices,the one is to work only three days a week for long hours, another is to have a job that you need work five days a week for shorter hours,which will you choose?
I prefer the last one,due to the following reasons.
First,the essential advantage is that work five days for shorter time is better for our health.
You just need finish your work during the five days, so that you will not fell pressure and can make yourself relax.
On the contrary,nothing can be worse than deal with your work within three days.
Just like I mentioned the news before,I had a cousin called Joe who always forget his homework because of other entertainment.
One summer vacation,he addcited in his new video game,so that he fogot his homework before three days of the ending of the vocation.
And then he writed his homework within this three days.
In the end, he finished his homework but also got a heavy fever because at that time he spent too much time on homework so that he did not have any meal.
Second,work at shorter time can  give me more time to concentrate on my work because if I have to finish my work for three days I will spend four days for relaxing.
It is opbviously not good for me to pay more attention on my work,also not efficient.
What's more,I can have more free time eveyday if I choose to work for five days.
I can make good use of the rest of days.
Just like review and cheak my work or do something I prefer to do, just like sports or watch a movie for fun.
According to the reasons  mentioned above, I prefer to work five days a week for shorter hours.

Nowadays works on school has been a topic for many students and it causes a topic that whether the students learn much more effectively than when they are asked to work alone on projects when teachers assign projects on which students must work together.
This divides students into two different camps with opposite opinions, and some students would like to hold the opinion that the students will learn much more effectively when work alone.
However, I prefer working together with others, and there are reasons and examples that can illustrate my opinions.
First and foremost, working with others makes it possible for the students to have more ideas.

To be more specific, when a group of students are discussing a problem, they will come up with different opinions, and then they can think of every ideas and combine them together in order to get a better answer and save time.

In opposition, if students just work alone, they can not come up with so many ideas at the same time and they will spend quite a lot of time in order to get an answer which can be slow and not so efficient.

For example, one of my best friends, who always like to attend group study, said that every time when he is in a group, they can think out so many ideas and they will compare these ideas and select the best one, then in this way they can not only save time, but also get the best answer.
In the second place, with group studying, students get more access to a better method which can help them be more efficiently.

This is because when students study together, if they meet a problem, different people will came up with different solutions, and they can all learn from each other, in this way, they can even learn so many ways just from one question which can help them improve their ability in studying that can help them to be more efficiently.

In opposition, when students work alone, they meet the same trouble, they can not turn to others for help, instead they will spend quite a lot of time for this problem and they may even get the wrong answer that may waste them a lot of time.

Let's take myself as an example, once when I was in a  group, we discuss a math probelm and different people have different methods to solve this, then we begin to discuss every methods and every one can learn so many methods  that can help them improve their ability in math.

Granted, it may be reasonable and attractive that some poeple claim that when teachers assign projects on which students must work together, students will learn more efficiently if they work alone, since when students work alone, they don't have to use the time to dicuss with others which can help them save time and use it to learn more.

However, it can not hold water, since if students don't discuss, they will make mistakes quite often, as a result they will spend even more time to check and revise the mistake which can even waste them more time.
So I am still convinced by my standpoint that students will learn more effectively when work together.

Peole are concerned with how much intervention parents should take to prevent their children from making mistakes.
In my opinion, parents should allow their children to make mistakes and learn from them.
Although many mistakes would have severe consequences, the benefits of making mistakes far outwights its drawbakcs.
There are many benefits of learning from one's experience.
The greaest inventor Edison had made numerous mistakes before he succedded to discover the best material that is suited for the wires of light bulbs.
Making mistakes become the best opportunity for the young generation to discover their mistakes instead of relying on their parents to solve them.
After facing the consequences of certain mistakes, children may realize the importance of making improvements to avoid these mistakes.
One of my classmates in high school used to prepare poorly for exams.
However, his parents didn't take an active role in convincing him to review for exams.
I expected that he wouldn't take actions to compensate for his fault.
I was surprised to know that his manner changed abruptly after the award ceremony.
I could tell that he felt depressed about not earning any distinction, and to earn distinctions became his motivation for studying hard.
As a result, he studied much harder and succeeded in the following tests.
Furthermore, the process of making mistakes helps people to discover their own defects.
It may be favorable for parents to guide their children.
However, this is not beneficial in the long run.
Children have to learn about the causes of these mistakes to better prevent them.
The process of precluding mistakes for children actually disables them to learn about  origins of the mistakes.
An idomatic expression goes "to grant people fish is not as helpful as to teach people how to catch the fish".
Although parents may prevent children from suffering the consequences of mistakes, they may not be able to help thier children if they make such mistakes in the future.
After all, the children have to be independent.
Admittedly, parents can help their children to learn about mistakes.
Parents have broader experience of the society, so that they may predict what kind of mistakes their children may encounter.
In this aspect, parental supports can help their children from making mistakes.
However, the society is constantly chaning, what is applicable to the parent's generation may not be applicable to the children.
Therefore, parents should allow children to explore the world on thier own.
In general, making mistakes is an integral part of the children's growth.
Without it, children may not realize the significance of these mistakes.
They may not know how to stop making them.
Parental control is helpful only when there is room for children to develop thier own approach to experiencing and solving mistakes.
As the world changing rapidly, more and more people can benefit from high developing society.
It seems like people nowadays are much happier than people in the past.
However, personally, I strongly believe that people nowadays are actually less happy with their lives compare to the people in the past.
To begin with, people nowadays have more information to process, which make their lives more exhausting than ever.

Due to the limitation of information transaction, people in the past don't have the chance to know too much about world, their livestyle is simple because they only need to do works base on their current knowledge.
Comparing to them, people nowdays have much more pressure.
Everyday tons of information bombard us and make us revalue everything around us.
For example, a report says the top university is xx and another renowned news paper says otherwise.
True and false information weive together and buffle people.
Unlike people in the past, they could satisfy with going into a university, nowadays people would still unhappy about whether the university they came is the bast one.
More information cause less satisfying with life.
Secondly, people nowadays have more targets which make them less happy.
In the past, the major goal of people is to maintain their lives and only satisfy their basic needs, but in the nowadays society, people seek more than sustain basic needs.
To demostrate, people seek fashion dresses, expensive luxuries and everything could make them feel good.
In fact, lots of them are unnessecery purchasing which bacome burden to nowadays people.
Plus, those fashion stuff change over time.
Today's fashion maybe a coat and tomorrow could be a hat.
People always have more to conern, to persue, so actually they are less satisfied than before.
Finally, quick changing represents people nowadays need to do more work so they can correspond with the world.

In the past people could do work slowly, like a peasant could manage his one arce land regularly for this own life but if he is in the nowadays society, he has to do more work, manage more arces of land and hire more people to help organize the land, or he won't be able to catch the quick changing world and be left out.
Thus, people nowadays are forced to rise their work speed to synchronize with the rapidly changing world.

To put into a nut shell, people nowadays are less happy than people in the past because more information bring them more concerns, they have more persuation to make them happy and they have to do more works or be left out by the quick changing world.

The argument is that group work is much more efficient than working alone.
It may seem reasonable at first glance, however , after a series of dubious holes under different circumstances, it is not founded steadily.
When working alone, one can wholy immersed in his own world, control the pace as it like, thus is often more likely to make a innovative achievement.
On contrast, if many people discuss at the same time, the atmosphere will be nervous or even anxious.
Moreover, if group memebers cannot reach an agreement, there probably will burst a row.
Only after full consideration can people join a discussion, or they may be lead by others, lost his own opinion, which is quite delestrious in people's growth and development.
As for me , one time I didn't search for full information and think deeply, the teacher start a group discussion, and I can only stand , silently.
There is no denying people's opinions varies, we may expand our horizons, while we don't have much knoledge storation.
then the content we discuss may not nuritrious at all, but more like a quarrel.
So why not use this time to catch more knowledge?
When we read thesis, isn't it also a way to discuss with former scholars with abundant experience, and highly improve our effectiveness instead we go further at a wrong road?
Many hard work need to be comlpleted at a quiet atmosphere, like many scientist who make great contributions to the human beings.
They are occupide in a small room alone, and finally get what they want.
If they listened to other's discouragements, then nothing will happen.
To sum up, I contends that working alone is more effective to our students.

Some believe they should do different work during workday, while others believe they should do the same tasks.
Although I have some doubts, I tend to adree with the former, and I will articulate my view below.
First, diverse work can keep persons' mind active.
Every time finishing one kind of task, the workers should change the way to resolve the work.
So, during the change, people have to use their brain to think what kind of solution they can adapt.
If so, it is more efficient for workers to cope with the diverse work.
for instance, a recent survice showed that about 85 persent of people who usually do diverse works can do more work than the persons who always do the same work in the same time.
Besides, it is work skills that different work can bring to individuals.
When individuals always change the task, they will adjust to this way.
And they will accumulate the experience that how to deal with the condition they ever did not confront, which can promote their work sk
Finally, indeed the same tasks is easier to do, people can not improve the career by this way.

As the rapid development of technology, the generation gap bacomes increasingly broad as the youngsters absorb new things very quickly while the old are likely to resistent to accept new technology and new devices.
To narrow the generation gap down, the elderly are supposed to acquire new knowledge by themselves or with the help of their family members.
To start with, learning new stuffs enable the senior citizens to broaden their horizon and make right decisions concerning crucial issues.
To be specific, the old people are likely to be accustomed to their own lifestyle, since they are reluctant to change some outdated concepts in their mind which may lead them to make some mistakes.
In consequence, it is very important to help them step out of their comfort zone and open their eyes.
In this case, they are able to make right decisions with the aid of new knowledge they gain.
On the contrary, if they keep stubborn and unwilling to bring current ideas in their brains, they are possible to make blunders by sticking to some obsolete conceptions and ideas.
My grandfather is a excellent example.
Tracing back to my school age, I was shocked by my grandfather's bad attitude towards my mother.
Influenced by the traditional idea about patriarchy, my grandfather did not allow my mother to dress up nicely, talk aloud when having dinner, and contradict with my father.

However, as we suggest him to watch more TV program about progressive idea about equality and some modern concepts about family, he gradually changed his idea and even apologized to my mother for the previous mistreatment, which could not have happened before.
Besides, the older people can promote relationship with their family members more effectively since they are exposed to the current trends and popular culture that young people love.
To illustrate, most older people would find it hard to communicate with their children and grandchildren because of not knowing the popular objects the children like.

As a result, if the senior can learn what their children like and talk a lot about the cartoon they fall in love with, the children are willing to talk about not only the cartoon but also their school life and daily experience.
On the contrary, the young people don't have to worry about that because they do not have to face the generation gap.
For example, my cousin was always reluctant to link up whith his parents, which makes his parents upset and anxious.
Nevertheless, as they start to watch the television show that my cousin loved named Chinese Talent Show, they begined to coummunicate with their child a lot.
To sum up, the oder need to learn new things becasue they are facing more situation about generation.

In the comtemporary society , few issues have aroused more bitter cntroversy than the one of whether it is a beneficial metod that parents give their children pocket money for having good acadmic performance.
Some hold the idea that this will be harmful to childrens'development assert that it will make kid just study for money ,not for acquiring more knowledge.
It's partly true.
Nevertheless, I still believe that by offering money to good grades help children in one way or another.
First of all, offering money renders children to study in a renewed vigor.
Since their parents promise them that they will get extra money for high grade, they will study harder .
And when they earn the money through his or her hard work , he or she will feel more confident and get a feeling of accomplishment , which is a essential lesson for one's personal development.
Another reason I put special emphasis upon is children will learn to cope with his pr her own financial problem by having the award provided by their parents .
In fact , this is also a important ability for a person since managing your money well will give you a more balenced and happier life .
Admittedly , offering money for students because of their acadmic performance may render the student money-motivated,distorted ones'personal values or even make them only care about money .
However, by appropriately offering money to the children , this bad results will not happened or minimize the possibility.
Considering the merits that it will provide ,the highlight apparently outweigh its drawbacks.

In a nutshell, by rendering students to study in a renewed vigor and help them how to deal with personal finance problems,offering scool-age children for each high grade they get in school is beneficial to the children's development.
The problem whether it is easier for people to be educated well nowadays has provoked widely attention from the mass.
Some people believe that people are able to accept education much easilier than before, while others hold polar opposite view.
As far as I'm concerned, I will go for the former idea for several reasons.
First of all, the device and technology using for education are more advanced than before, which will facilitate our study to some extent.
There is no doubt that our society has witnessed unprecedented development for several decades.
At present, we can turn to high-tech devices, including the computer and smart phone, to study everywhere.
For instance, with the aid of Iphone, I can listen to Eglish record even on the flight, which seems impossible even 20 years ago.
In addition, the advanced transportation system and prosperous economy offer us presious chance to study abroad.
On the contrary, study might be a more complex issue for the people in the past.
They could never turn to any information online when they were confused with a problem on the study material, nor could they sent massege to the teacher whenever they need any help and instruction.
Therefore, the developed world provides people with superior method to approach the summit of knowledge today.
Moreover, the position about the knowledge and education will encourage more people to be knowledgeable.
As is known to all, the development of human being is not only reflect from the ttechnology or economy condition, nut also from the transformation of perspective on the world.
Nowadays, people are enlightened by the theory of educators.
They believe that the world will just be changed by the power of knowledge; thereofer, mre parents start to put more money and energy on their children's education.

They will drive them to participate in more after-class study group, or plan to encourage them to be international students even when they are young, which are common phenomena especailly in some developing counrty.
According to a research conducted by MIT, over half of parents in China write sending their kids to study abroad in their schedule list.
Under this cercumtances, people now are received high quality education than in the past actually.
Admittedly, they are more things especailly some entertainment facilities are devices may interfere students's study now.

However, their parents and school are starting to make srtict rule on them; thereofer, they will avert the influence from them effectively in the future, and they still receive efficient education today.
Take into account all the factors mentioned above, we can arrive at the conclusion easily that people today will be well-education easily.
Not only because the help of the technology, but also the view on the education itself ecouraging more people to learn more valuable things.

There is no doubt that extended family played a vital role in people's daily lives but now whether the importance of them is lower now is controversial.
In my opinion, now they are less siginficant than before.
First of all, now poeple have less time to get on with extended family.

As nowadays people is busier than before, people always work and live in different cities and sometimes only in some crucial festivals will they go back to their homeland and meet their extend family, by which they have fewer chances to stay with the extend family.
For instance, my friend was working in Wuhan but all his relatives living in Shenzhen which is far from his city.
Because of this, it was hard for him to come back to see his relatives and hardly stay with them, as a result, he just had normal relationship with his relatives.
Second, the relationship of friends and working partners now become more and more significant making up much of one's life.

As now every people has their own friends and collegues and many time are used to keep good relationship with those people who can help them in time and play or work with them, which means it will be less time for people to stay with relatives and their importance undoubtfully declines.
to illustrate, I am now working in different city from most of my extended family.
I have to spend lots of time to get on with my colleagus and frineds and because of this I really have a little time to spend on my extended family.
Besides they cannot accompany me but those friends or working partners sttling in the same city as me and they are more crucial for me than those relatives.
On the other hand, though extend family indeed has some virtues, it is not unplaced now.
Grandparents have abundant experience, by which they can give us some practical suggestions to help people.
Cousins are at the same age as people so they can exchange their experience and problems, whcih means they can find another person can well understand them.
To be sure they are still playing a role in people's life, but undoubtfully they now are less important.
All in all, for all these reasons, it is obviously that extended family now is less important than they used to be in the past.

However, I definitely insist that maintaining friendship with a small group of people is of greater significance, and will make me much happier.
To begin with, the friends that make easily usually cannot help us when we are facing difficulties.
With the rapid development of the society, the intention for poeple to make friends become more lucrative than in the past.
Most people want to make friends with someone only because he or she has some specific points that can benefit them, so they use some means to please the person, and they become "friends".
They are good friends when they can make profits on each other, however, when they meet some difficulties or big problems, their "friends" get away from them, even no longer contact them.

On the contrary, a group of people who we always maintain friendship with them, are usually willing to help us when we meet difficulties, because we became friend because we can get real friendship and happiness from them rather than something like money or power.
Just as the saying goes, "A friend in need is a friend indeed", they will contribute themselves to help us because we are real friends and trust worthy.
Moreover, we usually do not need many people understand us well, but a group of people that know about our feelings and what we really want.
We usually meet some problems in our life, and we usually feel not happy, and we usually get the problems solved when we talk to a small group of friends and they help us.

As the development of the society and improvement of people's daily lives, people are facing far more severe environment problems than before, such as massive deforestation, over usage of plastic appliances, and air pollution.
In consequence, the authorities should take actions to reverse the situation.
As to the reduction of air pollution, In my opinion, raising the cost of fuel is not the best method.
First of all, strict policy to restrain the output of pollutant is a far better option.
To be specific, one of the biggest factors of the serious air pollution at present is the large amount of waste gas expelled by the factory.
As a result, the government should cut out the main source of the pollution by forcing strict policy that restrain the amount of output of pollutant.
In this way, as less toxic gas is released to the open air, the air pollution would be reduced effectively.
For example, Beijing, the capital of China, was notorious for this bad air quality about ten years ago.
At that time, the sky looked grey and people can hardly recognize each other within five meters in the street because of the dense haze caused by the air pollution.

However, as the government passed the law to reduce the released gas, such as sulfur dioxide and carbon dioxide, in the adjacent regions, the sky gradually turned blue and clear, and the residents no longer need a mask to protect themselves from the haze and air pollution.
Besides, the authorities should encourage people and administrations to plant more trees and recover the forests to combat with the air pollution.
To illustrate, trees are able to inhale carbon dioxide, dust, and other toxic gas, which may leads to many severe dieases.
Furthermore, trees release oxygen, which can refresh the air and make people feel more comfortable.
For instance, there were massive construction around my community, which resulted in severe air pollution because of the quantaties of dust and particle that generated in the process of construciton.

To improve the air quality in the neighborhood, almost every member of the community participate in the planting activities, which brought about huge increase in the rate of vegetaion converage, allowing the air quality became as fresh as usual.
Admiittedly, raising the cost of fuel may lead to some positive impact on the air quality, however, it would bring about people's complain, since people have to pay extra money on the gasonline.
As a consequence, they may feel annoying about enviromental protection, which would cause further obstacle in the future.
To sum up, apart from rasing the cost of fuel, both strict policy and planting more trees are more effective methods to reduce air pollution.

I don't agree with the idea of saying it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than relaxing by doing physical exercise.
First of all, while we are watching a movie or reading a book, we are still getting information, actually, our brains are still working.
Because we need to follow the develop of the story, thinking about what was going on, remember the relationship between characters, that may make us more tired instead of making us more relax.
And, when we are doing physical exercise, we don't have to use our brain, we are just doing some body moves, which could give us more relax on our brain.
Then, doing physical exercise could make our bodies healthier.

When we are doing physical exercise, we are exercising the muscles of our body, and help with our circulatory system, if we just lay there and watching a movie or reading a book, our whole body function will slow down, and most people want to eat while they are watching a movie, also most of the food they eat during a movie are not that healthy, mostly are sweets and junk food, and people could easily gain weight.
At last, doing exercise could also help get more close with friends or make more friends.
When we want to relax by exercising, we can go hiking with some of our friends, and while we are hiking, we can chat with each other, bring everybody closer.
On our way, we will meet lots of people maybe are hiking or walking their dogs as well, it would be nice to communicate with them and make friends with them.
Even when we go to a gym, there usually lots of people in the gym, we can also make friends through that way.
But watching a movie and reading a book need quiet environment.
Even we watch a movie with friends, we barely have a chance to talk with each other during the movie, which gained less communication than going on a hiking or doing some other exercise with friends.
Above all, I don't agree that relax by watching a movie or reading a book is better that relaxing by doing physical exercise.
With the fast-changing development of world and society, there exist numerous events happened everyday, especially social and political events.
As teachers are people who communicate with and guide students every single day, it is obvious that their opinions are crucial for students.
Therefore, some people believe that teachers are supposed to let their students know their social or political views.
However, I do not agree with this statement, for this kind of behavior is certainly affects the quality of teaching and misleads students.
In the first place, making their opinions about society and politics known by students is going to lead to a decrease of teaching quality.
The main job for teachers is to help kids familiar with knowledge they are supposed to learn instead of useless social and political opinions.

For example, my math teacher in high school was capable of teaching but had a habit of speeching in front of us and telling us his opinion about current social or political views, which totally did  harm to our study.
In spite of the fact that he made a lot fun for us, we were sick of him talking constantly about his boring and rigid opinoins.
In addition to that, it is likely that the views of teachers of social and political events are going to misguide students.

Since students in high school or university are still in the process of observing and thinking rules and principles of the world, they are probably willing to take their teachers' views as references even rules, which is inclined to make some tragdies.

It is reported that a student in a college in Beijing learned a dramatically radical political opinion from his history professor, which resulted in that this student came up with untolerent opinion about one serious current event and got himself in prison eventually.

To put it into a nutshell, teachers are suppose to foucs on their major job instead of making their social or political views known to students, because students are too young to learn the right opinion.

These are my reasons.

So you wouldn't have enough time to sleep in these three days, so you wouldn't work in these three days so efficiently, so the working time is longer.
You can see, this strategy will make you into a vicious circle.
But the second strategy would not have this problem.
So I prefer this strategy.
Second, although the second strategy will let you work for another two days, but the total amount of work is never go up and down, so you can work for less amount easily every day.

For example, the teachers in the school would like the second strateg,y, because if teachers have 1 class everyday for 5 days, they will have time to do their things, but if they work for 3 days, they could not say any word.
Third, if you have rest for 4 days, you would play games, go out for visting or having fun, and then you couldn not adjust the state of you so quickly, so you could not work so efficiently.
But if you choose the second strategy, you wouldn't have this kind of problems.
So, that's why I prefer to the second strategy.

Nowadays, some parents are used to offer their school-age children money for each high grade or mark they get in school.
Some children even ask their parents to do so.
The higher grade or mark they get, the more money they can get.
In fact, in my opinion, this is truly a bad behavior, both to the parents and to their children.
Now it's time to stop it!
First, this can easily lead to cheat during the exams.
If the children know that grade is equalle to money, they will sure try their best do get a high mark.
That is OK because still they are trying to get repaid by their own efforts.
But when the exam is really difficult, what will they do?
If they know that everybody feels that it's too difficult, still nothing will happen.
The problem is that during the exam they don't know how other students feel.
They will only get stressed out as they think money is away this time.
So if you were a student, what would you do?
To be honest without money, or try to cheat to get the money?
As a kid, most of them don't eactly know what's correct and what's wrong.
Then how can you expect that they won't cheat?
Second, it's not doing anything good to anybody.
If parents pay for the grade their kids get, the kids will sure think that they're study for their parents or anybody else except for themselves.
That's bad for their development.
They will always think that they are forced to do these things.
If they can't realize that study is their own things, they will never be pleased to learn.
When parents can not be with them or can not pay them enough money, for sure they won't study anything.
When these kids become adults, how you can expect them to be scientist?
If there is no scientists in our society, how can the society develop?
So it's time to stop this.
If your children ask you to do so, you should let them know it's not correct.
We are adults and we should do something to make our society better.

In universities, taking some curriculum is mandatory for students, and some people claim that studying history courses should be also required for all the students.
However, as far as I am concerned, this proposal is not reasonable.
My reasons and examples are listed as follows.
First and foremost, taking extra history courses will increase students' burden.
Today, students in colleges need to deal with a large quantity of tasks in their own majors.
If they are enforced to take history courses at the same time, they may lose the chance to relax and feel stressed out.
My own experience can be a salient example for this point.
I am a student majoring in biology.
In my daily lives, what I have to complete are lots of assingments from various subjects and experiments in my laboratory.
Only after my work every evening can I obtain the opportunity to listen to my favorite music or chat with my friends to relieve my pressure.
If I was also required to handle the content in my history courses, it would deprive my last chance to rest and relax.
What's more, compelling students to study the subject that is not relevant to theri major is unfair for them.
That is because except our professional courses, we are supposed to have the right to choose what we want to learn according to our own interest.
I have a case to aptly illustrate my point.
I major in biology, while in my spare time, I prefer to learn some instrument in the student recreation center.
Those elegant melodies enable me to refresh my mind and I can also share my feeling about music with my friends,which is enjoyable and meaningful for me.
Thus, I do not want school to ask me spend my time to learn that I am not Interested in.
I

I hold the opinion  that if workers can have lots types of tasks to do rather than doing the repetitive work all day long , they  will be more satisfied with their job.
A great advantage of doing different tasks is that those workers would not feel tedious.
Because they will constantly face different situations, they have to adapt to them therefore it helps to develop their potential.
Thus the challenging and highly demanding job can let the employees feel interseting.
With this kind of circumstance, they will work hard to improve their abilities.
On the contrary, what will happen if workers work all day long with the same task?
They certainly have alreadly mastered that repetitive job,so they do not need to think or creat.

This work pattern seems like robots and i do not think that  any workers are willing to do this kind of jobs in the long run because anyone can simply replace him or her, they cannnot learn any thing in a position in which are full of boring single tasks.
Here is a example. a friend of mine owns a factory which producing tools.
In the first, in order to improve the efficiency, he assigned  just one task to his workers.
However, after several months, he received a lot of complaints from his employees who all think their jobs deter their chances of learning other knowledge and improving their abilities.

Later, my friend reduce the total workload and assigned more tyoes of tasks to each workers, in this way, those workers feel like they are being the improtant part of the company and they have shouldered  more and more responsibility.
They are also delighted that they can have a bigger platform to cultivate and show their abilities.
In summary, i totally agree with the idea of giving workers more types of tasks to do.
By doing this, those workers would have more chances to develop themselves.
Thus they will be more satisfied with their jobs.
People always travel either in their native country or on abroad.
I believe that you always have seen the lack of a tour guide in other country because the blooming of tourism.
Besides, you can also see the people who have been to other country knows more than others.
How this happen?
Is it just because that people think travel to other country can offer them more fun?
I don't think so.
The reason can be like this.
People will benefit more when they travel to foreign countries.
First, this traveling experience can provide them with a great view of some new thing, and this can open their eyes.
For example, as we all know, Ma yun didn't creat his company called Alibaba until he has travelled to America.
Because of what he has seen in Sicolon Valley,  he found the potenial of Internet.
And he thought the Internet will finally change people 's lifestyle and improve the world.
I don't think he can just came up with this great idea if he didn't travel to the US.
It's the travelling experience that played an important role in his creation of the Alibaba.
Secondary, by travelling to foreign country, we will experience different cultures since people in different countries have distinct ways of living.
And then, we can learn some advantages from them.
Take Japan for example, Japan has been invaded by some western countries.
And people in Japan wanted to truly know why the western countries were stronger than Japan.
Then, they realuzed that the mechanism that western uesd to ru their country is more effcicent.
And the culture there are more scientic than theirs.
So they decided to learn form these countruies.
Now you can still find many common points in the culture of western countries and Japan.
And that's why the Japan could become one of the strongest countries in the world quickly.
Last, travelling to another sountry will provide a perfect opportunity for you to learn a foreign lanuage.
For instance, I believe that English is learned by most people in our country.
But many people cannot speak English fluently at present.
And why.
Probably, they lack a native atomsphere to speak English.
And travelling to an English country can offer them this environment which will be greatly helpful to their spoken English.

I don't assume that awarding children for their high grade with money is a good idea.
There are some reasons accounting for my view.
First of all, it's not helpful to help chidren have a proper definition of study.
They may naturally relate study with exams and grades instead of knowlege, skills and virtures that are more necessary, thus becoming students who may have good grades but lacks abilities.
Additionally, the behavior is likely to destroy the fun of study.
As what has been found, when the encouragement from the outside is too much, the inner interest can be replaced.
That is to say that a child may feel the happiness during study at the beginning,however, with the money given for the high grades,they start to study for money.
If one day they can not get money for study anymore,they will not find the happiness they feel and lose the interest in learing.
What's more, their attitude towards money can be influensed as well.
They have the impression that they should do most things for getting more money and they can get others do anything as long as they pay for it.

From my perspective, I will feel more satisfied when I have many different types of tasks to do, because I will develope the skills of facing different problems and have more fun during the work.
The specific reasons are mentioned below.
Doing many different work means different kinds of challenge, so I can improve myself a lot.
Just make some similar work easily is useless for my life and I can get nothing.
But things will be changed if I choose the formor one.
Take my mother as an exmple.
My mither had once tell me her own story that when she worked in the office, she just do some easy and same work to kill the time.
At last, what she got is just a little money.
But her young time is also passed.
She got nothing other skills.
She felt really regret and hope me not to copy her boring life.
After I heard my mother's own story, I tell myself the more I pay, the more I will get.
Thus, I cannot try to choose easy work to waste my young time.
What I shoud do is to challenge mysely and get some skills about how to solve different problems in my life.
Only do this I will feel satisfied about my life.
Young time is the time to chase.

But if I do the same work, I will feel extremely boring everyday and even get some mental illness.

When I heard this, I know that if a person's life do not have any challenge, this person will never succeed at last and will also become desperate about life.

We will get to know how to solve the challenge soberly and finish them excellently.
Also, our life will become more bright and satisfied.
So why not try to choose different types of work to improve both our life and ourselves.
Nowadays, the opportunities for people are abundant.
So if someone have the opportunity to get a secure job, some people may considers to wait for a job that would be more satisfying.
However, I believe he or she should take it right away.
And I have several reasons to back up my idea.
First, even though the job is not so satisfying, we can gain experience from that job, which might be helpful to future career.
As a saying goes" no pain no gains".
If we just stay at home and wait for another job that would be more satisfying, we would have nothing at that period.
To illustrate, there are two candidates whose acedemic ability are equally excellent.
However, the first candidate did not have working experience but the second has.
So when they started to become intership.
The first candidate could not deal the relationship among his leaders and himself, since his talking makes those leaders uncomfortable always.
But the second candidate knew the difference between talking to the leaders and workmates because he worked as a waiter before, and he knew how to deal with the conflicts.
Therefore, the second candidate acquired most of the staff's recommendation to become a formal staff.
So the experience is really necessary.
In addition, we might be not so satisfactory to that job at first place, gradually we might love that job.
Take myself as an example.
I did not like to stay with youth, because I thought they were noisy, boring and naive.
However, I accepted the opportunity to work in a kindergarten, since the salary is high.
I played with those kids even though the games were boring, and I taught those children to finish homework even if they were noisy.
Gradually, I found they were really cute and I love to stay with them since they were not so somplicated as an adult.
And I found myself become younger than before.
So I believe people should try those job even you thought it is not so interesting.
Granted, taking a job which is less satisfying might waste of time.
However, I think there is no definition of satisfying.
Since the desiration of people is endless, we do not know what kind of job is the most satisfying job to us.
Maybe this job is exhausted, the salary of that job is too low.
We should figure out the advantage of doing that job, like it is happy otr relac.
On the contrary, if we just stay at home and wait the best job to come, there is no beneifit to us.
So what will you choose next if you have an opportunity to have a secure job but that is not so satisfaying?

Nowadays, there are a large number of parents who offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
This is in heated discussion, since most of us don't know whether it's actually beneficial to children.
Although many people are not in favor of the behavior, I firmly believe that it's a quite effective method to teach children about the meaning of working hard and how to manage their own belongings.
To begin with, it priovides an excellent way to help their kids know why one is supposed to work hard to pursue a better development.
To be specific, a kid will know that it will pay back if he work hard and make a great output by getting a certain amount of money.
For example, my cousin's parents always award him money when he get a nice grade.
My cousin is encouraged by this little award and work harder than before.
He is not greedy, instead he is just affected by the achievement he got.
The money symbolizes good performance to him rather a bonus.
Therefore, I strongly support the opinion that a little award is of great significance.
Furthermore,many childern will learn how to manage their own belongings in this way.
The money just like their salaries.
It means they could decide how to spend it and where to spend it.
To illustrate,my uncle once worried about the issue that it  may be difficult to teach his child how to manage money reasonably.
After considerate thinking, he deided to take the method presented above.
Luckily, it received a perfect achievement.
My cousin has known how to spend money on appropriate things nowadays,which makes my uncle very pleasant.
It's true that the idea may cause some negetive effects on children including not value the process.
However,such effects could be avoided by considerate planning and instruction.
Above all,there is no method that could always result in expected results.
Now that the idea could bring the benefits above, I firmly in favor of it.

With the development of  modern society, an issue about who should help their communities has been heatedly discussed.
Is it more beneficial to require young people to spend time on helping their communities.
Or is it beneficial to let others do this.
Tough I cannot deny that young people should try to contribute to their communities, I strongly in favor of the piont that young people nowadays do not give enough time for helpong communities.
My primary reason is that young people, especially students, are too busy to help their communities.
The modern sociey is replete with high competition.
If students do not have required knowledge and skills, they will not be competitve enough, which means they might not gain great achievements in their future career.
Therefore students should try their best to equip them with knowledge and techiques, including spending too much time on their communities.
For example, I used to help people look after their gardens in my community when I was in my high school, from which I received  pleasure and contentment.
However, too much focus on helping the community distracted me from study.
Eventually, I failed my chemistry and mathematics in the final exams.
The staggering experience is proof enough for students not spending too much time on their communities.
An equal essential factor is that more contributions should be done by adults instead of the young.
Children are too young and less experience, who can hardly help communities too much.
On the contrary, adults have experienced a lot and they are more mature and skillful, thus helping the communities to develop from a larger aspect.
This point can be proved by the example of my uncle.
He is a worker whose job is to deal with the pipe.
Once  the pipe of my neighbour broke.
I had not idea about how to solve that problem because I didn't have the required knowledge.
However, my uncle only spent 1hour on working this out.
So adult are more efficient to help the community.
Admittedly, young people have many vacations in summer and spring.
However, they had better to use it for addition study in order to achieve high grades in class, which better prepared them for future career.

Judging from all the evidence provided above, we can confidently arrive at the conclusion that young peole do not give enough time to help their communities, not only because they are too busy, but also they can be replaced by adults in helping the community.

Nowadays, there is a heated discussion regarding what you would you if the teacher or meeting leader says something incorrect in your opinion.
Attitudes toward this issue may vary from individual from individual.
Somebody thinks it's better to interrupt and correct the mistake immediately and someone else might inclined to ignore the mistake and keep silence.
Personally, I strongly believe that the best solution is wating till the assamble is done and and point the mistake out privately.
To begin with, wait until the meeting is over then point mistake out privately can avoid misunderstanding.
As someone states a point that you don't agree with, this is might not his mistake but you have something don't understand and mislead you to consider his opinion is incorrect.
No one can make true he or she is correct all the times.
So, sometimes is not the leader says something ridiculously, instead, we are the one with wrong prespective.
Point out immediately would probably embarrass ourselves.

To demostrate, once I was in a meeting, the group leader was presenting a loop code for our Internet system, but I found somewhere is wierd so I put up my hands and point it out immediately, but unfortunately, he used a quite different and much more efficent algorithm that I don't know.
I felt very awkward and dare not to say anything in the rest of the meeting.
If I didn't act in such a pushy way and discuss it after the meeting, I wouldn't feel so bad and I can really learn from this algorithm.
Secondly, wait until the assamble is done then point mistake out privately is better for the leader.
In many cases, leader do have mistakes even some are very tiny.
However, lots of small mistakes would lead to horrible damge.
So it's necessary and obligated for us to tell the mistakes.
Furthermore, pointing the mistake out immediately on the meeting is not a smart move because that would embarass the leader even this behavior is right.
So obiviously the best option in this situation is to tell the mistake after the meeting and the people are gone, it's a wise tactic.
To put into a nutshell, to avoid making misunderstanding or embarass the leader.
The best way to cope with leader's mistake during to meeting is pointing it to him or her after the meeting is done and people are gone.

let's think about when we were young, before kindergarten, did our parents tell us to listen to teacher in kindergarten?
I think  most of us were told that at that time.
So when we were in kindergartens, we will focus on what teacher said and did and just copied them.
In addition, because of many reason, such as culture, media and many other things.
We always think teacher is elder people, we should respect them and they are great.

But as people become older, people's brain become more and more complex and specific.
People become their own style of their behavior.
And we know that teacher is just a job, not anything other.
We would hardly to copy teacher's behavior.
What's more, after 18 years old, we would in the university.
In this situation, we would be told to do some research.
We know that research need hypothesis and methods.
What teachers can tell you is just methods, especially past methods.
Our thinking are more relying on our life and experience, which is more influenced by our friends.
So because of these reasons, after 18 years old, we will become more independence and we will have our own life circle.
Main influence to our may come from the circle, in which there are no our teachers.
So I think people are more influenced by their teachers than by their friends when they were young.
But as they grow up until 18 years old, they may be more influenced by their friends than by their teachers.
When I was in high school, my teacher always let us finish our homework without internet.
In contrast, nowadays many professor let their students to search references and upload their works through the internet.
This comparison leads me to think whether the government should provide free internet connection all over the world since internet is really a big deal in the contemporary society.
Personally, I think it's not wise to provide this sevice to the public.
First of all, for those workers, internet can be harmful to their health.
As a authoritative reporter stated, nowadays many young people uses internet seven, or even eight hours a day, which is a huge amount of time.
As we all know, staring at the computers' screen is crucially harmful to eyes.
As a result, if the government provide free internet connection to the public, young workers will be able to use free wifi everyday without paying anything instead of their health.
Consequently, there will be more people have diminution of eyesight because they cannot prevent themselves from keeping using the internet.
Moreover, free wifi also do harm to the teenagers.
As you can imagine, young kids cannot control themselves.
If they are free to using internet all the time without rules, they are more likely to watch TV, play computer games, or read comics by th internet connection.
So they will be keep focusing these things rather than what they have to learn and are less and less able to pay attention to their curriculum.
Actually, free internet sevice has positive impact on the public.
Many people cannot have internet connection and they maybe miss some important message comes from their relatives or employer.
Therefore, they may lose a relationship or a job.
However, the negetive impact is more important.
Free wifi may causes the government a large amout of money which should be used to build cities' facilities.
And this leads to a result that those cities' equipment cannot be repaired just in time.

Do you thinks always telling truth is a right things?
Will you sometimes make some lies because of special situations?
From my perspective, I think always telling the truth is not the most important considerations in any relationship between people.
A kind lie can really help to recover some relationship actually in some certain conditions.
Take mself, the only children of my family, as an example to illustrate my own point of view.
Once upon a time, my family readily enjoyed my parents' birthday party with a lot of friends.
But unfortunately, I felt really stressed because of the difficult assignments given by my teachers and peer pressures from my classmates.
Thus, my mood fell down in a high speed and even want to cry when I was alone and get really low grades also .
However, I expressed nothing on my face and sang with my parents happily.
When they asked the recent study condition of me, the responces of me were always positive.

What I think is that in oder to have a positive atmosphere in my parents birthday party and not destroy their mood, I choose to tell a kind lie at that moment to build a more intimate relationship between my parents and I.
But at the second day, I told the truth to my parents and they said to me" you are a really good girl and in order to give us a happy night, you endure the stress by yourself.
Thanks to your lies, we love you forever!"
I felt really surprised of my parents suddenly expression of love to me.
And I really realize the importance of not always teeling truth in some certaion situation.

Always telling truth is indeed a significant consideration in any relationship to show a kind of honesty; however, this is not the most important and there are some other things should be highly regarded.
Zhutin, a Chinese volleyball palyer, is a typical instance to support this.

In his own autobiography, she says that mutal trust between any relationship is more important, which means if two people really trust each other, they will not haggle over every ounce and even suspend reliability of each other's langauge, and they will do is to trust others mind and understand each other if they need to conceal something which can not be told.
If you can trust each other forever, this realation can be preserved and is worth proteting in the rest of life.

In summary, telling a kind lie should be regarded an essential way to help strengthen any relationship and trusting each other is the most important consideration in any relationship rather than always telling truth.

As we all know, the pace of changing of the world accelerates.
A marjority of people feel that it is difficult to keep the pace of the world.
And peple are become less happier than a decade or two decades before.
While some people holds that quick changes are tolerable, some other people disagree.
From my point of view, I tend to approve the latter.
To adjust for the quick change of the world, many poele have missed many great moments and experience in life.
To start with, the slow pace of life gives people more time and space to feel the little happiness in life.
Most of people spend their time on making money.
They pursue high quality of life which is based on money.
Thus they work from early morning to late night.
Except for sleeping and eating, they have their all time spent on obtain more fortune.
These people gradully forget that there are much more improtant things outweighing more than work.
They are less happier than those who pay their attention on living rather than earning a living.
Secondly, the rate of suicice inceases in recent years.
The main reason lies on the high pressure from life which originates from fast changing of life.
What values in human's life are love and the ability to love.
Fast changing makes people feel more about the unstability of life, which indirectly cause them lose faith of life.
Without faith, the significance of life for them is vacant.
They lose interests to live, which may result in their suicide.
To conlude, the point that fast change and quick pace of life make people beome more unsatisfied and unhappier is ture.
Consequently, we should learn how to overcome difficulties in life and to keep in faith about life.
There is always such a word that some persons are born to be leaders, which means that if you are not a born leader, you would never have cross with being a leader.
However, the leadership is a kind of skil rather than talent from my point of view, something definitely can be learnt by all of us.
I attribute the statement to two general aspects, character and skills.
As one can say, the leaders around us are almost outgoing and determined men in their great genes.
The fact is true but not reason.
It's undoubtedly a truth that we are born with our unique characters that cannot be changed easily.
But it is never the reason for a person's leadership.

Taking the famale leaders as an exmple, totally with no offence, it could be a general fact that famale is the humbler gender and they are destined to be afraid of speaking for themselves or their people.
And famale is the more emotive one, which makes them much inferior.
But the fact of human history goes against this statement or these thoughts.
The situation is that we do have famale leaders in politics and all kinds of business, and they are doing the same things as male ones, or even better.
The other point is about skills which would just explain why our humble and emotive women can lead us.
The skills of leadership consists of two important parts.
The first one is recognition of oneself.
Only we recognize which kind of persons we are can we find the right direction.
For those women leaders above, they definitely have a clear idea about their pros and cons.
And the they come to the second part of change.
As one knows himself and what he wants to be, it's  the courage of change pulls the trigger and wise plans of change makes sure that he will hit the goal strongly and confidently.
To have a conclusion, I do not agree with the statement of born leadership for the character of us and changes mede by us.
As lond as one have the recognition, courage and trategy, he can be a leader.

In the recent decade, regular physical exercise has become a prevailing trend all over the word, especially in large and prosperous cities.
People take on jogging, yoga or even some very fierece and labor-demanding activities to let off steam.
However, I believe that watching a movie or reading a book is more desirable a way for us to take a break.
Those who make exercise a regular part of their lives are mainly college students and white-collars.
For them, time is so precious that they have to take in information all the time; otherwise they cannot catch up with the social pace.

In this sense, reading an informative book or watching a meaningful movie seems more reasonable as not only does it offer us valuable information we are badly in need of, but it helps us to learn something even in the process of taking exercise.
Another evidence for my viewpoint lies in the fact that plenty of people, when taking exercises, tend to hurt themselves.
A number of people only take exercises to follow the fashion.
They are not aware of the points they shoud pay attention to during the exercise.
For instance, although jogging is a much favored activitiy, few know that our knees might get hurt if we did not accomplish the warming up activities properly.
Some of the injuries are simply irrevocable and incurable.
Comparatively, a light reading or an episode of film clips is a much better choice as it does not hurt us easily, nor does it make us feel exhausted after the exercise.
Anyhow, it is hard to deny the advantages contained in the sporting exercise.
After all, a strong body is the guarantee of a successful future.
However, it is my opinion that the importance of physical exercise ought not be over-rated.
Not every member of the society needs intensive exercise.
More often than not, to wind down by doing some reading or watching some TV is a more rational alternative.
I don't agree that it's better to relax by watching a movie than relax by doing physical exercis.
In my opinion, relaxing myself is one thing that put off my mind.
However, I can't get any rest from watching a movie or reading a book.
Doing physical exercise maybe causes person feeling tired, but at the same time it also make people put off their minds.
After studying for a long time or coding over the whole night, I would like to go out and have light sports with my friends.
Then we usually take a shower and talk about something that happened recently in our university.
While I am doing some sports like badminton, I feel my fat is discreasing.
The physical exercise also can keep a good body.
I don't need another activity to keep the balance of my health.
I can have a perfect nap after my exercising which can bring me better life quality.

Today, there is a debate whether students could study effectively when they work with other students together or when they do the assignments by only themselves.
Some people think, students can learn better by working together with other students.
However, I think working alone on assignments is the most effective way for studying.
To begin with, doing assignments alone benefits students to choose the topic they like.
To illustrate, students can choose the topic whatever they are interested in without compromising with others.
When they deal with the things which is interesting, they might work hard with it and even make profound research with it, so they can study effectively.
By contrast, if students need to work with other students on some assignments, it is hard for them to make a consistent decision.
Even though they choose the same topic, it is hard to assign different parts of the assignments.
During this process, some of the students would do things which they are not  eager to do.
My experience is a good case in the point, last semester, our history professor ask us to do an assignment together.
It is an assignment about the history of the war.
I really like this topic, and if I could do it alone, I could donate all my enthusiam in it.
Some of our member wanted to study in the Chinese war, and they wanted to focus on the impact of life put by the war, which I was not interested in.
In the end, I finished my part of the assignment and did not get any achievement.
I do not think I learn it well from this assignment.
What's more, working alone on projects is good for students get impress
In general, I think finishing the assignment alone is better for learning, since it is not only good for studying profoundly, but also good for getting deeply impression about the knowledge.

With the development of the society and the education, there are more and more people concerning about their children's education problems.
Some people may say that parents now are more involved in their kids' education than before.
However, others have opposite opinion that parents are not like the parents in the past involving in the children's education.
From my perspective, I think that the parents now are less involved in the children's education than were parents  before and I would like to illustrate my ideas in the followings.
First, parents are busy than the parents in the past so they have less time to participate in their children's deucation than the parents in the past.
Nowadays, it is usual that both father and mother go to work rather than one of the parents staying at home to take care of their kids.
For example, when I was in primary school, my mother did not work and she always taught me how to do my maths homework.
By contrast, my little sister now is in primary school and mother now has to go to work just as father, so she does not have enough to teach my sister.
Therefore, parents are less involved in children's education.
Furthermore, the education system is better than before so parents rely on the school's teacher rather than themselves to teach their children.
Because of the progress of the economy, school now have more ability to build up advanced facilitis and hire more intelligent teachers to attract parents and children.
If parents think the school can provide better education than they could do, they will be glad to send their children to school and concentrate on other tasks.
Consequently, during the education process, parents' interfere become less.
For instance, my friend Amy have a younger brother and this boy now study in a primary school that asks students live in dorms.
The boy can only go back to home on weekend and his study is all dependent on his teachers rather than his parents.
Admittedly, parents paly an important role in children's live especially in their study.
They can give some help on their kids' study.

On the contrary, children now are more independent than the children in the past, so parents' character is more like a mental support, such as giving ecouragement, rather than a teacher on their study.
Besides, the homework that children need to finish is much harder than before, so parents may not help their children as the parents in the past so parents have less effect on their children's study.
Since parents are more busy than before and the education system is better than before,  for parents they are more inclined to let their children study in the school.
By this way, it can also caltivate the ablility of independence for children,which is good for kids in their future.
Therefore, parents are less involved in their children's education than before.

As far as I am concerned, just because the other things does not mean students' academic apperance will be influenced.

Although money could be a nice stimulus for children to get high grade in exams, it has nothing good for children to develop a healthy and correct attitude towards study.

Secondly, if there is a child who is not a good student at all and never get high scores in the tests.
When his parents tell him to do well in school and come back to get money, what would he do in order to get the money?
Most probably he would cheat in the exam for high scores and get the money.
It can not help to build a correct attitude in study for the child but steer him to a fully incorrect way.
In my opinion, the parents need to find another way to encourage their children to behave well in school.
The stimulus could be a book, a chance to travel or something can attract the children's interest.

In other words, if our children fail in such an exam, we should also encourage him to recover rapidly.
