Is it the best way to travel in a group with a tour guide?
Can we have a great time in a group travel?
As a amateur in travel, traveling in a group restricts my free and the satisfaction of the  travel.
As a result, from my perspective, the group travel is not a good choice.
On the one hand, the group travel restricts our free.
To be more specific, If we participate in a group travel, we will be restricted in a rigorous schedule that travel agency makes.
Consider myself for instance, last year, I participated in a group travel that called "7days travel in Hai Nan".
However, although we went there with a good mood, we did not have a good time at that 7 days.
The first day we arrived there, and we felt extremely tired for the 5 hours riding in the high speed rail, but the guide also resisted to led us to visited a stone statue of Guanyin.
Dramastically, all of us just wanted to sleep or stroll nereby.
Finally, we still went to visited the Guanyin statues, but we felt boring and terrible.
Second day we even climbed mountains in a rainy day under the schedule.
Obviously, the compellent schedules do not benefit for us, the group travel is not a good choice.
On the other hand, the group travel is hazardous sometime.
To be more convincible, some of the small scales travel agency have some bad low-downs which are harmful for our porperty even the being.
For instance, these days a traveling group about 10 people in our country prepare to have a travel in Tailand.
However, they met a problem that the guides abused them and threaten them just since they did not consume enough money in a rubber market.
Finally, the 10 people escaped and leave Tailand, and the travel agancy has been complaints and be punish.
Parents always have different kinds of ideas to try to teach their childrens better.
Some of them think that parents should let chilren make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
In my opinion,I don't thnk that is a good idea,I think to teach children directly is better,here are my reasons.
Firstly,it can make your children get it directly and exactly.
To let your children learn from their own mistake,they may not get the exactly point.
They might think they are wrong,but they may not know why,or ven don't think they are wrong.
By this,thy may make mistake again at the next time.
Also,in this way,you can not make sure that it got the point you want,that make it confuse.

will think about some other reason,that makes it confuse,In that case,to teach them directly may make them not do the wrong thing again,because thay will knoe that it wrong,so they will try to abvoid it.
Secondly,to let children learn from their own mistakes may waste your time or your power.
It may take a long time to let chilren learn fome their own mistakes.
And that really waste both your times.
To teach them directly,you can let them knowimmediatly,that you do not need to wait for a long time to let them get the point.
Also,waiting waste your power,you will always think about what is the best point to lead them to get your point,that really need a lot of time and powers.
Teaching them directly can make ypou don't need this kind of waste.
Thirdly,when you teach them directly,they can try it immediaty.
Because they know what things they did is wrong,they will try to do it correctly.
The more time they have to try it,the things they can do is better.
Just ike"practice makes perfect".
If you let them find it themselves,they might not have enough timed or enoiugh opportunities to correct it.
May be they are just get used to it at that time,they may regret,but they can'y change because mey be they are just get used to it.
By yhis,teach them dirctlky is really important.

In conclusion,I do not agree with the following statement,bcause I think to teach them directly can make them get your points directly and exactly,it will not let you waste your time and power on waiting for them,and it can give them enough time to fix their mistakes to become better.

Recently , a significant number of families  have the ability to let their children to receive high-quality education because a wide variety of parents hope their children can get good grades in the future.
During this special period, some parents suggest that they can use money to make their kids to study arduously.
In my opinion, I agree with this statement,too.
Admittedly, using this extreme methods may confuse childen about recognition of  study's meaning.
Because some chilren are too young to understand how hard their parents need to make money.
This method may cultivate a bad habit to children that ignore the meaning of study.
However, in the fast-paced society, many chilren are not too naive as we imagined.
They have the ability to develop their own idea.
What's more, the development of chilren is related to how parents act in front of children.
If parents use the methods reasonably and educate their chilren well.
it actually will bring benefits to children.
Moreover, using money for reward can motivate children to study hard.
That is becasue, children studying in school just like employees working in company.
If a company can give employees some motivations and bonus, I think the employees  will work more efficient.
Therefore, if parents can facilitate their children to study by rewarding, they will not lose the interests to study and know why they need to work hard.
Take my own experience as examples, my mom always use this method to stimulate me to keep studying when I feel bored at goin to school.

The reason why I study hard is that I derive happiness from reward then I can purchase something fun, and others student do not want to study because they derive happiness from playing with friends during their spare time.
Last but not least,  rewarding can make children realize the importance of money.
For example, before going to the university, it is unnecessary for students to take the part-time job.
Therefore, students do not possess the ability to make money.

However, rewarding can help students to realize how their parents use their sweat and strength to make money, which is similar for students to study hard in school because both  of schools and companies have competitions.

In conclusion,  I think it is a good idea that parents provide their children money for each high grade they get in school, due to the effieciency , motivation of study and right recognition of money.
Recently a discussion over whether awarding kids with money for each high mark is appropriate has aroused people's attention.
I think awarding kids for grades is something that can benefit both the kids and the parents.
My reasons are as follows.
Firstly,offering school-age children money for high marks can make students get better grades.
Because money awarded means children benefit more from studing hard.
And more benefits means the kids are much more motivated,which will lead them to study harder and get better grades.
Better-grade school-age children can attract more attention from  the teacher and  fellow classmates,which is a good outcome.
When I was young,I didn't do well in my study at first.
Kids in my school  only hung out with good students and barely noticed me.
Teachers only like kids that can get good grades,they praised them and answered their questions with more patience which I cannot experience.

This has made me feel really bad and lonely in a long time until my grades get better because my parents decided to offer me 20 dollars for each high scores ,I get encouraged ,study really hard and eventually end up being a good student.
Secondly, awarding kids money can make parents happier.
On the one hand,if they give kids money for studying well,then their children can study harder andbetter in the future,as I have explained in the last paragraph.
This can save parents' worries that their children may not have the self-control to study hard enough.
On the other hand,when kids can study well on their own,parents can save the money for extra classes after school,and that will save quite enough money for awards.
Parents will feel less stressed working hard to earn the money for extra classes and will be happier.
I didn't attend any extra classes because I can study well on my own,this has made my parents feel quite proud and relaxed for this lessen their burden for money-making.
In conclusion,I think awarding kids money for high grade is a good idea that benefits both the kids and the parents.
Kids get better grades,the money , more attention and they are happier.
Parents are more relaxed because they don't need to worry about kids' study or money-making.

Nobody can ensure that they would never make any mistakes in their life.
So does the teacher.

However, the teacher need to face a more stricter problem: what would happen if teacher has made mistakes when they are teaching the student, and what should students perform when they have noticed that?
Different people have different views.
Some people think they should show respect and say nothing.
And some people choose to interrupt and correct the mistaks immediately.
In my opinion, the better option is to wait until the ending of the class, and then talk to the teacher privately.
To begin with, if students interrupt the teacher right away and point the mistakes during the class, it would embarrass the teacher, and it is not polite.
My friend Joe had met this kind of problems and did exactly this way.
and thus he was got in some trouble.
Joe is the person who cannot tolerate any mistakes, so he corrected the mistake made by our teacher when we still during in a class.
And then the teacher felt angry because of the interrupt.
The teacher used to disgusted with the situation when her classes are being disturbed.
So the teacher criticized Joe and asked him to write a criticism text.
It is impolite that disturb others while they are contrating on themselves.
Furthermore, when people noticed the impolite behavior, they will choose to say nothing.
In my opinion, the selection is even worse than the first choice.
If the teacher does not relize the mistake, they would teach the wrong knowledge in the future teaching thus to mislead more students.
Finally, the best choice is to wait for the end of class and talk to the teacher in private.
So the teacher would not feel embarrassed and would correct the mistake next time.

In the fast-pace life style society, different jobs require different skills, even though in one kind of work, various types of work should be done, abilities to handle a large sum of work are needed.
Workers can bet more satisfaction from this type of working style.
Compared with dealing with similiar works day by day in which almost every employee will feel tedious and boring, a job involved different work contents is more appealing.
By accepting different requirements, just as every day is brand new.
Worker can welcome each fresh morning and get refreshed.
In this case, we can be energetic to carry out our work.
It is reported that doing the same work for 3 monthes will reduce the work efficiency by 20 percent.
In addition, different tasks stimulate the work passion of our staffs.
As a person has achieved great in his own field, if there is no other challenges for him, he may become an ego-centralized person.
However, with other task requirements, he can overcome himself through finishing tasks one and another.
For example, there are many opportunities in my friend's work.
He works in a training school, what he should do in his work is not only limited teaching those students, but also solving the question and complaints from thier parents.
Sometimes, it is maybe exhausted to handling those tasks at a time, through which his ability to deal with things gets improved.
In this kind of work, what he earn is the sense of achievement to a large degree.
In conclusion, different work requirements can provide stimulation and passion for those workers and enable them to achieve a lot, which is a self-satified task

With the regulation pointed out in my country that every family could only have a kid, nearly every children has no siblings and consequently parents treat their only children as vulnerable galss and keep them from making mistakes.
But as a matter of fact, children can not grow up healthily both in mental and in physical.
So, parents should allow children to make mistakes and deal with them by themselves.
To start with it, children are able to become independent and strong enough without parents' help and assistance.

Since parents can not be there for us to help us solve every problem we encounter, allowing children to make mistakes and learn from their own mistakes gives children valuable chances to become stronger,braver and more independent than other peers, thus making them more adpatable to the real society.
On the contrary, if parents always pretend their children from making mistakes, children would never know what is wrong and how to fix it.
When they do face such troubles and parents can not help them , they will be beaten by themselves.
Futhermore, experience learned from mistakes and failure is critical basis of success.
We konw that a lot of successful businessmen succeed after failing many times.
Edison had failed hundreds of times succeed in invented the bulb.
Gou Jian had become a prisoner before he united the state.
Success never occur to person who have not courage and cannot persist.
Only those who dear to face their problems directly and try hard to figure them out will gain pricelesss experience from failyre and achieve success.
As I illustrate above, parents should allow children to make mistakes and learn from it.
Because by doing it, they enable their children to become strong and independent quickly and chieve success.
Also, such experience can bring them a lot in their life span.
There are a lot of way for teachers to teaching in order to make the students more fulfilling and high-knowledged.
Some tasks made by teachers are aimed at group working while others are asked to be finished by students themselves.
There is an argument that working together is more effectively than working alone, and as for me, I agree with that.
Admittedly, working independently offers students the chance to learn to think things out for themselves and matchs more on the exams in schools.

But students will be not concentrating on their work if there are something more interesting, and also they will not have the competitive consiousness as they have no idea about other students processes of accomplishment.
To begin with, group works offers a chance for students to gain some experience and skills from others and solve their problems in time.
Group members are all individuals.
they have different ideas or perspective even on the same thing and thus finish the task more quickly.
Take myself for example, last year when I had a group assignment with my classmates, I really benefited a lot from that.
After the discusion, we searched for some essays and information and then shared together.
It saved me a lot of time because I could gain some ideas from others.
I still remember that I was got into a huge trouble when I did my part of the project, luckily, they helped me to figure out the question and solve it.
I could not imagine that if I can finish the task on time without them.
Furthermore, others can be a motivation and inspiration for students if they feel tired in their work or study.
Since there are not anyone here to supervise if students working alone and they will be tired and even give up in the half way.

A survey made by the National Educational Commitee did a investigation among students last year, they assigned the same tasks for each student but some were asked to work together while some were alone.
Then the researchers did some interfere to them such as broadcasted some music or talk around when students were learning.
The results showed that students in groups would be interfered by the environment less than the students worked alone.
Probably due to the reason that other members in the group will do some vital catalytic roles on others.
To sum up, students do work more effectively in groups rather than work alone.
Not only because of the information or ideas  they are willing to get, but also due to their concentrations in study.
As we all know, it is important to find the direction of  the future.
The dreams, the goals can tell people what the direction is and people will have a bright future when they achieve the dreams or the goals.
But the question is, what is the better way to achieve these dreams?
For me, I prefer to focus on achieving the realistic goals rather than to follow the dreams even if the dreams are ambitious.
First, focusing on the realistic goals would not waste the time and the money, which is precious for the young people.
When we try to achieve the goals or the dream, we have to spend our time and money to be succesful.
But if the people's dream is not practical, which means that they can hardly achieve it, they would waste their time and money to fail.
For example, my brother liked to play the soccer when he was a child, so it was his dream to be a professional soccer player in the future.
So he decided to train with the school soccer team everyday and his parents spent a lot of money to employ the private coach to train him.
But he was not tallent in soccer, in fact, he was too weak to join the competition, and he had some illness innate.
Eventually, he achieved nothing when he was twenty-five years old, although he spent his whole youth and lots of money.
Second, focusing on realistic goals will motivate people to work hard and help people succeed finally.
The goals can actually make people know the direction about their future, and when they work hard to achieve all the realistic goals, they will finally be successful.
As we know, the realistic goals is easier to achieve by contrast and people always tend to be motivated when they achieve one goal.
So if people focus on achieving the realistic goals, they would be motivated by achieving one goal and try their best to achieve another one, and fianlly, the would be what they dream to be.
When my mother was a child, it was her dream to become a scientist.
But what she tried to achieve is not to be a professer in the university, but how to have a good grade to go to the best school.
Everytime she performed well in an exam, she was motivated to work hard to have a better grade in the next exam, and finally, she succeed to become a physical scientist.
So as I have said, focusing on the realistic is better than following the ambitious dreams.
It is a fairly common phenomenon nowadays that some parent will offer their children money if they get high grade at school, and there is a heated discussion about it.
From my perspective, if the amount of the money and the way parents deal with it is reasonably prepared, it will be a good idea to do this.
On the one hand, every child needs encouragement, especially when they are doing well.
We've heard so many times that a school-age child got to a higher grade after his\her parents' praise, either physically or mentally.
Furthurmore, there is a psychological theory called 'encouraging pattern'  which demostrates that appealing encouragement can have a much better effect than an ordinary one.
Money, with no doubt, is such a kind of fascinating gift from a parent to a child.
With a reasonable amount of money, the child can get considerably inspired and do even better in the next exam.
On the other hand, money shouldn't be always regarded as something that is bad for the children.
If properly used, money can be also beneficial to the children's life.
A recent research shows that people who had pocket money during childhood can arrange their personal finance better than those who had not.
This means that a moderate amount of money may be an opportunity for the kids to learn how to make use of it.
In other words, after the children gain something with their own intelligence, they are actually starting a new lesson, which is also essential for their personal development.
As a consequense, giving the money is not a thing that parents are not allowed to do, it just requires them to take more responsibilities and be more careful during their children's growth.
Whoever has done a good job deserve to be awarded and encouraged, no matter he is an adult or a child.
Giving children money for their good grades, if sophisticatedly planned by the parents, can be not only an encouraging tool, but also an educational one.
That's the reason I strongly approve this parental behaviour.
Reading books is an important way to gain knowledge.
A book depicts a person's life allows us to know the man better.
Films can also give us a picture about what a person is like.
However, do the books and films tell us everything about a person?
As far as I am concerned, we can not know exactly what a person like through books and films.
The aim of most books and films is to purvey possitive things and aspiration to the audiences, so they only depict the good time of one person or make great efforts to bueatify them.
The main character in films are always encouraging and do the best thing, and seldom make mistakes.
However, it is not true, we all make mistakes and such mistakes are the key to understand one person.
In the films, the directors delete the faults made by a specific person and thus make the impression unreliable.
All the films and the books is persueing a sense of drama, becuase it can stimulate the readers' or the audiences' interest and make them continue to admire the work.
In order to acheive this goal, the writer of the books or the films will make up the plot in which funny conversations or conflicting relationships will occur.
However, such conversations and relationships are unreal and will mislead the readers to attach a characteritic which is not belonged to the person in reality to this person in their minds.
Since the content of books and films is limited, we can only get one aspect of the person.
In many films, they only pay attention to the most eye-catching aspect of a person and only choose to depict events in which this aspect is showed.
Nontheless, every person is complexed and convoluted, so to understand a peoson fully, you should not only notice one aspect.
Taking into account of all the facts above, to learn about a person, reading books and watching films are not enough.
We should gather as many informations as possible in variety ways in order to build up a whole picture of a person.
Recently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among people: whether your job has more effect on your happiness than social life does?
Some claim that social life can create more happiness.
However, contrary to their view comes my perspective that job has more effect on people's happiness.
To begin with, people spend more time on job than on social life.
To be more specific, people always need to work eight hours per day but they just spend two or even one hour on their social life.
If people do not like their job, they will be unhappy since they need to do something they do not really like and repeat it every day.
However, if people meet some trouble on social life, they might just forget it few days later.
For example, my uncle Wang, was a teacher when he was young.
But he did not like to teach others since he did not have much patient.
At that time, he was unhappy and became passive.
Then he changed his job, he became a business man and sooner made a lot of money.
He became positive and smile every day.
He always told me that people must choose a suitable job that make them happy since they have to spend most of their time on it.
To be followed, job can bring people a great sense of achievement when they succeed.
To illustrate, if peope finish their job very well, they will be praised by the boss and colleague which will give them a sense of satisfaction.
What' more, people can achieve their dream if they work hard on their job.
However, social life cannot give people those satisfaction.
For instance, my mother worked very hard, spending 10 hours on working and she barely have time to take part in some social activities.
But she is still happy and positive since she is always praised by her boss and her promotion is very fast.
So she does not need social life to cheer her up.

In my opinion, most advertisements make products seem much better then they really are, because the advertisement use hyperbole, super star to propagandize their products and in propose to hide the disadvantage of their products.
Firstly, the merchants usullay advertise their products by hyperbole.
Which means the merchants always exaggrate the advantage of their product.
For example, some merchants want to show their sport drinking can help people refresh theirselves, then in their advertisements, the  customer can fly in the sky after drinking their sport drinking.
As we know, the sport drinking is not able to make people fly in the sky.
Merchants use hyperbole to exaggrate their product, which is order to attract customer to buy their product.
Second, the company usullay let some famous people to advertise their products.
The super star always can attract their fans.
The fans only pay attantion on their idol, then ignore the shortage of the products.
For example, a famous singer advertise one company's new cloth.
When he take this cloth and walk in the street,his fans see he wear this kind of cloth, then all of his fans want the same clothes with their idol.
The fans only care their idol, not the quality of the clothes.
No matter how bad the quality is, the fans still will buy the same clother as their idol.
Finally, the seller will hide the disadvantage of their product in their advertisement.
The merchant will only demonstrate  the advantage of their products, they wound not show the shortage.
For example, a company want to sell their cellphones, in the advertisement they only show their cellphone is good at  taking picture and make the picture in high quality.
But they will not show their cellphone can not recieve the massage from other.
This will mislead the customer and reduce the information which customer can get, then attract customer to buy it.

In conclusion, most advertisements make products seem much better then they really are, because the advertisement use hyperbole, super star to propagandize their products and in propose to hide the disadvantage of their products.

It has been highly discussed that employees should be given tasks to do according to their type of work.
Some people contned that they are more likely to be arranged to complete sorts of tasks because it is more inersting and useful.
However, other workers hold the view that they prefer similar tasks in a day for the reason that they are more familiar with it and accomplish it more efficiently.
From my perspective,multi-tasks can really fulfill people's mind and push them forward.
There is no denying that doing different tasks can excite people and make them interested in the task.
When people are addicted to their work,it is easy for them to get bored of the work and give up the career.
But different kinds of tasks can enrich the life of the work.

Take the work of the teacher for example,they handle different classes and students all day long,if they are not given other assignments,such as seminar and students' activities,they will be easily tired of their teaching.
Seminar and activities are like a kind of integredient in the food,and it can bring different flavors to the teachers.
Therefore,different types of tasks can make the work colorful and interesting.
What's more,completing various tasks can enhance the staff's comprensive skills,which is benefit in the career and life.
Fishing a task in a day and repeating it is simple for the workers,but it is difficult to accomplish various tasks in a day.
Under that circumsatnce, the workers may have the pressure to improve themselves and become better.
Especially for the workers who get good results in a complicate task,they will feel more confident,Thus,they wiil like their work more.
G radually,they will spare no efforts to learn more from others and work,benefiting their whole life.
In conclusion,only by doing different kinds of tasks can the workers get more satisfication from the work.
Last but not the least,the workers may improve themselves through the work.
Currently, a controversial topic has aroused heated debated in the society: being creative or making careful plan, which  is the best solution for a problem.
Some people think they can solve all the problems by making plan and work step by step.
However, in my opinion, being creative can help us to find the best solution.
My point can be elaborated as follows.
First of all,  be creative can help us to deal with unfamiliar situation and emergencies, which are hard to make plan in advance.
It is easy to make plan for conventional problem, since there are fixed solution for them.
However, for unfamiliar situation or emergencies, we don't have the experience to deal with them.
In this way, even though we try to make plan, we will find that there are too much unknown information so that we cannot decide what to do in advance.
We have to be creative and come up with solution when the unexpected situation occurs.
For example, when I first become the leader of the physics experiment team, I found that I didn't know the details of the experiment, so I cannot make plan in advance.
Instead, I let the experiment start fisrt and solved all the problem in the following time.
Even though I didn't have a well prepared plan, I solved the problem and got good result.
Moreover, be creative can help us to update existing solution and increase efficiency.
The wide-spread solution  may not be the best solution, at this time, be creative can help us to think of new solution.
For example, a worker in the car factory think the way of selling cars is not suitable for the conditions now, so he thinks of a new idea to sell the cars and double the selling amount.

As we all know, many incidents occur in the everyday life of our own, however, is it really important to care about or to get known about the events happening around the world, even if it is unlikely that they will affect your daliy life?
I would prefer "yes" to this question,especially when the view to the world, the adding to our experience and the change of our sense of value are taken into consideration.
Firstly, in my point of view, the process of learing the events in our world is the procedure to broaden one's view toward the world.
As the saying once said, reading a thousands of books can not be compared to the traveling of millon miles.
And in this time with the advanced technology of information, the best way to travel is to learn about the events that are occurring everyday in every part of our world.
And along with the "travel and adventure", our horizion and view get the chances to form and ameliorate, thanks to the gradual knowledge towards our world.
Moreover,the learing of the ongoing things of the world, will equip us with the experience that would help in our work.
A large amount breakthrough are achieved in almost each area everyday, so does the area that we are working for or are studying for.

Though they may not be concernd with our daily life, but is the knowing to these events that help us to accumulate experience, or expertise accuratly, which will pave us with a much more promising road toward the future in the work and the life.
Last but not least, the getting to know about the occuring events will help to improve the sense of value of us.
When we open the news, we will frequently see some heros that devote their efforts and life to attach attention to the work of their own or to serve the country and society that they love.
It is their qualities and spirits that teach us the example of what we need to follow and become, and thus changing the sense of value that we has.
So it is the learing process that gets us to form the suitable sense of value and spirits that we need.
What we can't deny is that the events that are happening may not be affected to our daliy life.
But it is this process that hellp us to develop our sense of value, our sense of view to the world and experience.

In order to let our children grow, some parents let their child to make mistakes so that they can learn from their mistakes.
However,some parents don't want their child to do anything wrong nomatter what has happened.
I am support with this statement.
It is truly a good way to help children's growth by making them learn the lesson from their own problems.
First, the child can better memorize the mistake they made before so that they won't do this again.
When a kid realize that he has made a mistake, he won't forget it for a long time.
However, if you keep telling your child not to do something, sometimes the thing you are wondering may happened.
Some kids can't remember your words all the time.
For example, riding a bicycle.
Can you remember how to keep balance when you first learn to ride it?
Of course you can't.
Although your father keeps telling you the solution to ride it, you can't learn to ride it until you have go through this problems.
Only after you have failen to the ground several times that you can handle this skill.
By this way, the statement can also be explained.
Second, we can challenge our childrens by letting them make mistakes.
If a child keeps making troubles, but every time he can learn the lesson from his mistakes, he can have a lot of skills.
For example, a baby is trying to learn walking.
We can't help him because if we hold him that he won't fall, he can't learn to walk forever.
Kids can face a lot of challenges by learning from a lot of mistakes.
If I broken a window, I would be asked to clean it and to pay for my mistake with my pocket money.
Also I could learn how to deal with such things next time.
By this way, the kids can have a better growth.
To make a conclution, it is better a have a kid make mistakes so that they can learn a lot from them.
If the child haven't made any mistake before, it is hard for him to handle a complex situation.
I believe that parents should accept that their kids might cause some troubles sometimes also it is impossible to ask a kid not to do anything wrong.

From my perspective, I don't think it's a good idea for parents to offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
The reasons to support my point of view are as follows.
First of all, it is admittidly that when a student enters school he or she should make every endeavour to learn.
But a high grade is not the ultimate standard.
We should evaluate our kids behavior in school by the knowledge they gained and the horizons they have broadened instead of those marks that are showed on test papers.
The scores are only part of the facts accounting for a child's excellent behavior.
Moreover, if you emphasize the importance of a high grade too much, the true essence of learning would be lost.
In order to get those seemingly high marks, students would learn by rote instead of learning by heart.
What is worse is that some students may even cheat or try other methods to get a good mark.
Providing money would cause a totally controversial result to our original purpose.
Last but not least, I persume that school-age children are too young to recieve money of their own.
As stationaries and textbooks are already provided, it is questionable where they might use these extra money.
Will they use it in the right way as parents expected or will it be spent in places we don't want them to be spent?
Rewards and encouragments are necessary when a child makes progress or performs greatly, however, what kinds of things should we give to our kids should be considered deeply.
Giving them books with a great variance, taking them on a family trip rather than money for hooking up with friends will ensure that the parents efforts will not go down the drain.
All in all, I think giving money to our immature school-age children is unwise.
By building other encouragment system will definitly enable your child to grow better thus it is of great necessity.
There are many people think that doing physical exercise is better than watching a movie or reading a book to relax.
But in my opinion, watching a movie or reading a book is better than doing physical exercise.
I have numerous reason to explain that why watching a movie or reading a book is better than doing phtsical exercise, and I'll choose the most important reason to explain.
Watching a movie or reading a book just need you to focus on the story and understand that, use your mind.
it's not consume your energy and go out, and another advantage is that it can increase your knowledge.
But it's not means doing physical exercise is not useful.
Doing physical exercise is a good way to relax.
Therefore,some of the people, such as high school student, they often doing physical exercise before the test in order to decrease the pressure.
These two ways are all good way to relax, but if compare these two ways, doing physical exercise is not fit in many situation.
Therefore, I think watching a movie or reading a book is better than doing physical exercise.
Internet is always important in our daily life.
There is a heat discussion about whether the internet should start charging fees or not.
On the one hand, free internet can make more people access to  see the material on it and can cause a hugh influence.
On the other hand, internet with cost has its benefits as well.
From my perspective, i would prefer the latter one.
There are some reasons below.
Firsly, internet with cost has less security problems.
As we can discover that there are a lot of advertisement windows stay at the free website which we are visiting.
It is annoying and sometimes they have virus.
When you try to close it, it will soon transport you to its website and force your computer to download its virus or some applications with virus.
What's worse, you can not even stop it.
And soon, as a result, your computer paralyzed and you may lose your precious and important files and photoes.
After that, you still need to spend vast time to fix it and make sure this virus is wiped out.
However, the charging internets usually do not have that kinds of trouble.

Because i know i spend money visiting this internet, then there will be some technical stuff to make sure its safety and the company who runs the website do not to need advertisements for making money for they aleardy have charged from customers.
Moreover, it show respect to the creators of the websites or the applications on internet.
Everyone is aware that creating something original is difficult and some fee is neccesary.
For instance, i once looked up for a economical analysis artile on internet, and i found that there was one was really great for i only read a paragraph of it.
But i needed to pay some money for it to comtinue my reading.
I though this was fair enough, for the writer must spent a lot of time on it and i should pay for it as a his or her reward.
So i did, and it only costed me 2 dollars.
The price was not that expensive.
It was really worth paying for such a high quality passage.
As a result, i learnt a lot from it.
In conclusion, the government should provide internet to the public with cost without doubt, for its safey and our respect for the original authors and creators.

Children from time to time make different kinds of mistakes.
Many of which are nantural but later other mistakes could turn out to be undesirable.
For that problemas parents you had better be some what paradoxical in your attitudes toward raising children from stage to stage.

The paradox is like that,at an early stage,children are always expected to stand uo and walk as well as to open themouth and speak;while at an elder age,children are often asked to simply sit down and keep quiet.
Naturely,mistakes that toddlers make are infantile events given them to grow up.
For istance,you would never tie a rope to a baby and teach it to climb stairs by hauling it up by the rope.
Nor would you spank a baby for not learning to speak quickly enough.
It is because the baby by their own error.
As we all know ,practice makes perfect.
So,if there is no learing happening,mistakes would have no worth at all.
As can be imagined,mistakes might cause pain or impatience,and yet thy could provide opporunities for growth.
In this respect,only very smallchildren should be allowed to make mistakes'unconditionalli'because this process of'trial and error'makes walking possible and speech possible.
While making mistakes is a part of life,itis your response to the child'serror that counts.
when children should come to the age to start learning to distinguish right from wrong,you ought to explain what sorts of mistakes should not happen,being conditioned under differnt cinditions.
In other words,not trying avoid situations in which children might  make mistakes.
Therefore,it is not the right thing to do toturn a bliend eye and a deaf ear to some of children's serious mistakes because you can only look at the stars but not down at you feet.
Tell your children,be curious and howerer difficult life may seem ,there is always someting you can do and successed at.
In certain sense,for younger children there are no mistakes,save one-the failure to learnfrom mistakes.
From stage to stage,children make mistakesof different sorts.
Accordingly,the key to good parenting is nt see achild's negative mistake everytime as an end product,but rather as a positive begining for progress of life.
Remember to tell your children,be curious and howerer difficult life may seem ,there is always someting you can do and successed at.

We usually see the phenomenon that family memebrs can only get together during Spring Festival, and we usually spend other time of  a year just with our mother or father.
Also, modern lifestyle caused by the advanced society is separating us from our extended family members.
And, the fact that young people tend to stay with their classmates or friends rather than extended family members is not uncommon.
So through all of this , we can draw a conculsion that the less important .
First, people often have their own thing to deal with, so they have no time to sit down and talk with their extended family members.
For example, soem people from countryside are working in big city to get money and feed their family in China.

I have seen a result of an investigation in a magzine which points out that people working in the countryside are expected to go back to visit their cousins or aunts,  but their job doesn't allow them to do this sinc they need the salary to feed their family.
Then, because the distance from your family, you may have less metionally relationship with your extended family.
They are more like some fimilar persons to you.
Secondary,  the society are stepping into an industrial condition.
Modern lifestyle separtes us with the extended family members.
We are not in the countryside any more.
During 1960s to 1980s, we depend on agriculture.
And family always lived together, ate together, and worked together and at forth.
The concept of family is extremely important in people's brains during that time.
Because you are so closer with your extended family members so your relationship was very good.
But what about now?
With countryside becoming less and city becoming more, the concept of a single person is playing a more significant role in our brain.
We are desiring to possess our own life instead of living together with extended family members.
And this results in the decreaing level of extended family.
They are no more important, since we have been affected by the modern lifestyle.
Lastly,  the young people nowadays almost don't visit their grandparents or cousins.
They want to play with their friends or classmates because you have more to communicate with.
Each of us have the experience.
Our parents command us to g owith them to visit our cousins and aunts.
But we refuse just because one friend of mine are inviting me to go out with him to have fun.
Then because the less visits, the status of extened family members is decearsing.

Ten years ago, the development of techinque is extremely slow and hard, if people want to gain some information or find a suitable position, there is no doubt that it is really difficult for them to have a complete understanding the whole different employments and have a convinvent opportunity for select a favourable position because of the limitation of spreading information or date.
Then, taking the daily situation into consideration, I have a profound conviction that in the modern life, individuals can identify the type of career of job more complelely instead of in the past.
First of all, people have some valuable approaches to get a better understanding about the whole jobs or career owing to the ocurrance of a lot of up-to-date techinique.
Therefore, it is convinent for them to find a suitable position instandly, leading them to succeed easily.
For instance, my father was a chief who worked in the nearby restaustant ten years ago, but he dislike cooking and staying at the kitchen.
However, he could not change the job due to the limitation of gaining more lastest information that enlist people.
But now, he has the choice to surf on the Internet and graze a number of news, finally he selects a satisfied position.
Therefore, my father will be prone to succeed on account of interest and figure out what job is secure.
On top of that, there are more various and diverse opportunities that many corporations offers.
It is because that with the rasing of people's living standard,so many fields such as entertainment or education needs a lot of employees to work.
So compared with the condition in the past, people have more ways to choose jobs, and as a result of awaredness of security, people are more likey to find a job that is secure.
Adimitedly, in the past, people lived in a simple life, so it does not surprise us to discover that many peolpe such as our grandmother and grandfather enjoy the simple but secure life.
But the reason that they will succeed is might luck.

To put all into a nutshell, it is true that many peopel have the assertion that in the past it was easier to identify what type of carrer or jobs would lead to a secue, successful future due to the limitation of choice and eyesight.
Nevertheless, I strongly believe that people in the modern life will find a secure job and succeed.
As the pressure of learning becomes more and more, larger number of students lack of motivation to study harder.
For this, some of their supervisors would encourage children to have more motivation by giving them financial rewards if they get excellent grades or perform well at school.
In my view, I do not think it is a good way.
First of all, students will only concentrate on their high marks to get more money.
Learning is not only to perform well in the examination or obtain an extremely high grade, but also an enjoyable journey for a student to expand the knowledge or broaden the horizon.
In other words, students will neglect other good effects that learning may bring to and pay much attention on the marks that can satisfy their parents, instead of enjoying the process of learning.
Also, some non-beneficial effects can be lead to because of being offered money for great marks.
For example, besides the students who will make much efferts to reach a sucessful achievement, there are students who may cheat in the exam to obtain the high marks.
This would cause a serious bad habit to a student and can also make a bad influence on the rules of the school.
In addition, giving money reward is a bad choice for the future of the student.
What if they go to the university or go to work and do not have any more such rewards given by their parents?
They may lack of motivation to study or work.
As a result , it may make students depend on or rely on thier parents much when they study or work.
In conclusion, giving children such money rewards is bad for both their future study and self-dicinplined abilities, so I do noy agree.

If you are traveling with your family to one famous viewpoints in your country, and you are very familiar with the place, and you want to try more interesting projects in some other place, what will you choose between join a group lead by a guide or travel by yourself?
Obviously the last one!
Because the guide would lead you to the same places.
So I prefere to travel by yourselvs.
First, there is some problem in the trip which is led by the guide.
For example, there is a news in one country.
One guide lead a trip to the Thailand and the advertisement says that the guide will lead the visitors to a lot of places and have a lot of delicious foods.
So a lot of people join this group to travel in the Thailand.
And when they arrived, they suddenly find out that they are cheated by the advertisement.

The guide leads them to several boring and bad places, and the guide drops them in many shopping malls and says that "If you don't purching in the mall for some hours, I can't get enough money for my life.
So if you don't shopping for some hours, I won't drive you back to your country!"
This kind of things happens a lot in many countries, so that's the first reason for me to traveling by myself.
Second, if I choose to travel by myself, I could go for another places which is out of the famous points.

If I and my family want to travel in some city, if we choose the group, we couldn't stay in some places for long time, and if we want to view the point which is out of the travel list from the guide, we couldn't go to those places.
Third, someone would say that if you don't travel in the groups, you couldn't get enough information for the views.
But I think if you don't join the group, you could also get enough information for the web or some books.
And second, you could reduce the costs for the trip.
All in all, I think that traveling by ourselves is better than the trip which is under the guide's leading.
These days, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debates among people:which factor is most influencial on decision making.
From my perspective, recommendations from my friends or colleagues is the most important.

Firstly, the information from my friends or colleagues is unbiased and is based on the truth.
Instead of  exaggerating the benefits of the products, the information from the friends is mainly based on their personal experience.
Aftering using the products for a while, friends can give a unbiasd evalution because they do not have any interests related to the products.
What friends or colleagues concerns is only the quality or performance of the product.
However, if relying on the information on the media, since the advertisment on the media only shows its benefits insteads of disadvantages, it would mislead you to buy it.

The salesman in the market also will persuade the customs to buy the products without showing its property or merely exaggerate the benefits because their job is saling the products as much as possible.
Secondly, the friends or clooeagues can give you the most suitable advice about the products.
Colleagues have worked with you for many years so they have a deep understanding of the person.
Based on the understanding, Friends and colleagues can recommend you with the suitable products, showing the goods they think you might perfer.
On the contrary, the information from the media  is target to any person who see the advertisment, so they cannot help you yo choose the suitable products from the various pattern.
Also the salesman would only base on the condition of perchase and tell you the best seller without pick a special one for you.
For example, last summer I bought a facial cleanser in the exclusive store.
Based on the persuaded that a product saled more than one hundred in a day, I bought it but it turn out to be sene
All in all,the recommendations from my friends or coleagues have reference value and can help me a lot.

I agree that parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes.
Mistake is a great teacher of everyone.
Sometimes it comes from behavior, sometimes it begin with learning, and maybe other times it comes from the thinking.
Parents must let the children know why they made mistakes and how to solve them.
There are three type of the miatskes and let me anysis them respectively.
Firstly, a large scare of the mistakes which children made is from their behavior.
Because the children are very little, they do not know which is right or wrong.
So when they live a life or play with others, they may confused about what is really true.
In these scene, if parents abandon the children before they made, children can not get why they made this mistakes and how to aviod it next time.
Secondly, children always make mistakes when they are studying.
For example, if a child are doing his homework of math, he may makes some mistakes of it.
If now his parents told him why he made the mistake, he must remenber it and do not makes the same problem next time.
Thirdly, thinking mistakes is the most hidden one but the most important one.
If a child has some thinking mistakes and he do not aware that this thinking is false, this thinking mistake may belong this child for many years.
But if his parents can find this thinking problem and let the children aware that he is wrong, he will change is mind and correct this mistake.
So it is very important for parents let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes, by this way, they can get the reason why they made these mistakes and grow in a better way.
With he rapid development of society,an incrreasing number of people tend to be faced with much pressure in working and studying.
So it is high time for us to slow down and relax ourselves.
From my perspective,I think the best way of relaxing is to do physical exercise.
It is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than realx by doing physical exercise
First of all,as is known to us,doing exercise can make peope getting stronger and stronger.
It means that doing phyical exercise can not only help us relax,but also make us healthy.
Secondly,when you are doing physical exercise,you are bound to consume much energy.
After that,you will find exhausted and tired,which can also let you be more relaxed.

According to these physical exercise,for example,there are basketball,football,volleyball and so on,you can best use up all of your energy and thus all of your pressure,your sadness will disappear in the end.
Lastly,although you can also relax yourself by watching a movie or reading a book,your relax is just result from the exciting story,which can make us pleasant for a moment.
However after watching or reading,you will get nervous as the same as before watching or reading it.
In a word,this way is temporary,but oppsitely,th exercise can let the feeling of relax last longer.
What is more,the way of doing physical exercise has more advantages than watching or reading.
The former way I mention are both physical and mental,and the latter way is only mental.
From what has been discussed above,it can be concluded that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than realx by doing physical exercise.
I do not agree with the saying that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book than relax by doing physical exercise.
In the first place, people are supposed to relax by focusing on others rather the part that are tired.
Nowadays, people feel tired more bacause their brains or minds are running out rather than they really get exausted physically.
In this way, if people still use their brains to watch a movie or read a book, there will be no doubt that they can not feel relaxing.
Secondly,in such a society, what can make people relax is exactly the physical exercise.
That is to say, the way of real relax can't be staying somewhere quietly.
As time goes by, things change.
It is obvious that it is much better to do sports than to stay there for relax.
Thus, the more you keep quiet, the more tired you will feel.
Doing exercises is the key to making people relax.
In the third place, doing sports can improve people's health.
In modern society, an increasing number of people are getting unhealthier than before.
And, it is most derived from the ways of working and living today.
People tend to be working for all day long in sitting way.
Lacking enough exercises, there is no wonder they are in a bad health.
Watching a movie or reading a book can not help promote the physical health at all.
When we consider something, we really should do it with the date and situation.
After all, things are always changing.
Of course, according to the modern world, it is better to relax by doing physical exercise than watching a movie or reading a book.

As the information period advanced, it is prettey easy for us to see a myriad kind of city presidents' measures and some potitics' publications.
Obviously, people will have they own perspectives for those and lots of teachers are willing to share their own social or political views with classmates.
However, I am into tune that teachers are not supposed to do that.
In the first place, that teachers point out their own thoughts on politicy and society will decrease the efficiency of courses.
For instance, my math teachers always discuss the measures of president in our city such as removing the city park and increasing the electronic tax.
Furthermore, He always assesses the advantages and disavantages brought by these behaviors; for example, people lose a place to relaxe themselve and increasing tax will bring larger life pressur.
In this way, all classmates are unsatisfied with him owing to the fact that it is a waste time for us to spend half class to listen his own opinion about these political events.
Because of his political ideas, we never be imported full knowledge on class and all students obtain a bad grade on math.
Therefore, to avoid low efficiency in class, teachers are not supposed to point out their own political thoughts.
Secondly, teachers' political and social knowledge is may not well-rounded and they mislead students sometimes with their own ideal for policy or society.
In the past, my borther,Daniel, hated Japan because his teacher always described that Japaness are bad people and their violence makes their courtry failure.
However, Daniel totally changed his idea about Japan after he had a travel to there.
He told me that people there were pretty respectabal and well; furturemore, Japan has strong technology power and economy advantage.
All of these good characteristics are not discribed by his teacher and there are lots of thing we need study from them.
Therefore, maybe his teacher never go to that courntry and just listened some fake information.
Thus, teachers should not spread their own political or social opinions because they are maybe incorrect information.

In my opinion, there is no better way to cultivate students with well-rounded insight about politicy and society than telling them the fact of events and provide them freedom space to independently think.

Owing to the fact that different students have different characteristic and thinking from different angle will obtain different results, teachers should only tell their students the truce of political and social events without any bias.
This way, students can use their own experience and knowlege to justice these events.
To sum up, I totally disagree with that teachers point out their own perspectives of social and political events.
There is a increasing trend that parents are willing to award their school-aged children with money if they get a high mark.
Parents are in favor of this idea for it effectively encourage student to study.
But I insisit that this is not a good idea.
The award money will not serve as a stimulus for study, instead, it distract children from study.
They no longer study for their interest or their eager to learn knowledge, and they just focus on money.
This behavior changes their aim of study, from learning to gaining money.
This money awarding betray the esece of spiritual education.
For example, the money award may encourage the students interest in spending money and take earning money as their goal of learning.
The better solution is to give children books instead to encourage them explore the unknowns.
What the parents should award is not only the hgh grade,but also the progress.
Parents should not only demand high mark,but also prase for the progress children made.

For instance, if a student has a poor mark at beginning and  make progress through dignant efforts,but he failed to get reward for hard to meet the high standard parents want,he would cetainly lose heart to study.
This is not the parents want,but is caused by parents award.
So it is better for the parents to offer money for each progress children made in school instead of the high grade.
This is what  many top universities are managing to do now.
In summary, offering money for each high grade, to some extent, will encourage children to study harder.
But to think about the deeper influnce, this is not a good idea for it actually kill the interest of learning.
I prefer a better solution that parents could reward children for the progress they made at school and change the money into the book.
This will be a better stimulus for study.

With the rapid pace of the society, many people seem to be increasingly busy.
Different ages of people face various problems--- elder people suffer in physical disorders and students are under the high pressure of study.
Hence, people may not have enough time to company with their extended family.
In my opinion, in the recent years, the extended family is less important than it was in the past.
Initially, since people can extend their social network by internet communication, they do not need to limit their relationship in the extended family.

In the past time of China, becasue of the lack of internet communication, people have less chances to make more friends other than the relatives, and even just the friends of the extanded family members.
However, people can just stay at home and commute with other people through long distance by the social media.
Thus, people nowadays do not need to strengthen the relationship between the relatives but making friends with the people who have common values or interests.
Moreover, the amount of work can cause the emotional gap between the extended family, thus reducing the frenquency of communication.
In the past of Chine, a big family including the extended family lived in a large yard together.
Although people were not direct- blooded family members, the living convention cause people are familiar with relatives.
Compare to the modern society, people live and work in different places.
With the lack of communication, the relationship is not as close as before.
Finally, people can be more independent than before, so the extended family is not important now.
In the past, people only could get imported products when some relatives went broad, but now is changed.
As the ebay exists, people can easily buy things they want just click a button on the website.
In this case, the extended family is less helpful than before.
I do not think it is a great idea to just let chlidren make mistakes and learn from them.
Instead of concidering it as lessons from mistakes as most chinese peaple does, I think it hurts the children that suffers from the mistake a lot.
To be simple, I think the benifits is way less than the negative affects it will cost.
First of all , not preventing children from mistakes may cause the lack of happiness and safetiness.
Children's hearts are young and vulnurable.
Unprevented harm like unstopped mistakes may let the child adopt  fear  to the outside world , for it brought him so much unhappiness and horrible memories.
I think it is well against the idea of the development of a healthy mind.
This will cause the Child to be senseative and afraid to think of new ideas , for the ones that make the first step has his fate unknown.
Just imagine it , if someone gets something bad all the time from trying new things and doesn't get any guidance or support, who would ever dare to da anything new?
In the other hand , it may even cause a negative feeling to the outside world .
A Child's mind is like a piece of white paper.
What you print on it is what it will look like and what it will become.
The good will be adopted if printed the good and also bad things will occur if bad things are printed.
Giving children a negative feeling to the world at such a young age really sucks because it may easily leave an impression in their mind that tells them that the world doesn't love them.
And as a result, what the child grows up to think about is to hate the world.
Never make chlidren feel they are born in a cruel world.
Make them think of the bright side and let them develop towads it.
But as the wise always sayâ€˜every coin has two sidesâ€™.
There is benifits of letting children make mistakes.
Firsst , it can teach them to be careful , think before they act.
And it can also make them brave and more able to face future difficultes.
Nothing is perfect , so is the act of preventing or not preventing children from mistakes.
The thing can't really be perfect , but  what we do about it can mean a lot .
So a balance between preventing too much and absolutely not preventing should be the best option.
It's not good to just prevent such things , but there is obviously no good to not prevent it.
Nowadays, education has become a hot topic in our society and people pay far more attention to education than before.
It is common for parents to concern that thier children will be influenced by other people and whether students are more influenced by their teachers or their friends has been debated.

Some people believe that teachers influence students more because they give courses and knowledge to students, while other people believe that students are easily influenced by their friends because they spend more time with their friends.
From my perspective, students are more influences by their friends.
First, young children have more topics with there peers.
Friendships will be easily established between teenagers whose age are near the same and who share similar hobbies and interests with them, probably about singers, movie stars or some sports.
That is to say, they tend to spend much time together, discussing all the things that they are interested.
And during this process, they may influenced each other, from which sport team to support to how to spend the holidays.
Finally, their personalities and future careers may even be deeply affected by their friends.
Second, students are prone to act like the one of his friends that are respected in their group.
Every child has the hope to be respected, even just by several of his friends, and the simplest way is to imitate the one that seems successful in the group.
Admittedly, teachers do have an strong influence on their students.
However, the time students spend with teachers is limited, compared with those with their friends.
That makes a deeper influence impossible because students may just sit in the classroom and listen to their teachers.
Students learn knowledge from their teachers, but there seems no more intimate relationships would generate.
All in all, student are more influenced by their friends because they have more common topics

Nowadays, in university, many teachers have their own project, and they often assign it to students, which cause a great deabt that whether students should work together or work alone have a higher efficient.
As for me, I think it's better to work in group.
First, work in group can be easier than work alone, a group contains many students from different majors.
So they can use their different knowledge to solve a problem together.
As for me, I joined a model car compitation with my friends, who come from various majors, and we work together to make a model car.
i major in machine industrial, so I focus on the connection of those compoement.
My teammate Tom, who is major in computer science, he take response of programming, and Alex, whose major is material, he help us find a suitble case for our car.
And finally, we get a good grades in the compitation.
And one of my classmates, whose acdemic performance is better than all of my teammates, but he works along, and get nothing in the end.
Second, work in group can help you to improve your work efficiency, once you want to have a rest in you work time, your teammates will remind you to keep working.
Serval monthes ago, I take part in a math competation.
I worked with two teammates in the self study room.
After about 2 hours, i felt a little tired, and I want to take a sleep.
When I was about to sleep, my teammates hit my back, said:"your work is not over, we have to work togetther to finish it."
His words gave me power, and they are waiting for my consult to contine their works, so I refreshed myself, devoted my in working, and finish the task on time.
If i don't have my teammates, I might fall asleep and missed the deadline.
So, it is teammate that helps me to overcome the difficulties.
Above all, working together can be easier because we have more ideas and solution, and a group also make you a higher effieiency people.
All of which can lead you and your group to success.
So why don't you find your own group and work together?

In our country there has always been a spirit of volunteerism.
As children,we are taught that helping those less fortunate is our responsibility.
But unfortunately,the growing prospreity of the nation has placed an emphasis,creating a generation of youth that do not understand the meaning of being selfless.
I believe young people today are not as charitable as previous generations of young people.
The main reasons I am so skeptical of the inclination of today's youth to help people is that they are spoiled.
I remember when I was young and using a computer at the public librery was a privilege.
When my parents bought me my own computer when I went to university,I understood how much they sacrificed to give me that as a present.
They do not know what it is to be without.
In addition to respect others.
Traooed in their own digital world,they are unaware of the disrespect they show their elders when they ignore their parents and grandparents as they text and talk on their cellphones.

As the society developing, cooperation is always under debate.
Is team work really a excellent method for accomplishing assignments?
Although their are many people who love solitary and hold the view that doing tasks alone is more efficient, I am fully convinced that cooperation is the right choice.

So when there is an assign project from teacher, I regard working with others as a way that will bring more treasure to students, because of cooperation's can benefit a person's knowlegde and interpersonal relationship.
First, working with others can widen student's horizon by letting them be able to absorb other people's experience.
We all know that a man always think of things based on his own daliy experience and knowlege, suggesting that while working alone, people can hardly have break through.
Take a computer competation for example, there are rarely any individual perticipants.
For the reason that it's hard for one person to handle all the knowlege needed for finishing the tasks, such as coding, establishing a math model and writhing a paper.
Only by cooperation can this complex assignment be done on time.
Second, cooperation means communication with group members, with will definitely enhance the students' ability of getting along with other people and what's more, enlarge their social network.
Nowadays, students are usually the only child in home.
So they may think that being alone is the best way because of their lack of experience in communicate with others which will result in fear of geting along with other people.
This is apparently a bad cycle and should be breat down.
Finally, I have to agree that sometimes working alone is efficient for there won't be any disagreement and students wiil not need to have meetings to discuss with each other.
But if the cooperation is better used, it will obviously be the most eficient way.
It's easy to know that doing one thing a time is more time consuming that doing several things at the same time.
But for a single people, it's impposible to do muitiple things at a time.
Nevertheless, if dividing the whole task to several pieces and distributing them to numers of people, the task will be done quickly.
To sum up, cooperation can bring us a lot of profit in the aspects of not only study but interpersonal relationship as well.
And that's why I would like to choose to let the students work with others instead of doing tasks alone.

Everyone can make mistakes, no exception for the leaders or teachers when they are speaking.
Confront the providing controversial situation, I believe that the best solution is to wait till after class or discussion .
Initially, interrupt a person and pointing out a teach's mistake in front of all students can be a really unpolite behavior to do, even creating a seriously embarrasing moment for teachers.
In our culture, trationally one shoule never interrupt another one's conversation, especially when the person is the ones we should repect .

Also, pointing out a teach's mistake in fornt of all his students will create extremely embarrasing situation for the teacher since they are making the type of low level mistakes simply detectable by other students.
When I was in sixth grade, I shouted out a mistake made by my Math instuctor while he was talking.
The action was embarrassed him so badly that  his face turned red and the whole class was laughing at him for minutes.
As  the result, it is unrepectful to point out our teachers' mistake while they were still talking.
Secondly, interrupt our teacher and point out their mistakes can potentially damage our relationship with them.
It is important to maintain a positive relationship with our teachers since they are the ones that determine whether to work hard for their students or not.

I remembered that after that thing happened which I already mentioned in the second paragraph, there are a lot more chances limited such as asking him for a letter of recommendation anf maybe a volunteer tutoring session.
Therefore, interrupt teachers' mistakes during the class can have a bad influence on the relationship.
Moreover, telling the teacher after the class can be easier to establish a positive image in the teacher' mind.
Not only the action the student did can show the student' hign emotional quality, but also can let the teacher know how the thoughtful and hard- working student is.
And the benefitial result can come out---- more study chances and knowledge the student can get.

To sum up, we should never interrupt a teach and correct he or she right away in front of all their students,instead, we should tell him or her after class, since we should be a polite person and have the mind can determine the true or false.
I don't think it's a good idea.
The most important reason is that when chilren get used to get the benefits after they succeed, they will lose interest in some conditions when they can't get awards.
I myself am an example.
When I was a kid, my family didn't have the ability to live well.
My parents were always busy with their company.
That got our life better.
Otherwise, that made their lack of education for me.
The best way for them to make me hard in studying is to offer money when I got a great mark in school.
As I grew up that I had to face a lot of problems in my life but not any of them I could get awards from my parents.
So that result in a lack of motivation.
I gradually became lazy and homekeeping.
When I had to face to the problem I always choosed opportunism.
That's why I think this idea is not right.

What people should do to stay well-informed?
Some people believe that a person should retrieve information from various sources in order to be well-informed.
From my perspective, I strongly agree with this statement.
Firstly, a lot of information is inaccurate so that we need to look for different source to guaratee we get the correct.
Nowadays, the advancement of information technology enables us to find all sorts of information from Internet.
However, there are fraud information and message as well.
If we only look at one source, we can easily be deceived.
For example, in many rural areas, many people still believe that HIV can be infected by touching and hugging becasue they never look at other news sources.
People treat those patients as evil from hell and discriminate them badly.
But we all know that HIV will not affect people's daily communication.
So in order to get correct information, we cannot only fixate our mind and view at one objective.
Another rationale for checking different source is that it help us to look at things from different perspectives.
Modern society is highly globalised and values are much more uniform than ever before.

Yet many parts of the world still remain regmented and keep their unique standard; therefore, when we look at one thing, we need to learn others' view so that we can get a more comprehensive understanding about it.
For example, in most regions of the world, beef is one of the most welcomed food.
However, in India, cow is the scared animail and nobody eat beef at all.
All in All, I think that people need to check information from a variety of news sources becasue it can help us to find the geneiue message and understand things soundly.
