Currently, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate-whether people will spend less time cooking in twenty years.
Opinions vary from individual to individual.
Some people hold a negative attitude to this statement.
Nevertheless, I am firmly convinced that it is a tendency that people will cut down on the time spending on preparing food.
My view can be elaborated as follows.
First of all, people are more likely to eat outside in restaurants in the future.
To be more specific, with the rapid development of science and technology, our society is improving at an alarming speed.

As a result of wealth accumulation, people are more willing to enjoy a better life ao that they tend to go to advanced restaurants to taste delicious food from all over the world and appreciate the fantastic atmosphere there.
In contrast, at present people are less capable of affording the high prices in restaurants and they have no option but to spend much more time cooking at home.

A research conducted by Wuhan University is a good case in point, in which scientists investigated more that one thousand people across China about their frequency of going to the restaurants and the time spent on cooking over the last thirty years.
It turned out that the same participants thirty years ago tended to spend twenty five hours in kitchens every week, much more than the time today.
Besides, robots may substitude people and cook food for the family in the future.
To further illustrate my point, in modern society robots are a hot topic and countries in the world are attaching more and more importance to the development of robots.
The governments provide sufficient money for the scientific research institutions and students in college are also sparing no effort to promote the relevant techniques.
So despite the fact that robots are still not common at present, they are likely to step into each family and prepare food in the future.
For example, currently in America, scientists in MIT has invented a new robot which is competent to do laundries, cook food, clean the house and so on.
It is crystally clear that those robots are likely to become normal products and purchased by people.

Of course,it's unwise to give children a large amount of money once a time,since that childeren will seek only for money when studying.

As mentionend above, there exists one phenomenon that some parents offer their children money each time they get high grades in school.

In my opinion, I'm highly agreeable of the behavior.
I owe my view to reasons mentioned as follows.

Some money that will be given to them not only function as a form of recognition of children's effort but also serve as a encouragement and compliment to kids.

They may face a seris of problems which are difficult and intricate to cope with.
By earning possessions in this way, these children may realize the difficulty to gain money and such behavior will have a benefit on them to be more patient and deligent.
As far as I'm concerned, some measures ought to be taken in two aspects to deal with the situation.
On one hand, parents should  be more patient and give some appropiate education to their children, along with the reword.
On the other hand, children is obliged to care about their parents more and try to understand thier parents.
All in all, only with constant and joint efforts from both the parents and kids can we make the circumstance better.

At present, a contraversial topic has aroused a heated debate: whether young people today are more prone to invest their time and efforts in perfecting the world than young people in the past.
Answers vary from one to another.
Some people claim that young people don't pay attention to the development of the world nowadays.
Howeverï¼Œcontrary to their view comes my own perspective that young people in the modern society indeed pay much more attention to the world around them and are more willing to improve the world.
My viewpoint is based on the following reasons.
First, the swift development of society provides young people much more convinience to change the world.
To be more specific, with the advent of AI era and Internet generation, nowadays people usually handle their tasks on Internet.
Only through manipulation on the computers can people finish a series of transactions or other businiess in a short time.
As we all know, young people are skillful in using the high-tech so they could easily finish the tasks assigned for them, which may be one part of improvement of the world.
For example, my brother Jack started a Internet company whose field is social media.
My brother is only 24 years old and his team members are also very young.

Seen as a group of young children without social experience by the public, mu brother's team fully exploited the convinience the Internet provided for them and spend so much time and efforts in creating an socialization app.
When the app came out , it made a hit.
This app has more than thousands of active users.
If my brother lived twenty years ago, their team could not have made such a great success.
Second, modern education also increase young people's awareness of devotion to development of the world.

Specifically, with the improvement of the foudamental education, more and more young people realize that they shoulder the responsibility to make the country and even the world prosperous since they are the young generation of the world and they are equipped with the required professional knowledge and capacity.
For example, my father was born in a time with poor condition and was not well-educated.
As what he had told me before, what he only wanted to do in the young age was just to support his family and find a suitable spouse.
That's quite different from what young people think nowadays.
What we put in mind is that we need to totally use the knowledge we have learned to repay the society.
In conclusion, young people are indeed more likely to spent their time and endeavors in improving the world.

In recent years, with the advancement of technology and improvement of household income, more and more citizens have easy access to personal computers at home, which means that children are more likely to be exposed to computers when they are young.
Therefore, various computer games are available for youngsters nowadays.
Some people hold the view that playing computer games is totally a waste of time and little kids should be prohibited to play.
From my own perspective, I can't agree with  that idea since I believe that playing computer games is beneficial to children to some extent and the following reasons will support my points.
First of all, playing computer games provides children a good opportunity to a acquaint with others and obtain social skills such as communication and teamwork.
Children who are limited in the classroom and have less chance to meet more people in their lives, as a result, playing computer games offers them another way to know people who have the interests.

In addition, cooperation and effective communication are needed while playing computer games, so on the other hand, computer games encourage children to talk with other players efficiently, besides, they will have the notion that teamwork is an essential part to gain success in the future.
Furthermore, computer games not only improve intelligence but also release children from study pressure.
A lot of games require children to have extensive knowledge and deep thoughts to finish tasks.
It means that they have to think all the time.
Moreover, under the increasingly heavy burden of academic study, children intend to play computer games for relaxation.
Thus, their mind will be refreshed, their concerns will be forgotten and then they can restart their study better.
However, we have to admit that some children are addicted to computer games and they are too immature to refuse temptation.
It is the real reson why people think that playing computer games is time-consuming for children.
But parents can give their children correct guidance and supervision to solve the problems.
For example, they can regulate the time spent on games and prevent children from violent games.
All in all, I can draw a conclusion that computer games will benefit children instead of ruining them only if we lead them to the right way and it is an excellent thing to enrich their lives.
With the development of Internet, the whole world is developing into an so-called "earth village", making information sharing become available.
Some events happening at the end of the world will be known immediately.

Some people believe that it is essential to know about events that happen around the world, while others think that this is uncessaray because these events are so far away from us and will not affect our lives.
As far as I am concerned, I strongly believe that we need to know about events happening around the world.
Firstly, knowing about more events around the world will be good for us to develop critical thinking ability.
Sometimes some events will be fiercely dicussed by people.
In the process of learning about these events, you can see many opinions and comments from different people.
Then you need to tell which is right and which is wrong.
You even cannot help discussing with your friends.
In order to support your own idea, you have to collect a lot of information in the library or on the internet.
All these wil do good for your critical thinking ability.
Secondly, being aware that many terrible things are happening in the world will make you treasure your life better.
As for me, everyday when I read the news, I can see that many people are suffering from hunger, thirsty, violence, even war.
All these things are so far away from my life that I can never imagine the scene without the news.
Everytime I see these events, I will feel that I am so lucky to live in my country and so happy to grow up in my own family.
Thirdly, knowing more events in the world will make you be more intelligent when making decisions about your own life.
We are often confronted with many choices and sometimes we don't knoe what to do.
If we are able to know some familier things previously, we will be more confident and intelligent when we are making a decision.
To sum up, I think events happening around the world are all connected with us.
Knowing more about them will help us be more intelligent, have critical thinking ability and make us feel happier.

Nowadays, the teaching ways of parents are way different from the past since the condition of the education is totally different.
some poeple think that children now don't have the ability to make their own decisions because their pearnts just choose all the selection for them.
I don't agree with this idea for several reasons.
Admittedly, young people nowadays are more talent and smarter than the one in the past which means they are more capable to solve problems becasue they have a better condition of educate.
Besides, they don't need to make a lot decision becasue their parents will fix those out and they just need to do whatever their parents say since their parents will not harm them.
Since making decisions can spend you plenty of time, if you save that time, you can do more things like finishing your homework or taking a rest.
Also, young people are too young to make some important decisions like which university they go or what job they take.
These significant selection are necessarily discussed with you parents because young people usually don't have enough experience about the job or the society.
Therefore, let your parents to make that decision seems to be the best choice.

In addition, since the young people usually don't take options by themselves, their ability of choosing and making decisions will reduced which means the young people now are not as capable as the young poeple in the past at the aspect of making the decisions.
For example, a student is about the age of getting to the university and his parents have already chosen his school, his major and his career.
From the thought of the parents, they think that they have made the best choice for their child.
In fact, the fact is nearly opposite because if a person doesn't make any decisions, he will lose this ability of judging the value of each selection.
His parents can make the choice for him temporarily but eventually he will leave them and live alone.
However, at that moment, his ability of making decisions has just exploited  by his parents for replacing him to make choise.
So obviously the young poeple in the past are better able to make decisions about their own lives.
Finally, in the past, the parents often didn't have enough time for taking care of their children.
Thus, they would not take the place of their children to make decisions which means people in the past had more opportunties to make choice about their own lives by themselves.
In doing so, they can better able to choose the best decision for themselves.
In conclusion, I believe that the young people in the past were better at making decisions about their lives.

Nowadays, there are a growing numbers of univerisities are established.
When choosing which unniversity to enter, students have to consider many aspects of it.
With regard of what stand for the greatness of a university, many people might think that universities owning famous professors is essential.
As far as I am concerded, i believes that universitier whose graduates can hunt good jobs in the future is more attarctive.
Frist and foremost, the most common reasons for high school students to enter a unniversites is to seek a well-paid job after graduation.
Owning to the fact that a job that provide high salary is contributed to improve physical and mental well-being, many unniversity students set it as a goal.
A great job always ensure people a brillant future.
There is no better illustration of the point better than the example of my cousin, Jack.
When he just finished his university entrance exams, he have to choose a dream school for the next four years.
For his future achievement, he choosed a great university that most  of its gradutates ended up as a famous banker.
By attending this kind of univerisities, he is very likely to have a decent job in the future.
Had he not entered a school like this, he might have to spend plenty of time to make his dream come true.
In addition, these universities that are able to ensure graduates a good jobs means they have better educators.
As we can see, if graduates can get a decent job, he or she must be equiped with some basic skills and knowledge, which means he or she have a great teacher.
For instance, my brother , Allen, now is a successful lawyer.
When I ask him about how he gain his job, he always mentions about a professer he met in his university.
He said that his professer have a gift to simplify those hard concepts and help his students to understand them.
To this end, most of his students can grasp these knowledge and get decent jobs after graduation.
As the example indicates, universities like these always have better professers.
There is no denying that universities where there are famous professors are not good.
Famous professors means this school have a advantage in research.
But these professors are famous because of their researches, not teaching skills.
So, if someone want to learn some specificed knowledge in some field and be a researcher, these school might be a good choices.
But for most of students, they are not concerned about this, hunting a high- wage job is their goal.
So, for these above reansons, there are so much advantages we can get from a universities whose graduates can find good jobs.
As is illustrated in the passage,there are more and more parents giving their children for getting high marks.
I totally disagree with such behaviour.
It does more harm than good to children.
The reasons are as follows.
From where I stand,giving money to children as awards is such a bad thing.
First,children are too young to make a good use of their money.
It is easy for them to spend their money on useless things,like toys,candles,snacks and so on.
Not only will they form a bad habit of buying useless things.
But also they will become easily annoyed when they can't afford to buy things they want.
If they are easy to be saitisfied by materials,they will tend to be unwilling to communicate with their families or friends.
What's more,high grades can not be identified as money.
As students,trying to study well and gaining more knowledge is our duty.
We learn not for our parents,but for ourselves.
We should be responsible for our own future.
At the same time,as parents,we can't attach much importance to children's grades.
It is one's ability,social skills,physical and mental health that really count.
Last but not least,we should teach children the difficult of gaining money,instead giving their money easily.
As the old saying goes,'No pains,no gains.'
Money is not easy to gain.
To make a sum up,it is not apporiprate for parents to give their children money for each high grade.
We should correct the wrong behaviour.
In my opinion,I do not reaaly agree with the behavior that these parents do.
We have to define the basic conceptions of money.
The money is the thing for a person to gain other things for exchange and a kind of disire that people may do sonthing rediculous for.
So here are three different ideas to suppot m own status.
Firstly,I have said that money is a kind of a desire for a person whatever it is for an adult for a kid.

In this case, the childrenmay regard the money as the feedback for their hih mark ,and this will certainly cause many bad impact for the children's idology because it is not good for a child to have such a kind of disire when he or she is young.
Secondly, the money is not for such a kind of "providing"for the children 's high mark.

When the children are having the test ,they will think that money is the only purpose for a test ,and this conseption is obviously wrong,so it is not hard to see that the children should have the right idea of  money and they shouldn't have the misunderstanding of money because of the tests.
Finally,which is the most important,the children should have the right under standing of their tests.
The test for the children is to check the efficiency and how well or bad they study for the long or short period before.
So in this case, is it properly for parents to use money to measure their efficiency?
Of course not.
It will just let them to gain the marks for money but not to check themslves,and they would misundertad the conception of a test.
In conclusion,the children should have a right idology of the test that they atre having and don't let the money to have the unproperly influence on them.
What's more ,the money should be given in the proper time from parents to children because the way of giving money is also a way to show parent's own meature attitude somehow.
I don't think it's a good idea that "some parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade thay get in school.
Nowadays,many children study just for the prize that from their parents,even most of children don't want to study at all.
Giving the money to children for their high grades make the children utilitarian and lack of the independent.
Firstly,giving money for good grades will make the children think that studying just for money and it is not their own thing.
I had a friend when I studied in meddle school.
this friend's parents would gave the money to him when he got good grades.
During this time, his grades are very high and he studied most of time.
But one day,his parents didn't give money to him,and he argued with his families and his grades started to be lower,he never be the interested in study.
Studying is a neccessary thing for children, whatever they can get the money or not.
Secondly,giving money will make the children think it is easy to get the money and waste money.
My friend Mike is a good student, he always get high grades,and his families give him money as the prize.
In this way, he often spend money on many things,and he don't know how to save the money.
For instant,he often buy some stuff and never wonder the prize.
When someone told him that he should save money,he usually say"I will get money from my parents,becuase I have gotten high grade."
Although children get the money by themselves, it not good for them.
Summerize, I disagree with that parents offer their children money for each high grade they get in school.
Becuase it not good for the ghildren's thinking and mental.
After the industrializaton, the workers bacome an undispensiable part of the world.
How to let the workers to work in an more effective way and how to make the worker happier during their work time are widely concerned by a lot of people.
I think it is obviously that the workers are more satisfied when they have many diierent types of task to do during the workday than they only do similar tasks all day along.
Here are some reasons to support my view.
First, different types of tasks can prevent the worker from feeling boring of the similar work.
Everyone in the world likes to learn something new, to explore the things we don't know.
When workers are faced with multi-works.
The can know something new or get some different feelings which they haven't experienced before.
That will make them feel interesting and be more satisfied with their work.
On the contrast, if the do the same thing everyday, that a really bad and monotonus sense for them.
Even listening to a beautiful music for all day will let us don't want to hear it any more, not to mention the baring work the workers are facing.
On top of that, diiferent types of of task make the workers think they can achieve a great deal of things.
No one wants to do the same thing all day for that's seem that he can only do this thing.
If ther get many types of task, they may think they are versatile and it brings them a kind of achievement.
This will absoutly make them feel satisfied.
Supposing that you are now work in a IT cpmpany, and your leader give you a lot of things to do.
You may design different programms and prove you can make it.
That will make you feel much better than just recite the same work you type in da after day, which make you feel you are useless.
This example strongly demonstrate that they will be more satisfied if they are allowed to do different kinds of work
In a nutshell, giving workers different types of work can make them feel more interesting as well as a kind of fufillment.
So  they are more satisfied with their work under such a condition.
For most of the families, both fater and mother are workers, which means that they have to be busy doing their work leaving little time to spend with their children.
However, the time spending with parents are quite important of the growth of a child.

When parents have limitted time for their children, some contens that it is best to use that time doing things together that are related to schoolwork, which from my opinion, is stupid and not  necessary.

Recently, an interesting problem that many people discuss about:children spend more time on doing homework or participating in organized activities related to school or sports.
However, whether they should be given more time to do whatever they want.
I think children should spend more time to do whatever they want.
My point can be well illustrated as follows.
Firstly, children can be more concentrated in the fuild they like.
If children don't like do something but they must to do, they will fell very miserable to do that and cannot do it well.
But if children are interested in that filed, the will do it carefully.
For example, a girl likes drawing very much, and she want to be painter, but her prarents drive her to do sports, this will make the girl cannot do everything well.
If her parents just let her do what she really want to do, she can put attention on it, and she can be more careful and concentrated.
Secondly, let children spend proper time in what they what they want to do may help them to release pressrue.
These days, parents always push their children hard and children always feel tired.
And do whatever they want sometimes can help us rest ourselves and let us be motivated to do next.
For me, if I study every day, and just do things my parents or teachers ask me to do, I will fell bored and annoyed.
But in this time, if I can listen to a music, I can release myself in order to be more active.
But some people think that children just need to spend more time on doing homework or participating in organized activites related to school sports.
These are the students' mission.
But children not just need knowledge and skill, they also need happiness.
If they are not happy, they may cannot be successful because they don't have motivation.
For these reasons, I think children should spend be given more time to do whatever they want.
Recently, a noticiable topic arouse the inmemsely discussion: whether different types of works or similiar tasks all day satisified workers.
Varied people have distinct sights.
Some people think similar work can make people focus on the task they do, and people will do well in this work.
However, I hold the view that different kinds of assignments encourage people a lot.
My view can be elabrated as follow.
To begin with, varied tasks cultivate worker the ability of time management.
If people do many different works in a day, he should make a plan and arrange every hour work he should finish.
Handle a good work pace to complete all the task.
However, if a person who similiar work day by day, he will became quickly.
He will just finish the work without any plan, and he will lose the chance to get the ability of time management.

Imaging a person, he should make the marketing plan, order the standard work process, accout the revenue, each one of this is complicated, so he have to make the precisely plan in order to finish them.
It is crystal clearing that workers who want to get the ability of time management satisified in mutiply tasks.
In addition, different kinds of tasks make workers have creative thinking.
People are able to find the connection in different works, through which may inspire them improve the working methods and company strategies.
It is also a kind of creative thinking from interaction of different works.
In opposite, people who do similiar work all the time will not be access to new thing.
They can not get insight from the work.
To sum up, i convince that different is the better onit is not only can develop the time management skills but also get creative thinking and inspiration from doing different types of work.
When thinking about the issue that whether parents should offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school,different people have different ideas.
While some people may believe money stimulates children to work hard to get good mark continully, I think that it might cause children to learn just for money other than intrests and fun.
Parents do expect their children to get good marks in exam, because they want their children to have a brighter future.
But stimulations like money will let childrens think they learn just in order to earn more money.
This way copletely ruins the begining of education.
The principle of education is to build nomative citizions and thus make the future of the society harmonious.
Using money to stimulate children will make them becoming some people who live for their own intrests.
So they will be selfish.
Second, using money as rewards may make cheating in the exam becoming more and more.
If a child can get good marks in the way of cheat instead of answering the questions honestly, he or she may become a dishonest person.
The children grow in this way could do anything even illegal to achieve his or her goal in the future.
Third, although things like money can be a reward to make children work harder in study.
But it should be limited and not being used frequently.
We know human like other animals are active to reward.
But human must live in a more moral way instead of living by stimulates.
Thats what makes us human different from other anmials.
We have dreams and rules, and we can enjoy the fun of thinking learning new knowledges.
After all, it will be better for parents not to use money as a reward for high grade their children get in school.
Government is an indispensible part in our life, it plays a part of regulating and supporting citizens and the city.
But sometimes the budget is limited, government has to decide how to allocate the financial money.

Some people says that as internet plays a more and more important role in our daily life, it's more necessary and essential for the government to put money in improving the access to internet than in improving the public transportation.
However, I hold the different opinion that it's public transportation is at least as important as the internet.
To begin with, public transportation benefits people a lot as bring them convenience to wherever they want.
Although many people in the urban area have the priviate cars already, but there are stills many families don't  own a car.
For those people, the only way for them to go somewhere far away is to take the public transportation such as bus or subway.

Even for the families who already have a car, the public transportation is necessary too, for not everyone in the family have the ability to drive, especially young children and elders, when they encounter some difficulties or some emergencys, it's very unconvenience for them to call the their parents or childern who are in their working places back and take a ride.
Also, it's very cheap, so many people prefer that way to go on a trip.
For me, I take the subway to shool everyday, and I can't imagine that how unconvinence it might be if the public transportation can't work in this way.

In addation, it's necessary for the government to improve the public transportation because the demands of the public transportation has been increasing all the time, and the existing routes can not satisfy all the people.
More and more people now tend to live in the rural aeras but work in the urban aeras.
It's mainly because that many people can not afford the crazy dramatically increaing house prices and some people also prefer to live in the quiet place to avoid the hustle and bustle of the cities.
Since there are always long ways for them and traffic jams happen all the time, people are likely to take the public transportation both for saving money and for avoid being late for work.

But now many public 'transportation has not been developed perfect enough to meet people's need, and subways are too expensive for companys and individuals to bulid, so in my perspective, it's necessary for public to do that for citizens.
Comparatively the access to internet can be done good enough with the companys, so there is no need for government to do that.
Lastly, Public power is never less about environment than about economics, public transportation is also a good way to protect the environment.
So reflecting on those things, it's quite overt that the public transportation is most in need of government's attention.
There is no doubt that the money should be put into the right place where is necessary and important to provide convenience and nice environment to people living in the city.

Nowadays, a considerable number of people, holding the idea that students shouldn't take any part time jobs while they are studying in the university, claim that part time jobs will waste them a large amount of time.
However, personally speaking, I don't agree with their opinion.
I advocate that taking part time jobs will take the students much more benefits.
There are two main reasons to support my claim.

There is no doubt that spending too much time on part time jobs will have negetive influence on the students' study because those part time jobs will take the students too much time and they may be find it not easy to have enough time for study.
However, spending appropriate amount of time on part time jobs can be beneficial.
Firstly, the main reason to support my opinion is that part time jobs is good for our future career and our future life.
We can learn far more from the jobs than what we can acquired from classes, such as how we can cooperate with others, and how we can solve some sudden events.
Those experiences are doubtlessly good for us, because we may face all these problems in our future life, and if we have solved them once, we can deal with them more easily.
For example, one of my classmates used to take a part time job in the library, and now, after graduate, he can find the job much more easier than those who have never take a part time job.
Another factor why I agree with the above statement is that taking a part time job can lighten our economic pressure.

As many students who have well academic performance don't grow in the wealthy families, and it is not easy for those families to pay for the fee for college, taking a part time job for those students seems to be necessary.

Even for those students who don't need to care about the tuition, the salary from a part time job can make their life more colorful because they may have much more free money to eat out campus rather than just have meals in the cafe, or they can have fun with friends on weekends.
In a nutshell, what we have mentioned above, when taken together, are in favor of the point that taking part time jobs is beneficial for students.
During the class, teachers will always ask some students to announce their opinions about questions and they will correct the mistake part of the answers.
However, if some student are stuck with their own opinions, they may not listen to the teachers and just interrupt the class to refute the teacher.
The other cases is that the students will just be slience about that.
I think that the best way to deal with this situation is waiting until the class is over and then talk with the teacher to disscuss about the mistake.
First of all, if teachers point out the mistake from student's answer, the answer usually will be wrong or odd.
Therefore, students have to talk to their teachers about the errors and try to correct that because it is very important to find and solve the problems during the studying.
for example, a student is asked to answer this question and his professor just says that there are faults in his answer.
At that time, if the student comes to the professor's office and has a conversation with the professor about the inaccuracy, he can know which part of this sbuject he doesn't master or understand it.
Though this opportunity, he can review this unit and strength his understanding about that part which can benefit his test.
In addition, even though one can correct his opinion immediately at the class by interrupting the teacher, his understanding and memory about that question is still unstable and inaccurate.
More inportantly, it is very unrespectful and rude to just interrupt someone when he or she is talking no speaking of he or she is your teacher.
When one disturbs the class, many students will be affected and their time is wasted because a student wants to correct his answer.
Thus, it is a really selfish behavior to bother the class and students' learing.
Finally, saying nothing is even worse than interrupt the class because one can't learn anything from the mistake if he doesn't care about that error.
It seems like that it is the best way to deal with this situation because it will not even bother the teachers.
However, students will not learn anything.
Therefore, even though the professor points out the mistakes, it is useless to do that since you don't even want to correct that.
In conclusion, I think the best way to dispose  this condition is waiting for the class is over and talk with your professor about that.
I don't think it's a good idea for parents offer their children money when they get higher mark.
For this oppion, I would like to  give 3 reasons.
Firstly, study is the duty of students, they did not need any money to encourage.
All they need is caring from parents, they do not need any money.
Only caring from parents will bring up children's motivation.
In addition, parents should build up the oppion for children that you are not study for me, it's all good for yourself.
This oppion is will have a good influence for the children, it will be useful after they get in to sosialty.
If parents do this, children can also cultivate by them.
Last but not least, parents earn money outside, is not easy they work very hard, they don't have the duty to provide children money to keep them study better.
Maby it's not believable, so I will give you a example about my oppion.
In my senior school, one child called Jack have the same experience with the Topic.
HIs parent encourage he study by gave he money.
It seem working very well at first, he get a good grade and his parent is also think its' worthy.
But good thing does not last long.
After get a lot of money from his parent, he by himself a smartphone and stood up late to play it.
Not soon, his geade falling rapitely and his parent discover taht he is addict to smartphone.
So his Mom take his phone away and stop give him money to encourage he.
After that, he lost the mind to study and argue with his parents about the question about hia money.
No sonner then, he becam one of those bad child.
In a word, I think there are no any advantage for parents to give money to  their children when they get higher mark.
Nowadays, in order to encourage school-age children to get high grade, some parents come into the idea that they can give money to children for each high mark they get in school.
Of course it is a good method for high score and it will encourage the students to be more hardworking.
However, the disadvantages overweight the advantages.
Using money to ecouraging students may be useful at the beginning, but it can give bad influence on children's longterm development,making they to compare and fail to establish their ideal.
To see in the short term, money is a great gift in children's eyes and they are definitely willing to learn harder for money.
As a result, they get high grades in school, and at the same time, more money.
Both the parents and children would be satisfied with this results.
However, to see in a long term, it is not a good deal.
Firstly, when students all learn hard to earn money, they might compare with each other who have more money but not who get a higher grades.
Different families can afford diffirent amout of money for high marks.
Such comparison between students may lead to the thought of students in poor families that they are not as wealthy as others and is of course, not what we expect to happen.
Secondly, just consider what is the students study for?
It is not the knowledge or even a high grade that they study for, but the money.
School-age children are just too young to recognize that what is the most important thing.
They see things easiy and all they can learn through the deal is that they study to earn money and they can buy CDs, games using the money they earn.
However, a good society should educate children to learn for themselves, learn for science and even for their society and country.
Students that are well-educated should have great ideals but not just dream of making more money.
Such deals are not beneficial for students to construct their concept of value and the world and an outstanding dream.
In conclusion, although offering money to school-age children for a high grade may be effective at the beginning, it can give bad influence on children's longterm development.
Thus parents should not do this but let the students learn for themselves a good grade instead.

Nowadays, finding job is mush harder than past.
Should people take a secure job first or just wait for a job that would be more satisfying?
I think it is good way to get the secure right away.
At first, working in a secure job can bring you the working experience that may need for better job.
Many company tend to hire people that have working experience today.
And we can laern many useful things from the secure job.
For example, one of my friend was major in computer science.
After graduation, he chose to work in KFC rather than wait for a more satisfying job.
During this work, he learn many things  about how a restaurant worked.
A year later, he got a really good job in a Internet campony, because the boss here wanted to make a APP about take-out food.
He is the only one who know both computer and restaurant.
So the job that we may not very like may bring more than just money to us.
On the other hand, take a job first can earn money.
If some one have aleady graduated from school and he has no job, it must be his perants give his money to live.
It not a really good thing, right?
Getting a job can make money without the help of your family, your family can spend money in more important things.
My uncle's son have finished his school work for four years, but he does not find a good job until now.
It takes his family a big amount of money to feed him.
Because of that, my uncle stops driving car to save money.
It does make some problem.
So I think a person should find a job as soon as he can.
Although a satisfying job seems very appealing.
But you can find job when you work in a secure job.
That is a very common thing now.
If you find a more satisfying job, you can leave your job and take the job interview.
So you can find job while working instead of just waitting.
Many successful people have getten more than one job.
So it is a good idea to the the secure job first.

To be honest is becoming more and more important in our daily life.
Have you known some persons choose to tel a lie to their friends on their birthday so that they can give a surprise to the friends?
Besides, have you noticed the situation where the civilian doesn''t give his or her ticket fee when netering the subway and is caught by the police?
Have you ever reminded you were criticized by your parents for your dishonesty?
Through all the things above, we can indicate that telling the truth is not the best the choice at all circumstances.
First, when you want to give someone a surprise without letting him or her knows, you'd better not tell the person the truth.
For example, when a friend of mine was going to celebrate his birthday, we gave no reaction to his any behavior.
And I believed he was extremely let down by us.
And he almost angry with us for not remembering his birthday and didn't want to be our friends any more.
In fact, when he went back to his home at night, we all appeared and gave him a huge surprise which made him very delightful.
Can we have this effect if we had told the truth to him previously?
Obviously not, so sometimes not telling the truth may be better.
But in some other situations, the honesty is significant.
We can take an student who went German for further study.
I read this story on a book.
The first time she took the bus in German, she found a error of the system, through which she could take a bus without any expense.
And she thought she was so lucky, and since then, whenever she took a bus to somewhere she chose to escape the ticket fee.
At last, she was refused by a company for dishonesty when being interview for a job.
That was what she needed to pay for her dishonesty.
Excatly, others know the truth they can escape the ticket fee, but they thought the truth is important.
So they told the truth, giving the fee that they need to pay.
Lastly, telling a truth is crucial when you are talking with a child, because the child need to be educated how telling the truth is significant.
Because in case of this, they won't be a liar in the future.
When I was small, I stole my deskmate's book because I liked that book so much.
But I didn't tell my parents the truth.
After they knew this, they asked me to apologize to my deskmate and give the book back to him.
I think they are teaching me the honesty is something that we cannot lost as a child.
As the society evolving and developing in such a high pace,  the whole globe is becoming much more compact.

Since the correspondence between regions and continents grows more intense and close, it is believed by some that it is virtually important for us to know about events happening around the world, even it seems unrelated to our daily life in the current.
According to my oponion, I am strongly in favor of this statement.
The world is becoming smaller, but it does not necessarily mean that the issues happening in a neighbor country will not affect our life in the homeland.
Many people believe that they do not run big corperations or something bigger than that, thus it is not their concern to pay attentiont to macroeconomic environment.
Their chief purpose is just to focus on their work at hand in order to sustain themselves.
Whereas, better understanding of the issue happening in the larger sacle indeed helps people to obtain a general idea about the likelihood of the future prosperity in their own field.
Take the business of online shopping for example.
The CEO of Alibaba, Ma Yun, just decided to creat his company right after he paid a visit to the United State, which firmed his blief of the future properous business direction.
Besides, knowing what is taking place around the world also helps people to get a foundamental common sense.
It is showed in an interview,  that one of the several critical ingredients belived to be the keystone of their success by those palce-goers, is their common sense.
They spend large chunks of time on reading news and gather information,  merely aiming at figuring out what is happening around the world, or what is changing the world.
That is to say, they try to have as full-pictured views as possible based on these facts and events they have known about the world.
With a ouverall perpective, they said they were endowed with the power to make right decisions to make them succeed.
Adimittedly, this process will cost a lot of time and resources, and sometimes it even seems to be a waste if it does not yield immediate retribution.
However, knowing more about this world we live in, it also becomes more likely that people can change the world by merely one brilliant idea.

And looking for the infomation about the world itself can be interesting and amusing since it really broaden our horizen with amazing experiences of others or in other regions, which we may not undergo through out entire life.
Such is human nature that we are in need of pauses during our long life journey.
An interesting phnomenome is that Chinese crowded in cinemas or other enterianments while a typical American choose the jym.
I prefer the American lifestyle----doing physical exercise plays a better role in ways to relax.
On the one hand, it's more benifitial for human brain.
On the other hand, it costs less.
According to a recent survey, means of entertainment assume our brain just as the way studying or working does, varying in different degrees.
After watching a rather long and complicated movie or novel, you may indulge in the plot and have a hard time get back to yourself, which is by no means a consequence of a good relaxation.
Whereas, your brain is forced to block out all the thoughts when you are doing physical exercising.
Thus, your brain is fourtunate enough to get a good relax without running continously to reflect the content you obtain in a movie or book.
Secondly, and distinctly, physical exercises like jogging and mountain-climbing cost you almost no money.
A VIP card of an excellent gym a year may be cheaper than dozens of books and movie tickets.
Neverthless, a healthy and fit body, free from hospital and heaith-care, is the priceless gift you are presented alongside a relaxation for yourself.
People tend to search for a movie or book to relax themselves mostly because it always takes steel-like will to hold on to a regular phsical exercise.
That is the truth.
However, as is known to all, harder things are with better return.
What' more, you are to be used to it and enjoy your exercise as long as you stick to it and taste the joy and comfortable feeling.
Watching a movie or reading a book will of course help you feel better under pressure, but physical exercising is actually what relax your brain and function better in a lower cost.
Whenever you feel overwhelmed, go for a running or visit the jgm.
You will get better!

Friends are those who can help when you are in trouble and who you can share sadness and happyness with.
When being aksed about the question whether people need the ability to maintian friendships within few people or the cability of making new friend easily.
However, the ability I treasure most is maintaining long-lasting friendship.
Initially, keeping a close friend around need to get through the test of time so it will demand not only people's communication skills but also people's ability to cope with problems between friends.
Fresh affection can always be exciting, but it won't last long when certain problems show up and people can't solve them in time.
Thus, it cost conflict between two friends.
For example, I met one of my friends ten years ago when we both went to a basketball court to play basketball in summer holiday.
It is easy for two people to be friends when the share the same hobby.
When the semaster began, what surprised me most is that we two became classmates.
And, of couse, we choose to be roommates.
That was when I realized it is not easy to keet friendship just by cmmunicating.
He liked stay late at night playing comuputer games but I was sencitive to the noise and could't fall asleep when he was playing games.
So we finally went to quarrel.
But we both want to keep this friendship.
So we had aserious talk to get things right.
We both need to made some changes.
He turned the sound of the game down and I used ear pluds.

Some people believe that leadership comes naturally and one cannot learn to be a leader.
As far as I am concerned, leadership is like everything else that can be learned through appropriate methods and hard work.
Firstly, there have been many scientific researches about leaderships.
Just like other things on this planet, leadership is being studies by various institutions and results are published on all kinds of scientific papers and journals.
Many organisations have been using those results to train their employees.
Even many governments adopt those method to improve staff's quality.
Secondly, many people have tried to be leader by learning and succeeded.
Taking myself as an example, I used to be shy and conversative.
I was unable to talk in front of people or gave out assignment even when I was asked to lead a project.
As a result, my team was always the worst one in the company.
In order to change this situation, I googled some papers from Internet to improve my ledership.
Following the steps from those scientific studies, I now can fluently talk in front paper and manage staff much more effectively.
However, many people still hold the thought that leadership is one's nature and cannot be learned because they could find any concrete example.
Admittedly, leadership is relatively a vague idea comparing to studies like math, chemistry and so forth.
It is something cannot see or tough.
It is something people can only feel.
And studies about it just started a few decades ago.
Although there are a wide range studies about it, there is few reports about it for most of the results are still immature and imcomplete.
But this could refutes the fact that scientists have already made huge progress in this field.
In summary, leadership can be learned.
For one reason, althgouh the studies in this field haven't been able prove conclusive result, various studies has been conducted.
For another, I, myself, benefited a lot by puting effort in studying leadership.
Nowadays, people are exposed to more pressure than ever before.
Therefore, it is of significance for people to properly arrange the time of work and have time to have a rest.
Given the choice between a three-days work with long hours and a five-days work with short hours.
I would definitely choose the latter one without any hesitation since a short period with heavy workload will destroy the schedule and do harm to our physical conditions.
To begin with, working for a long time will excert a bad influence on our health.
Physically speaking, after a long period of keeping seating, the level of blood pressure will raise up and it can't provide enough oxygen to support our brains' work.
It will make us uncomfortable.
We can't concentrate on diong the job.
Mentally speaking,we may feel exhuasted and tired about the assignments.
If we don't take some measures like looking the scenery through the windows or standing up to take a walk, our efficiency on task will dramatically decreace.
And we will not finish the work before the deadline.
Therefore, I prefer to a five-days job for short hours.
In addition, working three days a week for a long hours will detroy the arrange plan.
diversified types of tasksWith the society advancing into the information age, more various means of tasks and jobs are available for workers to choose.
Conflicts will arise whenever workers' tasks decisions are to be made regarding the single or diversified.
Both of them are closely interrelated with the satisfaction of workers.
Some people attach greater significance to working different types of tasks than working the similar tasks all day long, while others hold the opposite attitude.
As far as I am concerned, I support the notion that working different types of tasks is far better than working similar tasks all day long.
Above all, the interest is of essential importance to workers' satisfaction.
In the face of diversified types of tasks, many wonders will occur in the workers mind, such as "what is it", " how can I accomplish it" and so on.
Undeniebly, through doing diversified types of tasks, interest is obtained.
As a recent research conducted by the State Labor Bureau indicates that over 80 percent will be bored and tired if they are dealing with the same or similar tasks for 3 hours.
Needless to say, under the circumstance of 8-hour day's working system, most of workers can't pay attention on the task in the left 5 hours, which means a waste of time for both workers and tasks.
Moreover, payment is not only needed by workers, but also the improvement of oneself's ability.
One will grow up more quickly and develop comprehensive abilities through doing diversified types of tasks.
In the beginning of one's career, it is impretive for him or her to be a comprehensive worker, thus, more payment and opportunies will obtained in the future.
We may cite my friend Jim's story, who is only 25 years old but has over 40,000 yuan salary per month.
Once I asked him why he owns both the employer's admire and high salary, he told me that he had accomplished diversified types of tasks before, which determines he can be qualified to the job now.
Indeed, the younger the workers are, the diversified types of tasks experience they need.
Judging from the above-mentioned argument, we may naturally arrive at the conclusion that workers are desire to work

With the rapid development of education, people nowadays tend to use money as a propellant to encourage their school-age children for receiving a high grade in school.
An interesting discussion has arisen among people: whether it is a good idea for parent to use the money reward to their children for study achievement.
From my perspective, I am in favor of the idea.
Here are my main reasons for holding this opinion.
First of all, it provides a excellent opportunity for students to get a sense of accomplishment.
Every time when they get reward from their parents, they build confidence to accept more challenges, which is conducive to receiving a sound mentality and positive attitude toward study.
Takes myself as an example, I used to acquire reward from my parents because of the good grade in school.
I felt a sense of achievement about it and willing to put more effort on the study.
Usually, I used the reward money to buy some favourite fiction books or fashion magzines.
I was satisfied with the outcome I once pursued and have more courage for the future.
In addition, reward money help enhance the family bond, which deliminates the generation gap between the children and their parents.
Because parents give the money as a praise for the school study.
It creates a common topic for them that can bring them closer.
Such as how to study so well?
How to spend the money they owned?
Children will know what expectation their parents pose on them and parents would understand how their children study in the school.
To some extent, the excellent family bond is the premise of a bright future for children, resembles the concrete foundation of architecture.
Admittedly, this manner might have some negative effect on children, which misleads them to regrad the salary and praise as the essence of study, not the real love to aborb knowledge.
However, it is a efficient way to encourage students to be keen on study and establish their confidence about themselves.
To sum up, I believe it is a good idea for parents to encourage their school-age children by using reward money.
Not only because it helps them get a sense of achievement but also because it improve the family relationshi

At presesnt,the people that you can have fun with may just want to get some profit from you.
Also, they may did not value the friendship between you and him or her when you meet some difficulties.
Besides, the friends who we can get help from is people that knows us better since they undrstand our weakness and willing to offer us a hand.
So, the friends you can ask for help are undoubtedly better than the friends who we just have fum with.
First, people have fun with you always have some other purposes then the frienship is mixed with some other things.
They cannot be called good friends.
The point can be best illustrated by the instance of my uncle, a bussinessman.
He always participated in some parties and he could always had fun with many people during the party and they surely had a great time.
But after the parties, my uncle paid little attenion to the connection with these people.
Instead, he would call or e-mail the friends who borrowed him money when he failed in business more.
I once asked him why, and he told me that during the parties, people all had their own purposes, they may just want to have some cooperatiion with you on business to earn more money.
So they would not treasure the frienship as much as the people who are willing to help you since they think you are a good friends.
And this kind of people would value the friendship most.
These friends is people that is worth of you to get to know.
Second, it is very likely that people who can play with you just isolate you when you have threats or difficulties.
Just as an old saying, '' A friend in need is a friend indeed".
For instance, I have had a friend who can play with me whenever he had time.
And we always had fun with each other, so at that time I thought he was the person who knew me most in the world.
But after my death of my grandfather which led to my psychological disease, he almost never talked to me since he was scared of my affecting him.
But some other classmates who I did not always play with came to encourage to go through th difficulties and fece the problems.
Thanks to their encouragement, not very long, I became the optimistic boy again.

And untill then I surely realized that they were the people who I should treasure and play with, they are willing to help with me and they are surely the friends I need because when I have trouble they would help me, when I face trouble they would face it with me.
I really agree with the statement that in twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today.
In todays society, more people pay attention on the environmental issues.
Thus, people will choose more environmental friendly way to go out.
And the use of cars will decreased obviously.
Because the cars will discharge a lot of harmful gas,  people will go out by some public transportations like bus, subway and bike.
With the time went by, the environment become worse and worse.
The most influence effect is the gas produced by cars.
So, the government will appeal people to use other transportations.
Also, people, themselves, will also try to build a comfortable environment by changing the transportation.
For example, nowadays, the bikes are more useful than asking for taxi.
Because,  if we use the phone to unlock the bikes, we can use the bikes quickly.
And  the cars are almost everywhere, so it is easy for us to find one.
In addition, using the bikes are cheaper and convenient.
We can park the bikes in the place that close to our destinations.
And everyone can afford the expense of using cars.
However, if we driving the cars or asking for taxi, we need to use more money and also slower than the bikes.
Considering the adventage of the other transportaion, people will wisely give up the cars and turn to other vehicles.
Also, the cars are really slow because we may always face some traffic jams.
However, the traffic jams can not be avoided because some accident factors such as the road accident.
We can never measure wehther we will be late or how we need to wait.
Also, in some large cities like Wuhan, There numbers of cars are too big that we may meet some traffic jams.
And what we can do is still waiting and waiting.
Adversely, If we use the subways, we can estimate the time exactly.
So why not people choose the other transportaion?
Of course, they will less use the cars in the future.
In my opinion, using cars have many disadvantages, which totally more than its advantages.
So, in twenty years, there will be fewer cars in use than there are today

Whether to give a child awarding money for their satisfing grade of an exam can be a controversial topic among parents.

While different people will have different opinions about this , as far as i am concerned, to give monry as an award for children just because the high grade seems not reasonable as the children usually have no abilities of money management.
Also, teenagers may be upset about not reach their parents expectations when there is no award.
These may lead the children to be cheat in the exam just in order to get the money.
First, children usually are in their formative years and it is possible for them to spend money randomly.

If parents provide such award for these kids, they may use the money to buy the game online or be addicted to bad habits, Since children could not distinguish what is really conducive to them in many situation, it is not a good idea to give them monry just because they get a high mark.
To take one of my classmate as an example.
When she was in the first year of the junior school, she was the monitor in the class and completed all the assignments without difficulties.
However things has changed when her parents awarded her sufficient pocket money.
She used the money to buy a mobile phone and became addicted to it.
As a consequence of this, she failed the exam eventually.
Had she not have the money for these kind of recreation, she would have never ruined her future in academic field.
Second, it is a responsibility for school kids to devoted themselves in studing rather than a mission from parents.
But with a money award, the study process seems to become a duty of their parents.
When the children are eager to get the money, they may turn to other solutions to meet their parents expectations.
This may lead to the misbehavior of their children, such as cheating in the exam just to finish the assignment of being a good student.
Under no circumanstance should we pass this kond of notions to the kids.
Although , a money reward can be a motivation for teenagers to dedicate themselve in study, obviously, in fact the disadvantages overweigh the benefit.
When a child focus more on the result rather than the process of the study, he will not achieve  the academic goal virtually.
In conclusion, to give kid monry as an award for their grades is not a good choice.
Children not konw how to use their monry in a beneficial way and this kind of awarding methor can lead to their misbehavior as well.

Addmittedly, offering prize is a way to encourage students, under the case of students will not be addicted to more prize.

Nowadays,people put too much empheasis on education because they think it is necessary to study hard ,which is vital to the success in the future job.
However,when it comes to the statement that people with ability to relate well to others is more important than studying hard in school,I strongly agree.
There are three reasons why I feel this way.

Admittedly,education is playing an increasing role in society ,which promote people to study hard in school and it is universally accepted that people with excellent records can succeed more easily than those with poor scores.
The good records means you have a large range of knowledge and a wide base of skills and the employers are more likely to appreciate those who study hard to recieve good scores.
However,hard work is not the only standard for peolpe to appraise a person.
In fact ,the excellent social skills are more essential to the success in future.
Because people with good social skills are able to cooperate with others very well,cooperation is also an important factor for people to succeed.
It is hard for people to survive without cooperating with others,that is the reason why there are so mant small busniess belong to the large corporation.
Because if they do not work with others,their besniess might plunge in the competitive society.
Finally,the society is becoming complex and there is a strong awareness that social skills are indispensable to success.

For these reasons,social skills can make people cooperate with others more easily and the realization of the importance of interpersonal skills.
Recently, an interesting question has aroused a heated debate among people: it is better for classmates to communicate their project in person that through emails.
Answer vary from peron to person.
Some claim that send email is the good way for classmates to communicate with each other.
However, I stand on the opposite site and I firmly believe that it is better for colleagues to communicate in person in order to do a project.
Some reasons and examples given below can illstrate my point of view.
First, communicate the project by facing each other is more convinient.

As we all know, the group project is a big work for every groupmate by finding information, making schedule and building the structure, which means everyone have their own role in the team and they need good cooperation.
So facing each other in one suitable timing is more convinient for them to communicate and assign the tasks.
On the contrary, sending emails waste the time and mess the task if the group numbers are not open their email in time.
For example, my history proffessor give the project for our group to let us write a paper about the ancient greek.
We picked a suiteble timing after the history class and gathered to discusse how to write the paper.
Just thirty minutes we assigned the task and sured the roles of everyone in this takes.
Finally we just using one week to finish this paper and make it great.
Second, communicate the project by facing each other is more effecient.
By facing each other, we can give the timely idea quickly and enspire more creative ideaï¼Œso the project would be finished better in content and time.
On the other hand, if you have some new idea about the project but you forget to send the emails to tell others, the project is hard to finish.
For example, my brother's math homework is to communicate with their classmates about the variey of equition in emails.
My brother fond some information about different equition but he forget to send all the massage to every classmates, so that some people miss the information.
My brother got C in this homework.
To put it in the nutshell, communicate with classmates by facing eachother is better that not only becaus it is more convinient but also because it is more effecient.

Nowadays,  it is a common phenomen that some parents will offer their children some money in order to encourage kids to work hard in school.

Some people consider it a good idea for it can stimulate children to try their best to get a good grade in an effective way, while others are strongly against it as they contend that in this way, students will develop a bad habit.
From my perspective, I agree with the latter point of view and my reasons are as followed.
To begin with, I believe that using this way to encourage students to work hard may have some good impacts, however, the disadvantages overweigh the advantages.
In other words,  parents may help kids to have a better achevements in school,but they may also render them have a negative sense of moeny.
For instance, when my litter brother was in primary school, he did not perform well.
In order to change this situation, my parents decided to give him some money as the reward.
Although I did not think it a good idea, my brother indeed studied harder so as to win the money.
For a long time, I thought i made a mistake ,but later, a incident proved that I was actually right, that was when I parents stopped giving my brother money, he refused to study anymore.
From this experience, I learn that  providing kids money as a way to stumulate them to study is absolutely a wrong method.
In addition,  in my opinion, parents should teach kids the hardness of earning money rather than give children easily.

That is to say, many kids who never earn money by themselves may have a false illusion that it is extremely easy to make money,and it is parent's responsiblity to correct their mistakes and help them to develop the right sense of money.
Taking my friend Lisa as an example, when she was little, at first ,his parents would give her money when she got good grade.
As we were little girls who did not know the importance of money, she would spend it right away on candies, beverages and so on.
After her parents became aware of theri mistakes, they diceide to offer her money after she finished some housework ,so that she could feel how hard it was to earn money.
In this way, Lisa really began to become more careful and considerate in spending money.
From her story,we can safely draw a conclusion that It is better to make students understand the importance of earning money.

In the end, there is no denying that giving children money indeed can help kids to study harder, but I think as there are so many other ways to encourage students to work hard, we can resort to other ways to enable student to have a better performance in
We all need to enroll in a school in some stage of our lives, and the majority of people want to find a good job after graduation.
Without a doubt, the school will do everything they can help them.
How can school improve the learning experience of the students is a very interesting topic, but as a student, I think the best way to improve it is to hire more teachers.
And I will explant that in the following passage.
First, hiring new teachers can boost up the teaching qualities.
In some schools like mine don't have enough teachers, so one teacher may need to teach multiple class and even two or more different subject.
The teacher needs to teach a large number of pupils, so they are fewer families with their own student which will not be able to provide more cutermon help to the individuals.
And even more, the teacher needs to prepare for the class that is in different subjects.
Putting the staff in that kind of heavy workload can bring down the teaching qualities.
For my own experiences, my math teacher is teaching three different class, and he is always busy in his office, a lot of people ask him questions.
Because he has a lot of homework needs to go through, how ether didn't have times for it, or we got our results really late.
So hiring new teachers can really solve that
Second, I think it's beneficial for the student to have more teachers.
We all know different people have different personalities, and teachers have different teaching styles as well.
The student can expose and adopt a new teaching style if they have different teachers.
Luke and I are best friends since elementary, and he has a new biology teacher.
The old teacher that he has when 7th grade only likes to scribe an animal or let him look at the picture in the textbook, and he gets very boring sometimes.
But the new teacher introduces the PPT into the class, and now he thinks the biology is very interesting because he can understand the concept easier since it's more vividly.
And as a consequence, his has been getting really good grades at biology.
unlike me, I find a hard time at my university because I don't like my teachers teaching styles.
The last, unlike the past, the technology are advancing at the high pace, we develop more and more teaching equipment so the student can learn better.
The new teaching tools and all kind of facilities are important as well, it's true it can make the student more engaged at the study but I still think it is not as important as a good teacher.
In the past, we still have exceptional students, and a good teacher can turn a boring history lecture into fun classes without the nowadays technologies.

Before our school brings the technologies into the class, our music teacher play the piano to class to let us sing, and that is so fun because we see a real person play a real instrument, and we love it.
But after school pitchers computer, is no need for the teacher play the song when you can just hit the play button on the computer screen.
Therefore we are no longer find music class fun anymore.
To wrap up hiring new teacher can help students a lot, the teachers can pay more attention to individuals, and the students can adopt new teaching styles.
It will be helpful later on.
And it definitely out wight obtion more facilities.

Since the development of high technology sometimes need a group of people to work together, the public are now encouraging students to work together, in order to let them learn how to cooperate with others.
But will they actually learn well through this way?
Here then comes to our question: Do the students accually learn uch more effectively than they work alone if they are asked to work together?
I totally agree with the statement because I think students can really learn alot by working together.
Firstly, students who work in a group can learn from others more than they work alone, they can use what they have learnt to preforme better.
Since they are woking with several people with the same goal, they will have to learn to listen to others.
And during their listening, they can always get something from the student who is speaking: the moral he or she has, the way he or she speaks......
As long as they got something new, they will try to use it in their work.
Thus they can performe better than they work alone.
Then they can learn much more effectively since they learnt from others and got something new, with the same period of time of studying alone.
Raise myself for an example, I love to work in groups, because each member works differently.

During the working process, I can always discover the advantages my clssmates have and I can learn from them, and as soon as I use those things I have just learned, this will make me work more effectively in the next study task.

Secondly, students that work together can learn how to cooperate with others, this is something they can not learn if they study alone, this is also one of the most important things they have to learn.
If everyone wants to work effectively, they have to avoid conflictions between team members, which refers to cooperate.
They have to take care of others feelings and express their opinion appropriately.
In this way, they will learn that they are a group rather that a single individual, everyone has to make effort to keep the group work effectively.
I still remember that a class in my grade once had to take part in  a competition about one project, at first the students often had argues with each other and they did not work well.
Then one of them realized that they have to stick together rather than having argues.
So they tried to cooperete with each other, and at last won the first prize of the school.
Thirdly, students who work together can do with the area that each person is the best at, so they can accelerate thier working rate and finish their projects effectively.

If student A is good at organizing, student B is good at caculating, they they can make themselves do their best area so that every part of the project will be performed at the highest level and of the shortest time.
Then the whole group can work effectively, My class work this way, if we have an unknown question, each of us do the best areas we are, and share our results together.
Then we can get the best answer, and thus work effectively.
I think it is a good idea.
Offering money to children for their high grades is practical.
