There are many methods for governments to spend money.
Some people argues that improving internet access is the best choise while others hold the view that spending money to improve public transportation is better.
Although it is always wise to make people transport conveniently, I strongly believe in enhancing internet access becausee it can benefit more people.
Moreover, it can expand people's horizen and strengthen their bonds between each other.
Firstly, spending money to improve internet access will benefit more people.
There's mounting amount of people choose to stay at home on their spare time.
For example, many of my friends are more willing to play video games or watch movies at home.
Under this circumstance, reinforcing public transportation can't contribute to their daily routine.
However, Internet will be used by nearly all the people no matter they are indoor or outdoor.
So I hold the view that this can benefit more people.
Moreover, enhancing the internet access can broaden people's horizons and strengthen their bonds between each other.
You can communicate with your friends easily even though they are far away.
My uncle's son is studying in England, and he always chat with his son online.
So improving internet have an edge over others in communication.
On the other hand, you can view different movies on internet, which can spread your vision.
Though I acknowledge that improving transportation can make people go to different places easily, I habor the idea that this is not a practical idea.
Improving transportation is a huge project which needs plenty of money and a long time.
This means we can't benefit from it instantly, but after several years.
On the contrary, spending money on Internet is a faster choice.
As far as I am concerned, the independence of chind will make huge impact in their further study life and career.
The more children be independent , the more they have the chance and courage to dertime their future.
That why I strongly suggest that parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes independently.
Many people may argue that the children are too young to learn from their mistakes.
Yes, it is ture that there are many children who just know how to make mistakes but rarely know how to solve and learn fome it.

But what I want to stress is that just because of this situation, children need more exercise to it and if parents never give children the chance to try it, then how can you ask the children to solve the problem by themselves when they grow up and live far from parents.
Besides, once childeren made a mistake and solve it by themselves, it will give them a deeper impression and speard no effort to avoid it when it comes to the similar situation.
However , if the mistake is solved with the help of parents or others, it will leave them the impression that make mistakes is nothing to do with them and there will alwanys be someone come to help.
In the long run, it do a great harm to children's  further life.
In works, they may not dare to take the responsibility to counteract the bad influence bought by their mistakes and alwanys expect someone come to help.
Last but not least, giving children the chance to learn from their own mistakes will be useful in biliding childen's confidence in solving problems.
Once they have the ability to make mistakes and learn from it, they will gain the experience and know how to figure out.
In this way, they will be more confident about they future way to succeed.

Is it a common scene to you that crazy fans tend to endeavor to defend their idols' opinions on all kinds of media like Twitter, Instagram or Weibo?
In addition, most of these crazy fans are young people.
Older people, on the contrary, are more mature than young ones.
They tend to have formed their own value systems, which means they will stick to what they believe and will be less influenced by opinions of celebrities.
In a word, I fully believe the opinions of celebrities are of greater significance to young people than old ones.
First and foremost, young people tend to be more abitious and aggresive than old ones.
Through the life of celebrities, they could envision their own future.
For instance, if parents of a boy, who is a basketball lover, asks him to work hard, he may ignore them.

But if Lebron James states on Instagram that hard work is the key to his achievements, the boy is more likely to be convinced for he believes the hard work will lead him closer to his dream life of a basketball star!
On the contrary, the older people have experienced more through their life and formed their own value systems.
For example, if a celebrity says if you work hard, you will definitely succeed sooner or later.
Young people tend to believe in this, but a older man knows there are many other keys to success other than hard work, like genius, inborn potential and opportunities.
So they are lessly influnced.
Human beings have become more independent due to the improvement of society.
Thus the topic that whether people should work at the familiar atmosphere has been held in high regard.
And some people hold the view that working near family and friends is a privilege.
However, from my perspective, high salaries is predominant.
Here are some reasons.
To begin with, people who are exposed to a totally new situation can often improve theirselves.
Because they have left their familiar atmosphere and  thus they do not have other's help like used to be, then they are able to find some hidden defects.
For example, one of my cousins once lived in a little town where almost everyone knew him well.
So he has never been shy and could communicate with everyone well.
However, when he left his hometown and moved to Shanghai, he found that he knew anyone there and he was too embarrased to talk to his colleagues.
Through this ,he realized that he had communication barriers with strangers.
But instead of annoyed, he was happy to see his disadvantage before it caused bigger trouble.
So it's obvious to see that outside work benefits people more.
Had my brother not moved to Shanghai, he would have never known his diffidence and had the chance to make change.
Second of all, high salaries means indeispensible for the modern people.
Coming along with the rapidly accelerating urbanization is the continuously increasing prices of commodities.
Therefore, citizens nowdays hvae high living cost even though our life quality has been improved thanks to the new advanced technology.
The high housing price is a sutiable instance.
Due to the increasing population in big cities like Shanghai, the number of house is not adequate, so the price is sustainably growing natually.
A middle-sized apartment in downtown costs several million CNY, which  is hopeless for most families.
Thus the high salary seems to be extremely significant.
In another word,  the young generation can not even find a place to live in big cities without finicial basis.
To sum up, it's obvious to see that job which has high salaries and is away-home is a better choice for the modern residents for the above reasons.
People today, whether western or eastern, are increasingly concerned about the relationship between the social development and the lifestyle.
When it comes the whether human would spand same time on cooking and preparing meals in twenty years as they do today, public have the different perspectives.
Eventhough many elder people might insist that cooking is essential in life and people spend same time in that in the future.
I am convinced of that human will spend less time preparing foods in twenty years for the following reasons.
First and foremost, the people in future will be more busy and have no enough time to cook.
This is primarily because more new fields has come through with the improvment of technology and more and more complex tasks will exist to be solved with the development of society.
Consequently, people have to pay more attention to their main job which will lead to the decrease in the devotion to cooking.
On the contrary, if people still spend same time in cooking as today, they will have less time to handle even more and more complex works.
For such reason, this kind of people will be eliminated.
There is no better illustration of the idea than the experience of my and my elder male cousin.
My cousin is twelve years older than me and went to Peking University.
At that time when he was in university, he had little amount of projects  to do and had more time to have fun with friends and learn extra abilities such as English and speech.
Nevertheless, I am in Wuhan University now, I have much more tasks to finish and have no extra time to enhance myself or to have a relax.
Just twelve years gone, there were more tasks for people to do, not to mention twenty years after now.
Furthermore, some technologies wolud be invented to help people handle their life such as preparing foods.
This is largely due to the fact that more and more basic tasks will be handled by AI rather than human.
Owing to more complex work waithing for human, the simplest works like cooking will be done by robots and they may finish these better than human.
In contrast, if the human still spend more time in basic tasks, there is no need for the world to develop artifical intelligence.
For instance, a research finished by Wuhan University showen that many kinds of work would disappear in human's world.
And the cooking is the most dangerous one, because the techonlogy is enough to let robot solve this problems better than human nowadays.

Parents always see their kids as the most valuable treasure the god gives them, and thus make them want to do everything for their beloved ones, including making the decisions for them.

Although some people say that as parents are getting busy, there are less chance for them to make discisions for the children, but in my opinion, since parents are more likely to participate in children's lives, they infact make more decisions for children than before.
First and foremost, parents make decisions for young people when they are facing a big and essential choice in lives.
Nowadays, as the economics speed up, parents no more have to worry about lives, so they have more time concerntrating themselves on their children,especially their education.
So when students are faced with some important choices, and there are something need to decide, the parents are more likely to direct them.

For example, when my father took college, all my grandparents did was giving him suggestions because they were busy with their work, they had to make a living to support my father to go to the college, but last year when I was faced with the same situation, my father vacated three whole days to work on the decision for me, he looked through all the websites and asked a lot of people for advices and finally decided a best universtiy for me.

From the above, people should get more information from different resources and challenge it that can avoid any inappropriate operation in the future.

The wisdom of relaxing
Different people has different ways to relax themselves.
In addition, the way of relaxing varies from the activities people was doing before taking a rest.
So I disagree with the idea that it is better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book.
Never will I think that different activities of relaxing ranks.
Let's take different types of people for example.
Some teenagers are out-going and they prefer doing sports to relax themselves while some are quiet and they often relax by watching a movie or reading a book.
For workers,they prefer a quiet way to relax themselves like reading a book.
Because they have worked all day physically and it's time to relax their bodies.
However,for the people in the government,they often run and play sports after a day's work.
Sitting in the offices for more than eight hours,it's time for them to do sports to relax themselves.
There is no spercific datas that shows whether it is much better to relax by watching a movie or reading a book.
Actually,it depends.
As the phenomenon showed above,people just take relaxs for the way they prefer.
And they can all benefit from them.
It's hard to say which one is better.
Therefore,the most significant point we should focus on is that whether they have actually relaxed themselves after taking the activties.
As far as I am concerned,the quiet way of relaxing equals to the out-going way of relaxing.
Any way,suitable relax does good to human beings.
Thus my advice on people is choose a way that is suitable to themselves.
Rather than hold on to a way painfully that they believe will benifit themselves,it is wiser to choose a way that will entertain themselves.
Only then will every one enjoy life and live longer and pleasantlier.
Nowadays, there is a prevailing trend among parents that thet offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
It seems like a reasonable and fair method, children can learn that there is no easy money at an early age.
However, looking from other aspects, it is harmfal to the childern's personal development.
One reason is that children may develop a mindset that the purpose of getting a high mark is to gain more money, but not to consolidate the knowledge they learn.
Malbehavior may be resulted from this mindset.
For example, student will have larger motive to cheat in the exams, so that they can get award from parents.
Also, this mindset is not beneficial for their long term development.
Once entering universities, studying becomes a highly self-disciplined task.
If the student's aim is not equipping himself with knowledge, but just fulfilling the parents' wishes, he will fail to set a clear goal and get lost in the university.
Another possible result of this method is rebellious psychology towards study and even towards parents.
Each child has his or her own talent, and the talent could be dancing, singing, drawing, and not necessarily studying.
In this case, high mark at school is not an efficient measurement of their talents.
If parents only reward their childern based on grades, those who are not good at studying would get frustrated over time, thus further losing the interest in studying.
The method would play a counter-productive role.
Owing to the reasons stated above, I don't think the method is instructive and appliable.
Giving money as award is opportunistic and short-sighted.
Instead of giving material awards to their childern, parents should make effort on generating the chilren's interest in studying, and developing the real potential inside.
This is what parents need to think more about.
As we know, some parents offer their school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
They think it's a good to encourage children to get high goals.
However, in my opinion, it seems not to be a good idea.
On the one hand, even offering money can help school-age children try to gaining high grade, there is no impaction if children don't get high grade in school.
It's better to get high score to gain money while it's ok to recieve a normal or low score to get nothing.
On the other hand, wheather students don't need to struggle to requie high score if parents don't offer money to students?
As a student, we need to be responsible to our grade.
In the other words, students who are intreasted in learning are almost hardwork.
Consideing all infactors, the high grade is not the only way to envaluate a student.
Some students are hard, but they try their best to get a normal grade.
Although it's not typically high score, it's their best score.
They also need to be encouraged.
As for the students who are not intreasted in studying but in other fields, I think parents are also need to provide their agreement to their children.
The high grade in school is not the most significant thing in our life.
Such as the richest man in the woild, Bill Gates, he studied in a famous college.
However, in order to achieve his goal, he give up his study and fight in the other way.
In short, I don't think it's a good idea to offer money to their children for high score.

It is a tendency that parents pay more attention to the education of their children and they desire to try every possible measure to make their children have a good school performance.
So there has a phenomenon that some parents give much money to their school-age children.
Different people holds different views, some people think this is a bad idea, but I believe this is a good idea, and there some reason to list.
First of all, parents offer their children some money can make the kids get a good grade in the school.
Because if children are awarded some money, they can buy something that they have desired.
And that will facilitate child to more likely get a good mark.

Take my cousin as an example, my uncle, he always awards his son some money if my cousin get a good grade, so everytime my cousin always use this money to buy some joy that he like, since then, my cousin in order to gain this fund, they always to study hard and get a good performance in school.
So my uncle's behave encourage my cousin to study hard, I think this is good behave.
Another reason is that offer some money to children can cultivate kids ability to manage money.
In modern society, the ability in financial management is an important capacity for people's life.
So if children get some money, that will offer an opportunity for kids to manage their money.
For example, when I was a child, my mother always give some money as an award for me, if I can get a good scorn.
So have this money, that means I have own coffer.
Every time when my mother awards some to me, I will save this money, after passing through a long time, a little money becomes a huge sum nowadays.
Admittedly, offer a lot of money as an award to children to get a high grade maybe make some kids misunderstand the meaning of money because they might think to study is equal to get money.
But I think if parents can teach their children for a correct method, kids will can't to misunderstand the money's study's meaning.
So I think to give some money to children facilitate them get a good grade is a good idea.
All in all, offer much money to children encourage them to get a good mark is a good method.
because it can make kids to study hard also can cultivate the children's ability in financial management.
Many people say that extended family is not so important in the past as it is now.
They think that in the old days when people are not that wealthy, they did not have time or energy to care about others.
However, in my opinion, extended family is more important in the past.
Firstly, being poor in the past, people tended to bond together to support their family.
They helped each other to do agricultural work.
Working together, they were more familiar with each other and relied more on their extended family.
If something came emergently, it was easy to borrow money from extended family because people all trusted each others.
If their extended family were in trouble, they gave a hand too.
Secondly, the young were more likely to befriend thier cousins in the past.
WithoutInternet, pkids will have fewer ways to make friends.
Unwilling to stay alone, it is possible that they went to play with their cousins who lived near them and be friend with them.
In other words, they would grow up together and had impressive influence on each other.
And they are important for
In conclusion, the extended family can benefit people now, it is more important in the past.
Nowadyas, with the dramatic development of the economy and the society, people are becoming busier with their work or they may fell behind and could not sustain a substaintially ample life.
Therefore it becomes harder for parents to allocate plentiful time to accompany their children.
The approaches of spending the limited time with them vary a lot.
While some people argure that it should be used to do something related to schoolwork, I insist that parents try to play with children as much as possible.

Firstly, if all the time with parents' company is spent on things associated with assginments, homework and academic research, it may foster an impression of that nothing outweighs grades in school on children, since parents only talk about these issue to them in this conditon.
This misunderstanding could result in a passive attitude toward life.
Most children do not interest in schoolwork naturally.
Thus if the parents act as if education is all about life, children could lose their passion for life and suffer from some mental problems.

On the contrary, if parents could spend their time with children more on leisure activities, children could develop colorful values of life and world as well, since the approach of parents' allocating time suggests there are numerous things other than schoolwork.
Moreover, games and sports are extremely important part of children's life.
Actually the academic burden in school is getting heavier as the whole world is attaching much significance to education, which deprives a lot  of children's attention from games and sports.
Thus it is quite crucial for parents to guide them to value their physical as well as mental development in games and sports.

Via spending the mere time on activities that is fun and beneficial to their body and brain, it is more likely for the children to understand that keeping themselves in good health is also important as well as getting good grades in school.
Admittedly, education is integral in a child's life indeed, but it should not be attached with so much attention or focus that parents involve only in their schoolwork.
The society sending almost all of them to school has already expressed such trends to the full, so it is realy not necessary to fill their life only with stuff relevant to this.
Besides, playing games or sports could be a relaxing way of helping children to learn as well.
Thus in my opinion, if the parents only have limited time to distribute to their children, it is better to have fun with them.

When it comes to the issue whether parents should point out the mistakes of their children or not, different people have different have different reflections of the issue.

Some hold the idea that letting children make mistakes will induce unnecessary losses, howerever,for some reasons, i believe that there are some advantages if parents let their children make some mistakes.
First of all,children can absorb some experience from the mistake and avoid make it again.
We often have the experience that when we make mistake, we will remember the mistake for a long time and not make it again.
When i was young, my mother always look through my homeworks but did not point out my mistakes, and she just let me find out mistakes by myself.
So when i checked my homework again and again and find many mistakes finally.
In this process, I dramatically learned how to solve these mistakes, so I would never make it again.
Therefore, it is advisable to let children make mistakes and learn from it.
Futhermore, in children's life, live a smooth life without make any mistakes is bad for them.
They will unable to deal with the problems and just make it worse.
We should develop their ablity when they were young.
It is easy to develop their thinking and make a good enviorment.
Make mistakes when we were young is not bad things, because mistakes can make life more beautiful and exciting.
All in all, let children make mistakes can lighten parents' pressure and take care of their children

That the children have excellent performances is the parents' biggest hope.
The increasing number of parents use unreasonable sollution in order to accelerate their children's passion on study.
The common method is that the parents give their children money when they performing well in the school.
In my opinion, I totally disagree with this behavior.
In the first place, children are not mature enough when they face a lot of money.
As we know, some young boy cannot distinguish the right behavior and bad behavior.
A lot of children smoke and buy everything they want when they have a lot of money.
Take my brother as an instance.
My brother, Lee, did not good in school in the past and his mother told him that he will get a lot of money if he get good grade in the school.
He did that latter.
However, these moeny make him missing.
He always spend the money buying cigeratte and playing computer game, which made him hatreding the study.
Finally, these money bring a lot of negative impacts on himself.
Obviously, Giving money to children is not a good method to encourage boy performing well in the school.
In the second place, money-oriented education will makes the children get bad concepts.
Take myself as an instance.
I am a student and my father promised that if I get A grade he will give me money.
I am so happy and I study just for the money rather than improving myself.
Recently, I get a bad habbit that I do every thing just for money I will lose the passion onece I get the reward.
I lose the passion for the persuing knowledge gradually.
After that, I always ask money from my parents when I do tasks that are not connected with study.
Finally, there is a better way to accelerate the children's passion rather than giving them profits.
The most important thing is that parents let their children know the importance of the studying and studying is for themself rather than for others.
Onece children know that, they will work hard without any profits.
To sum up, I oppose the behavior that giving money for children.
This behavior just brings a lot negative impacts on them.

In comtemporary society, it is become a tendency that parents are paying increasing attention to the education of their children.
As a result of this, some of the parents decide many ways to encourage their children to study hard, like offer money for each high grade.
Some people indicate that this will lead children to regard money as the only propose of study.
However in my perspective, it's a good idea for children to learn efficiently.
To start with, giving money to childrens as a reward can encourage children to study harder.
Sometimes, children may become bored and tired when they face with some learning difficulties or have been already study for a while.
At this time it is particularly important for them to have parents' reward.
If they know that they can get come bouns and use this money to buy the things they like, the children will always be motivated to learn and keep in high efficiency.
For another part, offer some money to children can give a chance for them to learn how to manage their own money.
This way the could not only benifit from use the money to buy the things they they like, but also help them learn how to manage their property ahead of time.
For example, my mother used to give me some money as a reward when I was young and as the first time I got my own money, I use that money to start my own acount in the bank.
After that, I start to learn how to save money and keep all the money in my account.
Nowadays I have a small fortune and never waste money on unnecessary things.
Admittedly, it is unwise to give too much money once a time when children get a good grade, since the children will only focus on the money that study brings to them.
Too much reward will make children neglect the benifits of learning.
However,, if we make sure that children will not mis understanding the meaning of the reward and keep a health attitude to the money, it will not affect anything.
From what I have discussed above, it can be concluded that it is good for parents to give their children money as a reward for getting high mark in school.
Nowadays,more and more sudents have their own money to buy anything they like just beacause they behave well.
Parents give valuable present or justr money to their kids that have high mark in school.

Nevertheness,even thogh kids do a good job ,if parents give them mony and they probably by toys and in this way they may lose interest in studying.
consequently,if kids are offered money just because they have a high mark,tey will think mony is too easy to acquire and it's natural to gain money if they behave well.
In this way kids will have a harmful perspective in their young age,and as a result it may let them do everything just for mony.
Probably,in this way kids will lose interest in studying and become less active if they are not given money.
Besides,kids may use this money to do bad things.

For example ,my cousin Lee,he used to be a good students but since he receive money fro his parents, he become overconfident and use this money to buy ciggarete and become a To sum it up ,Ireally disagreewith this.
The topic disscussed here is whether people are willing to help the struggling strangers.
From my point of view, the answer  is definitely "Yes" for three general reasons.
First of all, the basis of people helping others is economic foundation.
If one is not able to take care of himself, it could be impossible for him to lend a hand to others.
In the past, we were living in a poorer condition than now, and we were busy with earning a life and surpporting a family.
We actually did't have the money and energy to think about strangers.
However, we are living in a way better condition now.
We do have the economic foundation to care about others.
Since we had acquired the money and time to help strangers, the willingness of helping others could be the second important factor.
As social animals, we human beings are meant to live with a certain group.
Only through social interactions can we survive and envolve.
Therefore, the willingness of helping others is a kind od instinct of hunman beings since our exitence.
Most of us are willing to help others from the deep of heart, and we are clearly aware of that we would get benefits from it.
Last but not least, education is the crucial factor of the whole process.
Sometimes we have the physical and mental conditions to help the struggling strangers, but do not know when and how.
Here education plays the role to teach people how to help others properly and timely without embarrassing them.

Morever, education also has its great influence on the economic foundation and willingness of helping for its use in teaching people to live well and cultivating the mentality of helping stuggling ones.
To have a summary, for the better economic foundation, willingness of helping and education, I agree with the statement that people today are more willing to help struggling strangers.
At present, a controversial topic has aroused a heated debate among students: whether being creative will come up with the best solution to a problem rather than planning carefully.
Answers vary from one to another.
Some people claim that being creative and imaginative is a key element to work out a solution of a problem.
However, contrary to their view comes my own perspective that planning carefully in advance is really important in dealing with some difficult situation.
My point of view is based on the following reasons.
First, people will have a clearer mind toward the problems they face after making a plan carefully.

To be more specific, when dealing with some hard situations, people who are accustomed to making a meticulous schedule will break the tasks into smaller parts and then establish a more detailed list of each part in order, which will make problems more easier to solve.
In this way, figuring out each solution to each smaller part is a piece of cakes.
However, being creative cannot be a long-term solution to problems for some clever ideas cannot always flash into people's mind in time, which finally fail to go through the hard situation.

For example, my uncle Jack who works in an Internet company needs to deal with many difficulties in his work such as optimization of computer programs, fixing the bugs and computing some programs under experiment but he never makes mistakes in his work.
The reason why he can always work it out is that he will make a detailed plan in advance when he start to finish the tasks such as when to finish the plan A and where to complete the plan B.
Second, making a plan meticulously can also leave enough time and prevent some emergencies from happening.
Specifically, if people make a plan carefully, they will have a comprehensive understanding of the time they need and the whole process.
Under this circunstance, people will always finish the tasks ahead of schedule if they do as what they have already planned.
The extra time could be used for them to perfect what they've finished and also give people opportunity to figure out solution when some emergencies happens.
However, only being creative doesn't mean people have such a capacity to handle some surprising situations.
For example, I always keep a habit of making a careful time list before doing everything such as daily study tasks.
One day, my professor suddenly assigned me a task to do a survey about interest rates of recent years, which totally interfened my plan.
Thanks to the time list which left some extra time after all tasks, I could finish my assignment on time.

In conclusion, making a plan meticulously is of great importance when people are faced some problems for it can not only make people have a clearer mind to handle some hard situations but also prevent some emergencies happening

some of the adolesents even feel more than delihted to annoy their parents.

For instance, my cousin, who is not interested in botany but he finally choose it as his elective class for only one reason, to annoy his parents by disobeying their suggestions.
They have discovereed his interest in astronomy while my cousin even did not discover himself, so they offered my cousin a solution.
Avoiding the right path my aunt and uncle had chosen for him, he finally paid for his mistake.
He failed his classes.
Finally he leanrt from his own mistake automatically and attend the university to consider atronomy as his major.
So, it is important to transfer the teaching pattern from giving suggestions into letting children learn from their mistakes.
Moreover, for some children willind to follow others' advices, it is hard for them to memorize the solutions to the problems because they do not make mistakes.
It will sometimes be really terrible when a man make mistakes, which will helip them to remember clearly the solution yto the problems.

I don't agree to the statement that relaxing by watching a movie or reading a book is better than doing physical exercise.
There are three reasons to support my opinion.
Firstly, whether it's watching a movie or reading a book, our minds are still engaged in mental activity.
We have to keep up with the story line, process the meaning behind words, analyse the characters etc.
While doing physical exercise, on the other hand, allows us to set our minds free from anymore thinking and let our bodies do what it was made for.
Secondly, studies have shown that doing physical exercise can effectively lower our stress level.
While doing physical exercise, our bodies creates chemicals that can bring the feeling of happiness.
Doing physical exercise also facilitates metabolism, allowing our bodies to bring out waste, renewing our bodies.
What's more, after exercising, we tend to have a better appetite, bring about the additional joy of enjoying food to our lives.
Last, whether it's doing physical exercise indoors in a gym or outdoors in a park, other than bringing a change to our physical environment, it brings our life into motion.
A lot of people nowadys spend a shocking amount of time sitting in front of computer desks.
Through watching a movie or reading a book, we only change what we are doing and not our state of sitting down.
Usually stress comes from monotony, from dullness.
We already spend enough time sitting, changing from sitting down doing work to sitting down watching a movie doesn't bring about much change.
Moreoever, outdoor exercise enables us to feel the pleasant feeling of the air brushing against our faces.
Exercising with a friend,  having a nice chat while in a game enhnaces our friendship and brings about a positive change to our everyday life.
Above are reasons why doing physical exercise is a better method of relaxing than watching a movie or reading a book.

When we talk to the relationship between parents and thier children, we always think the parents should be a teacher to their kids, and parents have their duty to remaind their kids do not make the mistakes.
But as far as i am concerned, parents should let children make mistakes and let them learn from their own mistakes, because only in this way, can a kid remember important things impressive.
As we know, at an early stage, children are always expecting to eat or walk with the help of their parents.
and in order to help the kids do it more quickly, we always  tell them the right things directly rather than teach them from their own experience.
As my own experience for example, my niece, whose age was 5 years old, not be able to use chopsticks.
As my sister told me that she never let my niece use the chopsticks, because when my niece use it, she did it in the wrong way, and after my sister taught her once ,she still can't use it.
In order to finish the meal quick, my sister give her the spoon instead and finally, my niece didn't have any chance to make mistake by using chopsticks, and she can't use it by now.

However, I can still remember when I was at her age, my mom told me how to use it one time,and than I just try to it by myself, after try again and again, maybe I spent more time than others to finish my meal, but finally I learnt how to use it and it made me feel very satisfied.
And when we in childhood, we can be easily disturbing the by variety of test in ourschool.
Math test or so on which just have the only one correct answer.

If the parents just tell us the right anwer, we maybe never know how to deal with the math problem correctly and when we face the same question again in the fulture, the first thing we remember may not the way to solve the problem but to ask our parents for help.
So make mistakes can never be wrong, children from time to time make different kinds of mistakes------initially many of which are natural but later other mistakes could turn out to be undedirable.
But just take it easy, the events can help them grow up and the mistake can be very important in their whole life.
Recently, a controversial topic has aorused the heated debate: whether your job has more effect on your happiness than social life does.
Opinion varies from person to another.
Some claim that because the social life is more relaxing than job, so it could bring about more happiness than your job does.
However, contrary to their view comes my perspective that jobs could make more contribution in the happiness than social life does.
My points are elaborated as follow.
Firstly, jobs could guarantee our daily basic physical needs.

If a person obtain a well-paied job, he is able to earn a lot of money, so that he could spend much money in meeting his basic requirements, such as high quality of the clothes, delicious foods and the cool private car, leading to his happiness.
By contrast, the social life could not help him earn much money to guarantee the daily life.
If he can't afford the living cost, he must worry about whether he could eat his next lunch and be full of anxiety and negetive emotion obviously.

Imaging a situation, if a person gains ninety thousand yuan a month, he could  spend one thousand yuan in eating the delicious foods in a splendid restuarant, becasue of the high quality of the foods and the good service in the restuarant, he feels comfortable and happy.
In addition, jobs could also provide us various achievements, which makes us happy.
In some situation, the jobs are complex and challenging, so that seldom people could accomplish it in a short time.

If you work hard and find a effective method to solve the problem and finish this difficult job in the limited time, you could obtain much appreciation from your colleages, leading to your happiness which social life could not provide.
By contrast, if you don't challenge the difficulty in the work, there is no chance for you to experience this happiness of success.
For example, my brother worked in the Internet company.

In a program, he solve the problem which other people in his company are not able to deal with, and then the leader realized his talent and hard working,  and gave him a high evluation, which makes my brother very happy.

In conlusion, it is necessary to repeat my point that jobs have more effect on the happiness than social life does, because it could provide not only the basic needs for a high quality of life but also various achievement which could not exist in the social life.

Some parents offer their school-age children money when thet get high-marked in school, as a method of encouragement.
In my opinion, this is a workable way to give children dynamic on study.
This as well tells them that working hard and getting progress will be well paid, which has a positive effect in their later lives.
When I was a student of a primary school, my parents had also used this way to make me study.
If I got more than 98 of 100 scores in a course, I would be rewarded a toy as I wished, or some money that I could spend it myself while telling them where it had gone.
I have to admit that this had greatly encouraged me to study harder for a better grade.
However, each coin has two sides.
The biggest problem of this method is that while those school-age children get that money, how could we promise that they wouldn't use it to do those things of crime such as doing drugs?
As is known to all, children are hard to distinguish sins from cool things.
So I think that money should not be so much, and parents should monitor how their children use their money.
I support the idea of awarding children when they get high marks in school, but their parents should learn to control the whereabouts of money which they gave their children as rewards.
This could both encourage children of studying and tell them the importance of programming their money.
Because of the fast development of the society, nowadays people communicate less with their extended family members than they did in the past.
However, whenever asked about whether nowadays extended family is less important than it was in the past, people always exhibit an air of uncertainty.
Nevertheless, I wholeheartedly agree that extended family is less important now.
First, extended family is not as important as it was in the past because people now have better lives than people in the past did.
People in the past have few communication tools, so they know less people.
Moreover, they always have difficult conditions that they need help from others, which extended family members can be the only candidates willing to help.
In this way, people developed good relationships with extended familes.
However, now people seldom have problems that they can not solve by themselves because they now live happier lives.
So, they have less chance to meet and communicate with their extended families.
Then, extended family is less important because of the loss of traditions.
Peope in the past used to have a lot of traditions and rules, which were to visit or have dinner with their extended families, to follow especially when there was a festival around.
And these traditions and rules are very important for people in the past to follow.
Thus, people who do not follow them will be considered rude.
Nevertheless, with the development of the society, many of these traditions and rules have been lost.
In this way, many people don't even know these rules, not to mention follow them.
Therefore, people now have less contact with their extended families.
Then, they consider extended family less important.
Last but not the least, people nowadays are too busy to contact their extended families.
The competitions among people are very fierce, so people have to work hard to maintain their positions.
Moreover, they always have a lot of activities that they must attend when they are off from work.
Thus, they don't have much spare time to contact their extended families just to maintain the relationships that are not that necessary.
People now prefer to have more free time.
However, people have more free time in the past.
So visiting their extended families is more interesting to them.
In this way, extended family is less important now.
To conclude, extended family is less important now because people have better lives, less rules and less leisure time.

Hence, doing homework alone is much better to maintain the  good relationship with others.
In a word, it is much better for kids to work alone individually than working with lassmates as a group for the three reasons stated.
Issues related to capabilities have never failed to attract people's attention.
When it comes to the leadership, recently a hotly debated topic has aroused among the public: whether the leadership can be learnt.
Some may insist that such kind of ability is determined by genes.
However, as far as I am conocerned, I belive that all of the people can learn the leadership from their living environment.
And my points of views will be illustrated as follows.
First of all, kids can learn leadership from their family members to become a leader.
To be specific, as a kid, his closest living surroundings are related to their family members.
And every family needs a host, a leader to make important decisions when facing problems to guide the whole family safely and healthily to bind together longer.

When the kids learn from the host's behavior like how to make decisions and how to satisfy everyone's desire that are  conponent of leadership, they can make good use of them to their own living conditions to become a leader.
For instance, what made me really impressed is that when I was a little boy, my grandpa host nearlly everything in my family.
Sometimes my uncle and my father had some conflicts, he would give the suggestion to help them to solve them and make the family complete.
After learning these, I always helped my classmates to deal with some problems and made sure that they could still be good friends.
And then my teacher found what I always did and chose me to be the monitor.
On top of that, even adults who have had jobs can still learn learship from their boss and then be promoted to become a leader.
In details, in most company, most of work need people to cooperate and each group has it own leader.

If a person who cannot lead others, he can be a group member and learn from the group leader about how to distribute the work, how to explore others' advantages, and how to make the final decision to ensure the acomplishment of the work efficiently and perfectly.
After learning these kind of abilities of guiding a group, next time when he is the group leader, he can use these method to guide others and become a good leader.
For example, my cousin used to be a person who will never ask others to finish something, which means that he could not be a leader.

However, after he got a job and leant a lot from his group leader, he can require others to finish some work in their expertise area, which not only made the job finish perfectly but also made him a good leader.
Finally, judging from all above, I strongly agree that people can leatn leadership to be a leader.
With the pressure of study growing nowadays, chlidren spend more time on doing homework or take part in organized activities related to schools or sports.
The trend may have its reasons, but I would suggest children be given more free time to allocate.
First, students will be more efficient if they are allowed to arrange some time on their own.
If more free time is given, they will cherish the time they have and try to find a well organized schedule.
In this way they will be more efficient.

In my middle school age my parrents didn't give me too much time to arrange freely, so I felt very dull and tired everyday, just solving problems repeatedly, and the acadamic performance didn't look well, either.
When I get into high school I lived home and have to arrange my time on my own, I got my own free time and my efficency promotes a lot and the acadamic performance also become better.
Second, given more time to the studnets enables their future potential.
Having free time will help students develop the skills they love, which the other may not have.
These skills provide opportunity for their future job.
Bill Gates spends a lot of time on computer programing when he was young.
These experience tend to be priceless when he started his own bussiness.

Although, doing homework or paticipate organized activites related to schools or sports may help students develop their basic learning skills, students can also develop there learning skills in their free times.
In their free time they have time to digest what they learned and find out a better way to have a good command of thier knowledge.
To sum up, give the students more time to learn will help them perform better at present or in the future.
So I am totally agree with the statement.

Recently, a heated debate have arisen from public: whether teachers should be paid at least as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid.
Some people claim that teachers should not get that much salary because they creat less values than other three occupations.
From my perspective, I think that teachers should get a higher salary than they do now.
My points will be elaborated as follows.
First, teacher is an occupation that can never be replaced.

We cannot deny the fact that we are all learned from teacher since we are in the kindergarden, so how could we draw such a conclusion that teachers should not be paid well even these words we uesd to describe our standpoint are taught by teachers.
Compared with teachers, the other three occupations we may not need to make connect with for a whole life.
And maybe that some kids nowadays can learn from the internet, but computers can never be as geniality and amiable as a real person in front of you.

For example, my nephew learned knowledge from the Internet, but I found that he did not like to talk to people around him, and my cousin took him to the hospital, the doctor said it is mainly because he wasn't learning at school, and the situation went better after he was taught by a really kind teacher.
Second, students are what we called the future of our country.

Education is always considered the priority of the policy of goverment, this is mainly because that students will grow up some day in the future and what they do will definitely decide whether they drive the country to prosperity or recession.
And it is teachers' duty to teach these young people how to build up their values, their outlook of life and their own concepts of the world, which will determine their personalities.
Take Qing dynasty for instance, in the late Qing dynasty, alot of famous people helped pur country during the war time.
To put in in a nutshell, I strongly believe that teachers should be paid at least as much as doctors, lawyers or business leaders are paid.
It is not only because teacher is an occupation that cannot be replaced, but also because students are the future of a country and they were taught by teachers.

Do you know how to manage your own money?
And when do you form the thought of financially responsibility?
From my perspective, I really agree with the satement and children are supposed to manage their own money as youngh as they can.
During the yougn age, children will learn everything carefully and with a curious mind; thus, they can remenber the new things more deeply.
Liu Qiangdong, a Chinese entrepreneur of the JD company, is a typical example to support my point of view.
When he was a little boy, his parents always gave living costs to him for week and let him allocate his own money by himself.
Just because of this small action, he learned how to distribute money, deposit money and the responsibility of managing money.

When he growed up, he was a really financial responsible adults and have his own method to allot his money, including depositing some of it to the bank, investing some to the stock market and using a large amount of it to creat his own company finally.
He can become such a sucessful businessman due to the cultivation from his parents when his was young.
That is to say, yough age is the most essential age to develop chidren's responsibility of managing money and chidlren will remenber all those knowledge in their mind when they grow up.
Thus, children should learn to manage their own money at a young age.
When people grow up, because of the occupation of high pressure from both work and study, it is too late to develop this ability.
Take mysely, a gril without any financial responsibility, as an instance to illustrate my own perspective.

Because of the large amount assignment given by my teacher and peer pressure from my classmates, including the competition in exam, comparison on grades and so on, I hardly have time to care about how to manage my own money.
Obviously, after I grow up, I even not not know the meaning of financial responsibility, let alone the manage products to earn money myself.
What I do as an adult is just rely on by parents' suggestion and do what they ask me to do.
Because of the busy work, I ignore to form the financial ability and become a lonely girl in the middle of the society.
In summary, children are required to manage their own money at a young stage to become financial responsible.
That is because, young age is the best period to learn and develop new thoughts, chidlren will never forget the ability and become more and more proficient.

In addition, young age is the most spare time because the high work stress when people grow up and they do not have the time to learn new things, which means when they realize they need to learn, it is just too late.
In the fast-paced society with advanced techology, how to educate children  always become a crucial topic among the public.
Some people believe that it is inneccessary for them to understand how to control their children  and let them do what they want to, even they know their kids will  make mistakes.
Conversely, some people hold the opposite view that parents should take care of their children and set family rules.
In my opinion, I agree with the latter one.

Admittedly, some children which have received high-quality education have the ability to learn from mistakes and personal experience actually is  much more impressive for children compared to teach them how to behave.
What's more , this method will likely play a cricial role in future carreer.
For example, the reason why Steve jobs succeed is he learn from mistakes.
As a successful leader,  due to thinking differently, he makes his product become more famous.
When people selling their own product, they always act like this, spend much time to inreoduce what product he wil sell and how products are made.
They barely spend time to discuss why they design this product and their belief.
However, Steve jobs succedding in this.
He thinks the belief and purpose of a product is important.
This is the result of learning from mistake.
However, in fact, things are not always going well.

Since most children are too young to  equip themselves with enough knowlege and skills that are neccessary to learn from mistake, they can get nothing or cultivate some bad habit if children cannot realize they have made mistake.
For example, when  i was a child, my elder brother alwas lost things ,such as , umbrella, pencils, pems, or MP3.
But my parents ignore the improtance of educating him because they think he will learn to  be careful next time.
Nevertheless,  he was not able to realize the value of possessions, and since he was seldom punished , gradually he develop a bad habit .
In conclusion, although some children can learn from their mistakes, mosh children cannot benifit from them.
The recent years has witnessed a obviously tendency that people's health are playing a more and more important part in human's life.
Because of this change, It is not uncommon to see that people always taking about how to improve their health.
As we know, physical exercise is the most effective way to help people keep their health.
Some people support the former as old people need more physical exercise, but the other are in favor of the latter because young children are still grow.
As for me I think physical exercise is more important for young children.
First, as some people said, young children are still grow, they need enough physical exercise to develop their body, it can help them become more strong.
A strong body is a necessary part of advantages when someone enter the society and find jobs.
So physical exercise is the fundamantal things that a young people should do.

On the other hand, through do some physical exercise in the gym or the playground, they can do exercise with other people, they can make more friends and inprove their communication abilities, those also are the critical part of skills and resource in their future life.
But if young people lack of physical exercise, it will influence their physical health.
And worse, it could lead to sickness when they are just teenagers.
It can make them always feel overwhelmed in their future work.

Because of those reason, in my opinion, I think physical exercise is more important for young people than old people, because it is not only a way to keep their life more longer, but also can develop their skills and advantages which is essential in their future.
So I'd recommended that the young children should do more and more physical exercise in their daily life, to increase themselves.
Nowadays, many parents offer their children money for each high grade they get in school.
Different people have different opinions on it.
Some may think it is a very good idea because it can encourage their children to work harder to get a higher grade, while others think it will make children even more pressure.
There are many advantages to do this.
Some parents think if you give your children some awards when the did a good job, children will establish the awareness that working hard and getting a good grade will be rewarded.
On the other hand, if they did work hardly enough, they will be punished, which means they will not have pocket money to buy some snacks or toys.
It will not only encourage their school-age children to work harder, but also give them an good oppotunities to make good use of their pocket money.
However, many people argue that young children should be more naive and pure, they are not supposed to materialistic.
If they made a little mistake and did not get a very ideal grade,they will be extremely sorry for not getting a reward given from parents.
As far as I am concerned, I do not think it is a very good idea to offer school-age children money for each high grade they get in school.
I think it is too early for them to know the cruelty of adults' world.
They will simply connect their little success with money.
They will be more likely to be materialistic and lose their purety.
Plus, it will be more likely for them to get very nervous before taking a test, which does no good for them to get a good grade.
In a word, I do not think offering money is good idea, maybe we can try some other reward for children when they get a good grade.
Such as take a trip or have a big meal.
I think the farther children get away from money, the happier and more innocent they will become.

This method used by parents obviously aims to encourage their chirdren to study harder.

Awarding  them is necessary when they get good grade, because it is a signal that indicate studying well is what they should try their best to do.
And it is important to encourage them to pay more attention to their study.
However, what they are awareded should be a book they admire to read or a chance to see films with friends.
It may be better.
On the other hand, it may increase the burden of family finance.
If the money was not used to award the children, more money would be used to improve the quality of the family.
what is more, as for children, they are too young to have a plan of using money.

I don't agree with the statement that watching a movie or reading a book it's better than doing physical exercise when relaxing.
From my perspective, experiensing spiritual amusement such as watching movies and reading books is quite different from doing physical exercises which is mainly a physical entertainment.
These two different ways of relaxing oneself both has its own unique advantages.
On the one hand, Watching movies or reading books does not require much skills.
People simply sit and enjoy through the works made by others.
It's not exhausting when people reading or watching.
And it doesn't require a specific place to do it.

Issues related to selecting courses have never failed attract people' s attention.
Recently, a heated debated topic arose in the public: whether all university students should be required to take history courses whatever their field of study is or not.
Opinions vary from one to another.
Some people believe that history courses are significant to students so all of them have to take this.

To be more specific, when students take history courses, since they are not specialized in history, they at most know the basic knowledge of history.

They have to prepare lots of work in order to perform well in history courses, such as collecting information about history, asking advanced students or professors for help, remembering certain time point of crucial events and so on.
It will be lots of work for them to do, which means these students have to spend much time and energy.
It is more possible for them to study history courses in their leisure time, so they do not have too much time to relax.
It is more likely for them to feel tired.
Also, it is hard for students who do not majoy in history to do as well as those who specialize in history.
Thus, when they take courses together, the students who majoy in other courses must feel upset and become stressful.
In the second place, it is a waste of time for students who are in other field of study.
As the knowledge of history have almost nothing to do with information of other subjects.
Therefore, even these students study well and gain lots of knowledge about history, the knowlege is useless for them.
So, the time these students spend in learning history should be regarded as waste.
Take my sister as an example, when she was in college, she was speciallized in English.
However, the school required all students in that university to take history courses.
But she thought nothing she studies from the history lessons could be used in English, as these two subjects did not relate at all.

In this day and age, with the remarkable progress of our society development, a heated discussion has aroused attention among us: If people will spend less time cooking and preparing food in 20 years than they do today.
Answers vary from one person to another.
Some claim that it is good for us to prepare food step by step, while others deem that cooking in 20 years must be faster than today.

To begin with, the development of technology in twenty years will allow us to reduce cooking time, which can make us easier to get foods.
This is because the new technical appliances will make the cooking process more efficiency.
For example, we didn't have microwave ovens twenty years ago, so it was hard for us to cook dinner for our family.
But since we developed the microwaves, it has accelerated our cooking process.
It only takes us few minutes to prepare meals.
So I believe that in twenty years, there wll also be a booming development of cooking appliance that can increase the cooking efficiency.
In addition, the creed of being productivity has been adopted by many corporations that is considered to be consistend with the booming economy.
So how to save time in our life has been the prority of consideration by us.
Therefore, the cooking time must be decreased.
A good example in point is that a good friend of mine called Jack.
He is working in Apple.
He always complain to me that he always have no time cooking.
So, we can safely say that the cooking time must be reduced in 20 years.
From what we discussed above, we can safely draw a conclusion that we will spend less time cooking and preparing food in twenty yeats than what we do today.
Because it is not only a result of the development of techniques but it can aslo guarantee our working pruductivity.

With the development of people's awareness about the importance of education, more and more parents pay enormous efforts to search for variable methods to improve their children's grades.
In my opinion, however, awarding children money for each high grade they obtain in school is not a beneficial way to motivate the children.
First of all, offering children money when they get good grades will give them a sense that they are studying for money rather than knowledge.
It's not advantageous for their long-period development.
If children are motivated by the desire for money instead of curiosity to the world, they will probably form a money-oriented value, which in fact preventing them from establishing mental soundness.
It will be more likely that they are driven by the stress to grasp wealth when they enter adulthood.
Furthermore, children may spend the money carelessly, which prevents them from forming a right economic value.
For instance, my father often rewarded me with a lot of pocket money for my good grades when I was in primary school.
As a small child at that age, I had no consideration about planning to spend the money meaningfully.
Therefore, I never saved the money and bought anything I want without thinking about the price.
When my father found that I bought lots of useless commodities and toys, he decided to cease awarding me money and required me to learn to control my expenditures.
Last but not least, giving children money for high grades prevents them from challenging themselves.
They are possibly satisfied when they are rewarded for an "A" on the exam paper and stop working hard to get more acheivements.
Only when they are required at a higher level will they be motivated to imrove themselves to be better.
In a word, offering children money won't be a good choice, since it may cause alot of problems and do harm to children's growth.
How to success in job can always raise debate in the society.
Many of us, the undergraduates, face so many suggestions about this question from our relatives or friends.
Some of them hold the view that the ability to relate well to people is more important than studying hard in school.
However, I disagree with this idea.
As far as I am concerned, the social skills is as important as studying hard in school.
I will illustrate my point for following reasons.
To begin with, social skills is important in our future job.
During our learning period, many of us neglect the significance of the ability to relate well to people.
But the importance of if maybe beyond our imagination.
In our future job, we need to communicate with others everyday.
As an agent, you need to communicate with your client to know their requirements.
As a  researcher, you need to report your study to gain support from others.
As a manager of project, you need to exchange ideas with your team to finish your tasks.
Communicatoin is the thing we can never avoid.
It is the ability to relate well to people that help us to do our job better.
Also, people are too subjective to listen to others thoughts sometimes.
Only when you have the ability to relate well to people will they listen to your own ideas.
In addition, we can never attach too much significance to studying hard in school.
Knowledge you gained in school can benefits you in many aspects.
If your job is related to your major, what you learned in school build a solid foundation which you can benefit from it forever.
With relative knowledge, it will be easier for you to solve prefessional problems than others without these.
For instance, my father, who majored in engeneering, managed building project.
Owing to his professional knowledge, their project save much in design.
Even if your job is not related to your job, you can also benefit from your studying ability you gained in school.
The studying ability is not innate.
You must practice it again and again in your learning period so that you can study effecient by yourself in your future job.
To summarize, both the ability to relate well to people and studying hard in school is crucial in a future job.

How would you feel when you lose an unit of a program but the deadline is to near for you to do it right now while you just neglectd the advice given by your team member before, thinking that it is totally unneccesary?
How would you feel when all your team members leave the team leaving only you to finish the whole project while you just take no notice of their advice?
All above are due to the neglect of the advice of the team members.
From my perspective, I think the leader of a team should listen to these advices for the greater good instead of just insist on his own idea.
For one thing, ones own angle towards a problem can't always cover all the aspects which are essential to the project.
Only with all the endeavor made by all the members of a team can they successfully reach their destination.
For example, if a person who are so confident on himself become a leader of a team, he just take care of all the work following his own mind.

When a team member comes up with an advice that does good for this project like writting a code that is more efficient, he can hardly listen to it for accepting this advice means his ability is lower.
For another, the team member will be disappointed about this and even worse leave the team.
Everyone desires to be admitted by other people.
If a person's advice always be objected by the team leader, he will gradually feel disappointed thinking that all his adivces are just rubbish that have no value.

As time goes by, this kind of emotion will spread to the whole team and thus the working environment will become liveless for seven days a week, everyone has no enthusiasm to continue this project anymore.

Furthermore, they will leave the team for they don't want to work and can't get joy out of it, which will make the team leader quite embarassed and have to think out a far more sophisticated way to solve this dilemma.

I think it is better to relax by doing physical exercise than relax by watching a movie or reading a book.

It is the liberation of my mind.

Second,doing exercise is good for our health.

We may have a backache,a headache,etc.
It's not a kind of illness,it's a signal sent out by our bodies to mark us that they are not comfortable.
They need to move to relax.
It is better than sitting again to watch something.
Final,doing exercise is a good way to make friends so that we can share something interesting for fun.
Also outdoor activities make us breathe fresh air to clear our mind.

In the highly competitive society, every one is eager to learn more knowledge to broaden their horizon.
However, there is a hot debate about what people should react if their teacher or leader says something wrong during the class or meeting.
A lot of people say it is important to correct this mistake instantly.
Others might say the best thing ro do is say nothing.
However, as far as I am concerned.
I think the best way to do is wait till the class or the metting is over and tell the teacher and the leader about their mistakes.
I admit that correct the mistake immediatly is the most convenient way.
If the teacher or the leader says something incorrect the student or the empoloyees may not successfully understand their meaning, and that could cause a lot of issues.
However, interupt now may cause other troubles too.
For instance, your leader or reacher may think you are rude and your classmates might consider you as disruptive.
Most of the situation is the teacher and the leader even the students has already know the mistake.
They do not correct the mistake because they do not want to waste the time.
But if people disturb them it will be time consuming and the people who correct this mistake might get poor impression.
Say nothing is not appropriate.
If the mistake is not corrected in time.
The student or the employees still can not get the right meaning of what their teacher or the leader has said.
And there is a lot probability the students and the employees will misunderstand the order and cause a lot of issues.
For examole, my uncle is the leader of the company.
Once he had a meeting he said the company needed to bid no more than 50 thousands dollar.
But the truth is he misread the number and the real number is 5 thousands dollar.
In the end my uncle got the punishment from the company.
Wait till the end of the class or the meeting and then correct the mistake is the best way.
Because lots of people care about their reputation, if people correct their mistake right in front of every one's face.
The teacher and the leader will feel ashamed.
If peole make them fell embarressed.
They will leave a bad impression for their teacher and leader.
So wait till the class or the meeting is over.
People can talk to them privatly and this behavior may make your teacher or leader feel you are considerate and habe a greater chance to earn their trust.
Once I found my teacher's mistake and I corrected her afer the class in person, in the end she thanked me and had me as her assistant.
So when your teacher or your leader makes a mistake.
Please do not immediatly correct them or say nothing.
The best way to do is after the class or meeting is over, talk to them face ro face and then correct the mistake.
You might find it is beneficial to your relation with the teacher or the leader.
There's no doubt that everyone is being influenced by others, since we all live the complex society.
Some people claim that teachers have stronger imflunece on students than their friends due to the assistence of teahers on one' s growth.
On the contrary, I hold the opposite viewpoint that even though teachers may help us in acadamic study, friends influnce us more.
First and foremost, students are more willing to listen to friends' suggestions than teachers.
It is clear that nearly every teenager has period when he is rebellious.
At that time, students regard their teacher as enermy and unlikely to act what thet are told.
For instance, when I was in the eighth grade, I had disagreement with my parents.
Then I left home and visited one of my classmate's home.
Even though my teachers called me several times, it is my friend who persuaded to come back home.
As a result, i strongly assert that friends have more impact.
Moreover, students know us better and we feel more at ease to share our feeling with our friends.
Since teachers are always regarded someone to be respectful and awed, it is hard for us to tell teachers our ture emotions.
To illustrate, one of my best friends in high school failed in her college entrance exams.
As the examines partialy determined one's fate, it's not hard to imagine how frustrated she was.
However, when our head master tried to comfort her, she just said she was OK.
Later that day, she came to me and cried in my arms, which I still feel sad for her whenever I recalled such a scene.
Therefore, students are more likely to be imfluencd their friends, since friends have more opportunities to help them out.
